GSP29nysvbh1u:997: % vṛkṣabuddhir anumānam evaṃ sati bhavitum arhatīti/] p.467
GSP29nysvbh1u:998: dravyāntarotpattipakṣe nāvayavyanumeyaḥ, asyaikadeśasambaddhasyāgrahaṇāt grahaṇe cāviśeṣād anumeyatvābhāvaḥ/ tasmād vṛkṣabuddhir anumānaṃ na
GSP29nysvbh1u:999: ekadeśagrahaṇam āśritya pratyakṣasyānumānatvam upapādyate/ tac ca ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1000: NyS_2,1.32: na, pratyakṣeṇa yāvat tāvad apy upalambhāt ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1001: na pratyakṣam anumānam, kasmāt? pratyakṣeṇaivopalambhāt/ yat tadekadeśagrahaṇam āśrīyate pratyakṣeṇāsāv upalambhaḥ/ na copalambho nirviṣayo 'sti/ yāvac cārthajātaṃ tasya viṣayas tāvad abhyupajñāyamānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1003: kiṃ punas tato 'nyad arthajātam, avayavī samudāyo vā? na caikadeśagrahaṇam anumānaṃ bhāvayituṃ śakyaṃ hetvabhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1005: pratyakṣapūrvakam anumānam, sambaddhāv agnidhūmau pratyakṣato dṛṣṭavato dhūmapratyakṣadarśanād agnāv anumānaṃ bhavati/ yac ca sambaddhayor
GSP29nysvbh1u:1006: liṅgaliṅginoḥ pratyakṣam, yac ca liṅgamātrapratyakṣagrahaṇam, naitad antareṇa anumānasya pravṛttir asti; na tv etad anumānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1008: bhavati/ so 'ya. pratyakṣānumānayor lakṣaṇabhedo mahān āśrayitavya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1009: na caikadeśopalabdhir avayavisadbhāvāt/ na caikadeśopalabdhimātram/ kiṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1013: akṛtsnagrahaṇād iti cet, na kāraṇato 'nyasyaikadeśasyābhāvāt --- na cāvayavāḥ kṛtsnā gṛhyante avayavair evāvayavāntaravyavadhānāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1015: nāvayavī kṛtsno gṛhyata iti, nāyaṃ gṛhyamnāṇeṣv avayaveṣu parisamāpta iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1017: kṛtsnam iti vai khalv aśeṣatāyāṃ satyāṃ bhavati, akṛtsnam iti śeṣe sati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1018: tac caitad avayaveṣu bahuṣv asti avyavadhāne grahaṇād vyavadhāne cāgrahaṇād iti/ aṅga tu bhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭāṃ gṛhyamāṇasyāvayavinaḥ kim agṛhītaṃ manyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1020: yenaikadeśopalabdhiḥ syād iti/ na hy asya kāraṇebhyo 'nye ekadeśā bhavantīti tatrāvayavavṛttaṃ nopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1022: idaṃ tasya vṛttam --- yeṣām indriyasannikarṣād grahaṇam avayavānāṃ taiḥ saha gṛhyate, yeṣām avayavānāṃ vyavadhānād agrahaṇaṃ taiḥ saha na gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1024: samudāyaśeṣatā vā samudāyo vṛkṣaḥ syāt tatprāptir vā, ubhayathā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1025: grahaṇābhāvaḥ/ mūlaskandhaśākhāpalāśādīnām aśeṣatā vā samudāyo vṛkṣa iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:1026: syāt prāptir vā samudāyinām iti, ubhayathā samudāyabhūtasya vṛkṣasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1027: grahaṇaṃ nopapadyata iti/ avayavais tāvad avayavāntarasya vyavadhānād aśeṣagrahaṇaṃ nopapadyate/ prāptigrahaṇam api nopapadyate prāptimatām
GSP29nysvbh1u:1028: agrahaṇāt/ seyam ekadeśagrahaṇasahacaritā vṛkṣavuddhir dravyāntarotpattau kalpate na samudayamātre
GSP29nysvbh1u:1030: yad uktam avayavisadhbāvād iti, ayam ahetuḥ sādhyatvāt/ sādhyaṃ tāvad etat
GSP29nysvbh1u:1031: kāraṇebhyo dravyāntaram utpadyata iti, anupapāditam etat/ evaṃ ca sati
GSP29nysvbh1u:1032: vipratipattimātraṃ bhavati vipratipatteś cāvayavini saṃśaya iti//33//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1034: yady avayavī nāsti sarvasya grahaṇaṃ nopapadyate/ kiṃ tat sarvam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1035: dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyāḥ/ kathaṃ kṛtvā? paramāṇusamavasthānaṃ tāvad darśanaviṣayo na bhavaty atīndriyatvād aṇūnām, dravyāntarañ cāvayavibhūtaṃ darśanaviṣayo nāsti, darśanaviṣayasthāś ceme dravyādayo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1036: gṛhante te niradhiṣṭhānā na gṛhyeran/ gṛhyante tu kumbho 'yaṃ śyāma eko mahān saṃyuktaḥ spandate asti mṛnmayaś ceti, santi ceme guṇādayo dharmā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1037: iti/ tena sarvasya grahaṇāt paśyāmo 'sti dravyāntarabhūto .vayavīti//34//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1040: saṅgrahakārite vai dhāraṇākarṣaṇe/ saṃgraho nāma saṃyogasahacaritaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1041: guṇāntaraṃ snehadravatvakāritam, apāṃ saṃyogād āme kumbhe, agnisaṃyogāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:1042: pakve/ yadi tv avayavikārite abhaviṣyatāṃ pāṃśurāśiprabhṛtiśv apy
GSP29nysvbh1u:1043: ajñāsyetām/ dravyāntarānutpattau ca tṛṇopalakāṣṭhādiṣu jatusaṃgṛhīteṣv api nābhāviṣyatām
GSP29nysvbh1u:1044: athāvayavinaṃ pratyācakṣāṇako mā bhūt pratyakṣalopa ity aṇusañcayaṃ darśanaviṣayaṃ pratijānānaḥ kim anuyoktavya iti/ ekam idaṃ dravyam ity ekavuddher viṣayaṃ paryanuyojyaḥ --- kim ekabuddhir abhinnārthaviṣayeti
GSP29nysvbh1u:1047: arthāntarānujñānād avayavavisiddhiḥ/ nānārthaviṣayeti cet --- bhinneṣv ekadarśanānupapattiḥ anekasminn eka iti vyāhatā buddhir na dṛśyata
GSP29nysvbh1u:1048: NyS_2,1.36: senāvanavat grahaṇam iti cen nātīndriyatvād aṇūnām ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1049: yathā senāṅgeṣu vanāṅgeṣu ca dūrād agṛhyamāṇapṛthaktveṣv ekam idam ity upapadyate buddhiḥ evam aṇuṣu sañciteṣv agṛhyamāṇapṛthaktveṣv ekam idam ity upapadyate buddhir iti/ yathā gṛhyamāṇapṛthaktvānāṃ senāvanāṅgānām
GSP29nysvbh1u:1051: yathā gṛhyamāṇajātīnāṃ palāśa iti vā khadira iti vā nārāj jātigrahaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1052: bhavati/ yathā gṛhyamāṇapraspandānāṃ nārāt spandagrahaṇam, gṛhyamāṇe cārthajāte pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇād ekam iti bhāktaḥ pratyayo bhavati, na tv aṇūnāṃ gṛhyamāṇapṛthaktvānāṃ kāraṇataḥ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇād bhākta ekapratyayaḥ, atīndriyatvād aṇūnām iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1053: idam eva ca parīkṣyate kim ekapratyayo ṇusañcayaviṣaya āhosvit neti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1054: aṇusañcaya eva senāvanāṅāni/ na ca parīkṣyamāṇam udāharaṇam iti yuktaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1056: dṛṣṭam iti cen na tadviṣayasya parīkṣopapatteḥ/ yad api manyeta dṛṣṭam idaṃ senāvanāṅgānāṃ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇād abhedenaikam iti grahaṇam, na ca dṛṣṭaṃ śakyaṃ pratyākhyātum iti, tac ca naivam, tadviṣayasya parīkṣopapatteḥ --- darśanaviṣaya evāyaṃ parīkṣyate yo 'yam ekam iti pratyayo dṛśyate, sa parīkṣyate kiṃ dravyāntaraviṣayo vā athāṇusañcayaviṣaya iti/ atra darśanam anyatarasya sādhakaṃ na bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1057: nānābhāve cāṇūnāṃ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇād abhedenaikam iti grahaṇam atasmiṃs tad iti pratyayaḥ, yathā sthāṇau puruṣa iti/ tataḥ kim?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1059: atasmiṃs tad iti pratyayasya pradhānāpekṣitvāt pradhānasiddhiḥ/ sthāṇau puruṣa iti pratyayasya kiṃ pradhānam? so 'sau puruṣe puruṣapratyayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1060: tasmin sati puruṣasāmānyagrahaṇāt sthāṇau puruṣo .yam iti/ evaṃ nānābhūteṣv ekam iti sāmānyagrahaṇāt pradhāne sati bhavitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1061: pradhānaṃ ca sarvasyāgrahaṇād iti nopapadyate/ tasmād abhinna evāyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1063: indriyāntaraviṣayeṣv abhedapratyayaḥ pradhānam iti ced, na viśeṣahetvabhāvād dṛṣṭāntāvyavasthā --- śrotrādiviṣayeṣu śabdādiṣv abhinneṣv ekapratyayaḥ pradhānam anekasminn ekapratyayasyeti/ evaṃ ca sati
GSP29nysvbh1u:1064: dṛṣṭāntopādānaṃ na vyavatiṣṭhate viśeṣahetvabhāvāt/ aṇuṣu saṃśiteṣv ekapratyayaḥ kim atasmiṃs tad iti pratyayaḥ sthāṇau puruṣapratyayavat,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1065: athārthasya tathābhāvāt tasmiṃs tad iti pratyayaḥ yathā śabdasyaikatvād ekaḥ śabda iti viśeṣahetuparigrahaṇam antareṇa dṛṣṭāntau saṃśayam āpādayata iti/ kumbhavatsañcayamātraṃ gandhādayo 'pīty anudāharaṇaṃ gandhādaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1067: evaṃ parimāṇasaṃyogaspandajātiviśeṣapratyayān apy anuyoktavyaḥ, teṣu caivaṃ prasaṅga iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1068: ekatvabuddhis tasmiṃs tad iti pratyaya iti viśeṣahetur mahad iti pratyayena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt --- ekam idaṃ mahac ceti ekaviṣayau pratyayau
GSP29nysvbh1u:1069: samānādhikaraṇau bhavataḥ tena vijñāyate yan mahat tad ekam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1070: aṇusamūhātiśayagrahaṇaṃ mahatpratyaya iti cet so .yam amahatsu aṇuṣu mahatpratyayo 'tasmiṃs tad iti pratyayo bhavatīti/ kiṃ cātaḥ? atasmiṃs tad iti pratyayasya pradhānāpekṣitvāt pradhānasiddhir iti bhavitavyaṃ mahaty eva mahatpratyayeneti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1071: aṇuḥ śabdo mahān iti ca vyavasāyāt pradhānasiddhir iti cet, na mandatīvratāgrahaṇam iyattānavadhāraṇāt --- yathā dravye aṇuḥ śabdo 'lpo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1072: manda ity etasya grahaṇaṃ mahan śabdaḥ paṭus tīvra ity etasya grahaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1073: kasmāt? iyattānavadhāraṇāt/ na hy ayaṃ mahān śabda iti vyavasyann iyān ayam ity avadhārayati, yathā badarāmalakabilvādīni/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1074: saṃyukte ime iti ca dvitvasamānāśrayaprāptigrahaṇam --- dvau samudāyāv āśrayaḥ saṃyogasyeti cet ko 'yaṃ samudāyaḥ? prāptir anekasyānekā vā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1075: prāptir ekasya samudāya iti cet prāpter agrahaṇaṃ prāptyāśritāyāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1076: saṃyukte ime vastunī iti nātra dve prāptī saṃyukte gṛhyete/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1077: anekasamūhaḥ samudāya iti cet, na dvitvena samānādhikaraṇasya grahaṇāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1078: dvāv imau saṃyuktāv arthāv iti grahaṇe sati nānekasamūhāśrayaḥ saṃyogo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1079: gṛhyate/ na ca dvayor aṇvor grahaṇam asti/ tasmān mahatī dvitvāśrayabhūte
GSP29nysvbh1u:1081: pratyāsattiḥ pratīghātāvasānā saṃyogo nārthāntaram iti cet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1082: nārthāntarahetutvāt saṃyogasya/ śabdarūpādispandānāṃ hetuḥ saṃyogaḥ/ na ca dravyayor guṇāntaropajananam antareṇa śabde rūpādiṣu spande ca kāraṇatvaṃ gṛhyate, tasmād guṇāntaram/ pratyayaviṣayaś cārthāntaraṃ tatpratiṣedho vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1083: kuṇḍalī gurur akuṇḍalaś chātra iti/ saṃyogabuddheś ca yady arthāntaraṃ na viṣayaḥ arthāntarapratiṣedhas tarhi viṣayaḥ, tatra pratiṣidhyamānavacanam --- saṃyukte dravye iti yad arthāntaram anyatra dṛṣṭam iha pratiṣidhyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:1084: tadvaktavyam iti/ dvayor mahator āśritasya grahaṇān nāṇvāśraya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1086: adhikaraṇavacanam/ aṇusamavasthānaṃ viṣaya iti cet prāptāprāptasāmarthyavacanam --- kim aprāpte aṇusamavasthāne tadāśrayo jātiviśeṣo gṛhyate atha prāpte iti/ aprāpte grahaṇam iti cet vyavahitasyāṇusamavasthānasyāpy upalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ, vyavahite
GSP29nysvbh1u:1087: 'ṇsamavasthāne tadāśrayo jātiviśeṣo gṛhyeta/ prāpte grahaṇam iti cet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1089: madhyaparabhāgayor aprāptāv anabhivyaktiḥ/ yāvat prāptaṃ bhavati tāvaty abhivyaktir iti cet, tāvato 'dhikaraṇatvam aṇusamavasthānasya/ yāvati prāpte jātiviśeṣe gṛhyate tāvad asyādhikaraṇam iti prāptaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1090: tatraikasamudāye pratīyamāne 'rthabhedaḥ/ evaṃ ca sati yo 'yam aṇusamudāyo vṛkṣa iti pratīyate tatra vṛkṣabahutvaṃ pratīyeta, yatra yatra hy
GSP29nysvbh1u:1091: aṇusamudāyasya bhāge vṛkṣatvaṃ gṛhyate sa sa vṛkṣa iti/ tasmāt samuditāṇusamavasthānasyārthāntarasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1095: apramāṇam iti ekadāpy arthasya na pratipādakam iti/ rodhād api nadī pūrṇā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1096: gṛhyate, tadā copariṣṭād vṛṣṭo deva iti mithyānumānam/ nīḍopaghātād api pipīlikāṇḍasañcāro bhavati, tadā ca bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭir iti mithyānumānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1097: iti/ puruṣo 'pi mayūravāśitam anukaroti tadā 'pi śabdasādṛśyān mithyānumānaṃ bhavati//37//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1099: nāyam anumānavyabhicāraḥ, ananumāne tu khalv ayam anumānābhimānaḥ/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1100: nāviśiṣṭo liṅgaṃ bhavitum arhati/ pūrvodakaviśiṣṭaṃ khalu varṣodakaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1101: śīgrataratvaṃ srātaso bahutaraphenaphalaparṇakāṣṭhādivahanaṃ copalabhamānaḥ pūrṇatvena nadyā upari vṛṣṭo deva ity anuminoti nodakavṛddhimātreṇa/ pipīlikāprāyasyāṇḍasañcāre bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭir ity anumīyate na kāsāñcid iti/ nedaṃ mayūravāśitaṃ tatsadṛśo 'yaṃ śabda iti viśeṣāparijñānān mithyānumānam iti/ yas tu sadṛśād viśiṣṭāc chabdād viśisṭamayūravāśitaṃ gṛhṇāti tasya viśiṣṭo 'rtho gṛhyamāṇo liṅgam, yathā sarpādīnām iti/ so 'yam anumātur aparādho nānumānasya, yo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1103: trikālaviṣayam anumānaṃ traikālyagrahaṇād ity uktam/ ata ca ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1105: vṛntāt pracyutasya phalasya bhūmau pratyāsīdato yadūrdhvaṃ sa patito 'dhvā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1106: tatsaṃyuktaḥ kālaḥ patitakālaḥ, yo 'dhastāt sa patitavyo 'dhvā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1107: tatsaṃyuktaḥ kālaḥ patitavyakālaḥ/ nedānīṃ tṛtīyo 'dhvā vidyate yatra patatīti vartamānaḥ kālo gṛhyeta/ tasmād vartamānaḥ kālo na vidyata iti//39//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1108: NyS_2,1.40: tayor apy abhāvo vartamānābhāve tadapekṣatvāt ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1109: nādhvavyaṅgyaḥ kālaḥ/ kiṃ tarhi? kriyāvyaṅgyaḥ patatīti/ yadā patanakriyā vyuparatā bhavati sa kālaḥ patitakālaḥ/ yadotpatsyate sa patitavyakālaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1110: yadā dravye vartamānā kriyā gṛhyate sa vartamānaḥ kālaḥ/ yadi cāyaṃ dravye
GSP29nysvbh1u:1111: vartamānaṃ patanaṃ na gṛhṇāti kasyoparamam utpatsyamānatāṃ vā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1112: pratipadyate/ patitaḥ kāla iti bhūtā kriyā, patitavyaḥ kāla iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:1113: cotpatsyamānā kriyā, ubhayoḥ kālayoḥ kriyāhīnaṃ dravyam; adhaḥ patatīti kriyāsambaddham/ so 'yaṃ kriyādravyayoḥ sambandhaṃ gṛhṇātīti vartamānaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1114: kālaḥ, tadāśrayau cetarau kālau tadahāve na syātām iti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1117: yady atītānāgatāv itaretarāpekṣau sidhyetāṃ pratipadyemahi vartamānavilopam/ nātītāpekṣānāgatasiddhiḥ nāpy anāgatāpekṣātītasiddhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1118: kayā yuktyā? kena kalpenātītaḥ katham atītāpekṣānāgatasiddhiḥ, kena ca kalpenānāgata iti naitac chakyaṃ nirvaktum avyākaraṇīyam etad vartamānalopa iti/ yac ca manyeta hrasvadīrghayoḥ sthalanimnayoś chāyātapayoś ca yathetaretarāpekṣayā siddhir evam atītānāgatayor iti, tan nopapadyate viśeṣahetvabhāvāt/ dṛṣṭāntavat pratidṛṣṭānto 'pi prasajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1119: yathā rūpasparśau gandharasau netaretarāpekṣau siddhyataḥ evam atītānāgatāv iti netaretarāpekṣā kasyacit siddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1121: yasmād ekābhāve ṇyatarābhāvād ubhayābhāvaḥ --- yady ekasyānyatarāpekṣā siddhir anyatarasyedānīṃ kim apekṣā? yady anyatarasyaikāpekṣā siddhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:1122: ekasyedānīṃ kim apekṣā? evam ekasyābhāve anyataran na sidhyatīty ubhayābhāvaḥ prasajyate//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1123: arthasadbhāvavyaṅgyaś cāyaṃ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ, vidyate dravyaṃ vidyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:1124: guṇaḥ vidyate karmeti/ yasya cāyaṃ nāsti, tasya ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1126: pratyakṣam indriyārthasannikarṣajam, na cāvidyamānam asad indriyeṇa
GSP29nysvbh1u:1127: sannikṛṣyate/ nacāyaṃ vidyamānaṃ sat kiñcid anujānāti/ pratyakṣanimittaṃ pratyakṣaviṣayaḥ pratyakṣajñānaṃ sarvaṃ nopapadyate, pratyakṣānupapattau tatpūrvakatvād anumānāgamayor anupapattiḥ/ sarvapramāṇavilope sarvagrahaṇaṃ na bhavatīti//42//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1128: ubhayathā ca vartamānaḥ kālo gṛhyate kvacid arthasadbhāvavyaṅgyaḥ yathāsti dravyam iti/ kvacit kriyāsantānavyaṅgyaḥ yathā pacati chinattīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1129: nānāvidhā caikārthā kriyā kriyāsantānaḥ kriyābhyāsaś ca/ nānāvidhā caikārthā kriyā pacatīti sthālyadhiśrayaṇam udakāsecanaṃ taṇḍulāvapanam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1132: chinattīti kriyābhyāsa udyamyodyamya paraśuṃ dāruṇi nipātayan chinattīty
GSP29nysvbh1u:1134: yac cedaṃ pacyamānaṃ chidyamānaṃ ca tat kriyamāṇam, tasmin kriyamāṇe ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1137: prayojanāvasānaḥ kriyāsantānoparamaḥ atītaḥ kālaḥ apākṣīd iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1138: % kriyāsantānoparamaḥ atītaḥ kālaḥ apākṛīd iti/] p.526
GSP29nysvbh1u:1139: ārabdhakriyāsantāno vartamānaḥ kālaḥ pacatīti/ tatra yā uparatā sā kṛtatā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1140: yā cikīrṣitā sā kartavyatā/ yā vidyamānā sā kriyamāṇatā/ tad evaṃ kriyāsantānasthas traikālyasamāhāraḥ pacati pacyata iti vartamānagrahaṇena
GSP29nysvbh1u:1141: gṛhyate, kriyāsantānasya hy atrāvicchedo 'bhidhīyate nārambho noparama iti/ so 'yam ubhayathā vartamāno gṛhyate apavṛkto vyapavṛktaś cātītānāgatābhyām/ sthitivyaṅgyaḥ --- vidyate dravyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1143: anyaś ca pratyāsattiprabhṛter arthasya vivakṣāyāṃ tadabhidhāyī bahuprakāro lokeṣu utprekṣitavyaḥ/ tasmād asti vartamānaḥ kāla iti//43//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1145: atyantasādharmyād upamānaṃ na sidhyati/ na caivaṃ bhavati yathā gaur evaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1148: prāyaḥsādharmyād upamānaṃ na sidhyati, na hi bhavati yathānaḍvān evaṃ mahiṣa iti/ ekadeśasādharmyād upamānaṃ na sidhyati, na hi sarveṇa sarvam upamīyata iti//44//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1150: na sādharmyasya kṛtsnaprāyālpabhāvam āśrityopamānaṃ pravartate/ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1151: prasiddhasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanabhāvam āśritya pravartate/ yatra caitad asti na tatropamānaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ śakyam/ tasmād yathoktadoṣo nopapadyata
GSP29nysvbh1u:1154: yathā dhūmena pratyakṣeṇāpratyakṣasya vahner grahaṇam anumānam, evaṃ gavā pratyakṣeṇāpratyakṣasya gavayasya grahaṇam iti nedam anumānād
GSP29nysvbh1u:1156: NyS_2,1.47: nāpratyakṣe gavaye pramāṇārtham upamānasya paśyāmaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1157: yadā hy ayam upayuktopamāno godarśī gavayasamānam arthaṃ paśyati tadāyaṃ gavaya ity asya saṃjñāśabdasya vyavasthāṃ pratipadyate na caivam anumānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1158: iti/ parārthaṃ copamānam --- yasya hy upamānam aprasiddhaṃ tadarthaṃ prasiddhobhayena kriyata iti parārtham upamānam iti cet; na,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1159: svayam adhyavasāyāt --- bhavati ca bhoḥ svayam adhyavasāyaḥ yathā gaur evaṃ gavaya iti/ nādhyavasāyaḥ pratiṣidhyate upamānaṃ tu tan na bhavati
GSP29nysvbh1u:1161: prasiddhaṃ taṃ prati sādhyasādhanabhāavo vidyata iti//47//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1164: tatheti samānadharmopasaṃhārād upamānaṃ sidhyati nānumānam/ ayaṃ cānayor viśeṣa iti//48//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1166: śabdo 'numānam, na pramāṇāntaram/ kasmāt? śabdārthasyānumeyatvāt/ katham
GSP29nysvbh1u:1168: liṅgena paścān mīyata iti anumānam/ evaṃ mitena śabdena paścān mīyate artho 'nupalabhyamāna ity anumānaṃ śabdaḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1171: pramāṇāntarabhāve dvipravṛttir upalabdhiḥ, anyathā hy upalabdhir anumāne anyathopamāne tad vyākhyātam/ śabdānumānayos tūpalabdhir advipravṛttiḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1172: yathānumāne tathā śabde 'pi/ viśeṣābhāvād anumānaṃ śabda iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1174: śabdo 'numānam iti vartate/ sambaddhayoś ca śabdārthayoḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1175: sambandhaprasiddhau śabdopalabdher arthagrahaṇaṃ yathā sambaddhayor liṅgaliṅinoḥ sambandhapratītau liṅgopalabdhau liṅgigrahaṇam iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1176: yat tāvad arthasyānumeyatvād iti tan na---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1178: svargaḥ apsarasaḥ uttarāḥ kuravaḥ sapta dvīpāḥ samudro lokasanniveśa ity evamāder apratyakṣasyārthasya ca śabdamātrāt pratyayaḥ, kiṃ tarhi? āptair ayam uktāḥ śabda ity ataḥ sampratyayaḥ viparyayeṇa sampratyayābhāvāt; na tv evam anumānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1179: yat punar upalabdher advipravṛttitvād iti, ayam eva śabdānumānayor
GSP29nysvbh1u:1180: upalabdheḥ pravṛttibhedaḥ; tatra viśeṣe saty ahetur viśeṣābhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1181: yat punar idaṃ sambandhāc ceti, asti ca śabdārthayoḥ sambandho 'nujñātaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1182: asti ca pratiṣiddhaḥ/ asyedam iti ṣaṣṭhīviśiṣṭasya vākyasyārthaviśeṣo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1183: 'nujñātaḥ, prāptilakṣaṇas tu śabdārthayoḥ sambandhaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1185: atīndriyatvāt/ yenendriyeṇa gṛhyate śabdas tasya viṣayabhāvam ativṛtto
GSP29nysvbh1u:1186: 'rtho na gṛhyate/ asti cātīndriyaviṣayabhūto 'py arthaḥ samānena cendriyeṇa gṛhyamāṇayoḥ prāptir gṛhyata iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1188: prāptilakṣaṇe ca gṛhyamāṇe sambandhe śabdārthayoḥ śabdāntike vārthaḥ syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1189: arthāntike vā śabdaḥ syāt, ubhayaṃ vobhayatra/ atha khalv ubhayam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1190: sthānakaraṇābhāvād iti cārthaḥ/ na cāyam anumānato 'py upalabhyate śabdāntike 'rtha iti/ etasmin pakṣe 'py āsyasthānakaraṇoccāraṇīyaḥ śabdas tadantike 'rtha ity annāgnyasiśabdoccāraṇe pūraṇapāhapāṭanāni gṛhyeran, na ca gṛhyante; agrahaṇāt nānumeyaḥ prāptilakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1193: ubhayapratiṣedhāc ca nobhayam/ tasmān na śabdenārthaḥ prāpta iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1195: śabdād arthapratyayasya vyavasthādarśanād anumīyata asti śabdārthasambandho vyavasthākāraṇam/ asambandhe hi śabdamātrād arthamātre
GSP29nysvbh1u:1199: na sambandhakāritaṃ śabdārthavyavasthānam/ kiṃ tarhi? samayakāritam/ yat tad avocāma asyedam iti ṣaṣṭhīviśiṣṭasya vākyasyārthaviśeṣo 'nujñātaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1200: śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti samayaṃ tam avocāma iti/ kaḥ punar ayaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1201: samayaḥ? asya śabdasyedam arthajātam abhidheyam ity abhidhānābhidheyaniyamaniyogaḥ/ tasminn upayukte śabdād arthasampratyayo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1202: bhavati/ viparyaye hi śabdaśravaṇa 'pi pratyayābhāvaḥ/ sambandhavādino 'pi
GSP29nysvbh1u:1204: prayujyamānagrahaṇāc ca samayopayogo laukikānām/ samayaparipālanārthaṃ cedaṃ padalakṣaṇāyā vācānvākhyānaṃ vyākaraṇam vākyalakṣaṇāyā vāco
GSP29nysvbh1u:1207: padasamūho vākyam arthaparisamāprāv iti/ tad evaṃ prāptilakṣaṇasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1210: sāmāyikaḥ śabdād arthasampratyayo na svābhāvikaḥ/ ṛṣyāryamlecchānāṃ yathākāmaṃ śabdaviniyogo 'rthapratyāyanāya pravartate/ svābhāvike hi śabdasyārthapratyāyakatve yathākāmaṃ na syād yathā taijasasya prakāśasya rūpapratyayahetutvaṃ na jātiviśeṣe vyabhicaratīti//56//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1213: tasyeti śabdaviśeṣam evādhikurute bhagavān ṛṣiḥ/ śabdasya pramāṇatvaṃ na
GSP29nysvbh1u:1215: yajeta'' iti; neṣṭau saṃsthitāyāṃ putrajanma dṛśyate/ dṛṣṭārthasya vākyasyānṛtatvād adṛṣṭārtham api vākyam ``agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma''
GSP29nysvbh1u:1217: vihitavyāghātadoṣāc ca, havane ``udite hotavyam anudite hotavyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1218: samayādhyuṣite hotavyam'' iti vidhāya vihitaṃ vyāhanti---``śyāvo 'syāhutim
GSP29nysvbh1u:1219: abhyavaharati ya udite juhoti, śabalo 'syāhutim abhyavaharati yo 'nudite
GSP29nysvbh1u:1220: juhoti śyāvaśabalau vāsyāhutim abhyavaharato yaḥ samayādhyuṣite juhoti''/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1222: punaruktadoṣāc ca, abhyāse deśyamāne ``triḥ prathamām anvāha trir
GSP29nysvbh1u:1223: uttamām'' iti punaruktadoṣo bhavati/ punaruktaṃ ca pramattavākyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1226: nānṛtadoṣaḥ putrakāmeṣṭiau/ kasmāt? karmakartṛsādhanavaiguṇyāt/ iṣṭyā pitarau saṃyujyamānau putraṃ janayata iti/ iṣṭeḥ karaṇaṃ sādhanam, pitarau
GSP29nysvbh1u:1227: kartārau, saṃyogaḥ karma, trayāṇāṃ guṇayogāt putrajanma, vaiguṇyād
GSP29nysvbh1u:1228: viparyayaḥ/ iṣṭyāśrayaṃ tāvad karmavaiguṇyaṃ samīhābhreṣaḥ, kartṛvaiguṇyam avidvān prayoktā kapūyācaraṇaś ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1229: sādhanavaiguṇyaṃ havir asaṃkṛtam upahatam iti, mantrā nyūnādhikāḥ svaravarṇahīnā iti, dakṣiṇā durāgatā hīnā ninditā ceti/ athopajanāśrayaṃ karmavaiguṇyaṃ mithyāsamprayogaḥ, kartṛvaiguṇyaṃ yonivyāpado bījopaghātaś
GSP29nysvbh1u:1230: ceti/ sādhanavaiguṇyam iṣṭāv abhihitam/ loke ca ``agnikāmo dāruṇī
GSP29nysvbh1u:1231: mathnīyāt'' iti vidhivākyam, tatra karmavaiguṇyaṃ mithyābhimanthanam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1232: kartṛvaiguṇyaṃ prajñāprayatnataḥ pramādaḥ, sādhanavaiguṇyam ārdraṃ suṣiraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1233: dāviti, tatra phalaṃ na niṣpadyata iti nānṛtadoṣaḥ, guṇayogena
GSP29nysvbh1u:1234: phalaniṣpattidarśanāt/ na cedaṃ laukikād bhidyate ``putrakāmaḥ putreṣṭyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1237: na vyāghāto havana ity anuvartate/ yo 'bhyupagataṃ havanakālaṃ bhinatti tato 'nyatra juhoti tatrāyam abhyupagatakālabhede doṣa ucyate ``śyāvo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1238: 'syāhutim abhyavaharati ya udite juhoti''/ tad idaṃ vidhibhreṣe
GSP29nysvbh1u:1242: anarthako 'bhyāsaḥ punaruktam, arthavān abhyāso 'nuvādaḥ/ yo 'yam abhyāsaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1243: ``triḥ prathamām anvāha trir uttamām'' ity anuvāda upapadyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:1244: arthavattvāt/ trirvacanena hi prathamottamayoḥ pañcadaśatvaṃ sāmidhenīnāṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1246: tathā ca mantrābhivādaḥ ``idam ahaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ pañcadaśāvareṇa
GSP29nysvbh1u:1247: vāgvajreṇāvabodhe yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma'' iti pañcadaśa sāmidhenīr vajramantro 'bhivadati tad abhyāsam antareṇa na syād iti//60//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1255: yad vākyaṃ vidhāyakaṃ codakaṃ sa vidhiḥ/ vidhis tu niyogo 'nujñā vā/ yathā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1257: NyS_2,1.64: stutir nindā parakṛtiḥ purākalpa ity arthavādaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1258: vidheḥ phalavādalakṣaṇā yā praśaṃsā sā stutiḥ sampratyayārthā, stūyamānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1259: śraddadhīteti, pravartikā ca, phalaśravaṇāt pravartate---``sarvajitā vai devāḥ sarvam ajayan sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam evaitenāptenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati'' iti evamādi/ aniṣṭaphalavādo nindā varjanārthā ninditaṃ na samācared iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:1260: sa eṣa vāva prathamo yajño yajñānāṃ yaj jotiṣṭomo ya etenādiṣṭvānyana yajate garttapatyam eva taj jīyate vā pramīyate vā ity evamādiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1261: anyakartṛkasya vyāhatasya vidher vādaḥ parakṛtiḥ ``hutvā vapām evāgre 'bhighārayanti atha pṛṣad ājyaṃ taduha carakādhvaryavaḥ pṛṣadājyam evāgre
GSP29nysvbh1u:1262: 'bhidhārayanti agneḥ prāṇāḥ pṛṣadājyastomam ity evam abhidadhati'' ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:1264: aitihyasamācarito vidhiḥ purākalpa iti/ ``tasmād vā etena brāhmaṇā bahiṣ pavamānaṃ sāmastomama stoṣan yone yajñaṃ pratanavāmahe ity evamādi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1265: kathaṃ purākṛtipurākalpāv arthavādāv iti? stutinindāvākyenābhisambandhād vidhyāśrayasya kasyacid arthasya dyotanād arthavāda iti//64//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1267: vidhyanuvacanaṃ cānuvādo vihitānuvacanaṃ ca/ pūrvaḥ śabdānuvādo 'paro
GSP29nysvbh1u:1268: 'rthānuvādaḥ/ yathā punaruktaṃ dvividham evam anuvādo 'pi/ kimarthaṃ punar vihitam anūdyate? adhikārārtham; vihitam adhikṛtya stutir bodhyate nindā vā, vidhiśeṣo vābhidhīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1269: vihitānantarārtho 'pi cānuvādā bhavati/ evam anyad apy utprekṣaṇīyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1270: loke 'pi ca vidhir arthavādo 'nuvāda iti ca trividhaṃ vākyam/ odanaṃ paced iti vidhivākyam/ arthavādavākyam---āyurvarco balaṃ sukhaṃ pratibhānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1271: cānne pratiṣṭhitam/ anuvādaḥ---pacatu pacatu bhavān ity abhyāsaḥ, kṣipraṃ pacyatām iti vā; aṅga pacyatām ity adhyeṣaṇārtham, pacyatām eveti cāvadhāraṇārtham/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1272: yathā laukike vākye vibhāgenārthagrahaṇāt pramāṇatvam evam vedavākyānām api vibhāgenārthagrahaṇāt pramāṇatvaṃ bhavitum arhatīti//65//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1274: punaruktam asādhu sādhur anuvāda iti ayaṃ viśeṣo nopapadyate/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1275: ubhayatra hi pratītārthaḥ śabdo 'bhyasyate caritārthasya śabdasyābhyāsād ubhayam asādhv
GSP29nysvbh1u:1278: arthavān abhyāso 'nuvādaḥ, śīghrataragamanopadeśavat/ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ gamyatām iti kriyātiśayo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1280: udāharaṇārthaṃ cedam/ evam anyo 'py abhyāsaḥ pacati pacatīti
GSP29nysvbh1u:1281: kriyānuparamaḥ/ grāmo grāmo ramanīya iti vyāptiḥ/ pari pari trigartebhyo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1282: vṛṣṭo deva iti parivarjanam/ adhy adhi kuḍyaṃ niṣaṇṇam iti sāmīpyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1283: tiktaṃ tiktam iti prakāraḥ/ evam anuvādasya stutinindāśeṣavidhiṣv
GSP29nysvbh1u:1285: kiṃ punaḥ pratiṣedhahetūddhārād eva śabdasya pramāṇatvaṃ sidhyati? na,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1288: kiṃ punar āyurvedasya prāmāṇyam? yat tad āyurvedenopadiśyate idaṃ kṛtveṣṭam adhigacchati, idaṃ varjayitvāniṣṭaṃ jahāti, tasyānuṣṭhīyamānasya tathābhāvaḥ satyārthatāviparyayaḥ/ mantrapadānāṃ ca viṣayabhūtāśanipratiṣedhārthānāṃ prayoge 'rthasya tathābhāva
GSP29nysvbh1u:1289: etatprāmāṇyam/ kiṃkṛtam etat? āptaprāmāṇyakṛtam/ kiṃ punar āptānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1292: āptāḥ khalu sākṣātkṛtadharmāṇaḥ idaṃ hātavyam idam asya hānihetur idam asyādhigantavyam idam asyādhigamahetuḥ iti bhūtāny anukampante/ teṣāṃ khalu vai prāṇabhṛtāṃ svayam anavabudhyamānānāṃ nānyad upadeśād avabodhakāraṇam asti/%vai prāṇabhṛtāṃ svayam anavabudhyamānānāṃ nānyad upadeśād avabodhakāraṇam asti/] p.567
GSP29nysvbh1u:1293: na cānavabodhe samīhā varjanaṃ vā, na vākṛtvā svastibhāvaḥ, nāpy asyānya upakārako 'py asti/ hanta vayam ebhyo yathādarśanaṃ yathābhūtam upadiśyāmaḥ ta ime śrutvā pratipadyamānā heyaṃ hāsyanty adhigantavyam evādhigamiṣyantīti/ evam āptopadeśaḥ etena trividhenāptaprāmāṇyena parigṛhīto 'nuṣṭhīyamāno 'rthasya sādhako bhavati; evam āptopadeśaḥ pramāṇam/ evam āptāḥ pramāṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1294: dṛṣṭārthenāptopadeśenāyurvedenādṛṣṭārtho vedabhāgo 'numātavyaḥ pramāṇam ity āptaprāmāṇyasya hetoḥ samānatvād iti/ asyāpi caikadeśo ``grāmakāmo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1295: yajeta'' ity evamādir dṛṣṭārthaḥ, tenānumātavyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1296: loke ca bhūyān upadeśāśrayo vyavahāraḥ/ laukikasyāpy upadeṣṭur upadeṣṭavyārthajñānena parānujighṛkṣayā yathābhūtārthacikhyāpayiṣayā ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:1300: draṣṭṛpravaktṛsāmānyāc cānumānam/ ya evāptā vedārthānāṃ draṣṭāraḥ pravaktāraś ca ta evāyurvedaprabhṛtīnām ity āyurvedaprāmāṇyavad vedaprāmāṇyam anumātavyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1301: nityatvād vedavākyānāṃ pramāṇatve tatprāmāṇyam āptaprāmāṇyād ity ayuktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1302: śabdasya vācakatvād arthapratipattau pramāṇatvaṃ na nityatvād/ nityatve hi sarvasya sarveṇa vacanāc chabdārthavyavasthānupapattiḥ/ nānityatve vācakatvam iti ced na, laukikeṣv adarśanāt/ te 'pi nityā iti cet na,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1303: anāptopadeśād arthavisaṃvādo 'nupapannaḥ/ nityatvād dhi śabdaḥ pramāṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1306: anityaḥ sa iti cet? aviśeṣavacanam/ anāptopadeśo laukiko na nitya iti kāraṇaṃ vācyam iti/ yathāyogaṃ cārthasya pratyāyanād nāmadheyaśabdānāṃ loke prāmāṇyaṃ nityatvāt prāmāṇyānupapattiḥ/ yatrārthe nāmadheyaśabdo niyujyate loke tasya niyogasāmarthyāt pratyāyako bhavati, na nityatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1309: āptaprāmāṇyāc ca prāmāṇyam; laukikeṣu śabdeṣu caitat samānam iti//68//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1311: atha dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam ayathārthaḥ pramāṇoddeśa iti matvāha---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1313: na catvāry eva pramāṇāni/ kiṃ tarhi? aitihyam arthāpattiḥ sambhavo 'bhāva
GSP29nysvbh1u:1316: tāni kasmān noktāni/ itihocur ity anirdiṣṭapravaktṛkam pravādapāramparyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1317: aitihyam/ arthād āpattir arthāpattiḥ/ āpattiḥ prāptiḥ prasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1318: yatrābhidhīyamāne 'rthe yo 'nyo 'rthaḥ prasajyate so 'rthāpattiḥ/ yathā megheṣv asatsu vṛṣṭir na bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1320: kim atra prasajyate? satsu bhavatīti/ sambhavo nāmāvinābhāvino 'rthasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1321: sattāgrahaṇād anyasya sattāgrahaṇam/ yathā droṇasya sattāgrahaṇād
GSP29nysvbh1u:1322: āḍhakasya sattāgrahaṇam, āḍakasya sattāgrahaṇāt prasthasyeti/ abhāvo virodhy abhūtaṃ bhūtasya, avidyamānaṃ varṣakarma vidyamānasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1323: vāyvabhrasaṃyogasya pratipādakam, vidhārake hi vāyvabhrasaṃyoge gurutvād apāṃ patanakarma na bhavatīti//1//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1324: satyam etāni pramāṇāni, na tu pramāṇāntarāṇi/ pramāṇāntaraṃ ca manyamānena
GSP29nysvbh1u:1328: anupapannaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/ katham? ``āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ'' iti/ na ca śabdalakṣaṇam aitihyād vyāvartate; so 'yaṃ bhedaḥ sāmānyāt saṃgṛhyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1331: tathā cārthāpattisambhavābhāvaḥ/ vākyārthasampratyayenānabhihitasyārthasya pratyanīkabhāvād grahaṇam arthāpattir anumānam eva/ avinābhāvavṛttyā ca sambaddhayoḥ samudāyasamudāyinoḥ samudāyenetarasya grahaṇaṃ sambhavaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1332: % vṛttyā ca sambaddhayoḥ samudāyasamudāyinoḥ samudāyenetarasya grahaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1334: tad apy anumānam eva/ asmin satīdaṃ nopapadyata iti virodhitve prasiddhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:1335: kāryānupapattyā kāraṇasya pratibandhakam anumīyate/ so 'yaṃ yathārtha eva pramāṇoddeśa
GSP29nysvbh1u:1336: satyam etāni pramāṇāni na tu pramāṇāntarāṇīty uktam, atrārthāpatteḥ pramāṇabhāvābhyanujñā nopapadyate/ tathā hīyam---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1338: asatsu megheṣu vṛṣṭir na bhavatīti satsu bhavatīty etad arthād āpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1339: satsv api caikadā na bhavati/ seyam arthāpattir apramāṇam iti//3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1342: asati kāraṇe kāryaṃ notpadyata iti vākyāt pratyanīkabhūto 'rthaḥ sati kāraṇe kāryam utpadyata ity arthād āpadyate/ abhāvasya hi bhāvaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1343: pratyanīka iti/ so 'yaṃ kāryotpādaḥ sati kāraṇe 'rthād āpadyamāno na kāraṇasya sattāṃ vyabhicarati/ na khalv asati kāraṇe kāryam utpadyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:1345: yat tu sati kāraṇe nimittapratibandāt kāryaṃ notpadyata iti kāraṇadharmo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1346: 'sau na tv arthāpatteḥ prameyam/ kiṃ tarhy asyāḥ prameyam? sati kāraṇe kāryam utpadyata iti yo 'sau kāryotpādaḥ kāraṇasya sattāṃ na vyabhicatati tad asyāḥ prameyam/ evaṃ tu saty anarthāpattāv arthāpattyabhimānaṃ kṛtvā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1348: % saty anarthāpattāv arthāpattyabhimānaṃ kṛtvā pratiṣedha ucyata iti/]
GSP29nysvbh1u:1350: arthāpattir na pramāṇam anaikāntikatvād iti vākyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1351: tenānenārthāpatteḥ pramāṇatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate na sadbhāvaḥ, evam anaikāntiko bhavati/ anaikāntikatvād apramāṇenānena na kaścid arthaḥ pratiṣidhyata iti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1352: atha manyase niyataviṣayeṣv artheṣu svaviṣaye vyabhicāro bhavati, na ca pratiṣedhasya sadbhāvo viṣayaḥ? evaṃ tarhi---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1354: arthāpatter api kāryotpādena kāraṇasattāyā avyabhicāro viṣayaḥ/ na ca kāraṇadharmo nimittapratibandhāt kāryānutpādakatvam iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1355: abhāvasya tarhi pramāṇabhāvābhyanujñā nopapadyate/ katham iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1357: abhāvasya bhūyasi prameye lokasiddhe vaiyātyād ucyate nābhāvaprāmāṇyaṃ prameyāsiddher iti//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1360: tasyābhāvasya sidhyati prameyam/ katham? lakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu anupādeyeṣv
GSP29nysvbh1u:1361: upādeyānām alakṣitānām alakṣaṇalakṣitatvād lakṣaṇābhāvena lakṣitatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1362: ubhayasannidhāv alakṣitāni vāsāṃsy ānayeti prayukto yeṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣaṇāni na bhavanti tāni lakṣaṇābhāvena pratipadyate, pratipadya cānayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1364: NyS_2,2.9: asaty arthe nābhāva iti cen nānyalakṣaṇopapatteḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1365: yatra bhūtvā kiñcin na bhavati tatra tasyābhāva upapadyate/ na cālakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣitāni bhūtvā na bhavanti, tasmāt teṣu lakṣaṇābhāvo 'nupapanna
GSP29nysvbh1u:1368: nānyalakṣaṇopapatteḥ---yathāyam anyeṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣaṇānām upapattiṃ paśyati naivam alakṣiteṣu/ so 'yaṃ lakṣaṇābhāvaṃ paśyann abhāvenārthaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1371: teṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣiteṣu siddhir vidhyamānatā yeṣāṃ bhavati na teṣām abhāvo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1372: lakṣaṇānām/ yāni ca lakṣiteṣu vidyante lakṣaṇāni teṣām alakṣiteṣv abhāva ity ahetuḥ/ yāni khalu bhavanti teṣām abhāvo vyāhata iti//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1374: na brūmo yāni lakṣaṇāni bhavanti teṣām abhāva iti, kin tu keṣucil
GSP29nysvbh1u:1375: lakṣaṇāny avasthitāni anavasthitāni keṣucit, apekṣamāṇo yeṣu lakṣaṇānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1376: bhāvaṃ na paśyati tāni lakṣaṇābhāvena pratipadyata iti//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1378: abhāvadvaitaṃ khalu bhavati prāk cotpatter avidyamānatā, utpannasya cātmano hānād avidyamānatā/ tatrālakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu prāg utpatter avidyamānatālakṣaṇo lakṣaṇānām abhāvo netara iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1379: ``āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ'' iti pramāṇabhāve viśeṣaṇaṃ bruvatā nānāprakāraḥ śabda iti jñāpyate/ tasmin sāmanyena vicāraḥ---kiṃ nityo 'thānitya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1380: vimarśahetvanuyoge ca vipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ/ ākāśaguṇaḥ śabdao vibhur
GSP29nysvbh1u:1382: gandhādisahavṛttir dravyeṣu sanniviṣṭo gandhādivad avasthito 'bhivyaktidharmaka ity apare/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1383: ākāśaguṇaḥ śabda utpattinirodhadharmako buddhivad ity apare/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1385: anye/ ataḥ saṃśayaḥ kim atra tattvam iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1387: NyS_2,2.13: ādhimattvād aindriyakatvāt kṛtakavad upacārāc ca ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1388: ādir yoniḥ kāraṇam ādīyate asmād iti/ kāraṇavad anityaṃ dṛṣṭam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1389: saṃyogavibhāgajaś ca śabdaḥ kāraṇavattvād anitya iti/ kā punar iyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1390: arthadeśanā kāraṇavattvād iti? utpattidharmakatvāt; anityaḥ śabda iti---bhūtvā na bhavati vināśadharmaka iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1391: sāṃśayikam etat---kim utpattikāraṇaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau śabdasya, āhosvid abhivyaktikāraṇam ity ata āha---aindriyakatvāt/ indriyapratyāsattigrāhya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1393: kim ayaṃ vyañjakena samānadeśo 'bhivyajyate rūpādivat atha saṃyogajāc
GSP29nysvbh1u:1394: chabdāc chabdasantāne sati śrotrapratyāsanno gṛhyata iti? saṃyoganivṛttau śabdagrahaṇāt na vyañjakena samānadeśasya grahaṇam---dāruvraścane
GSP29nysvbh1u:1395: dāruparaśusaṃyoganivṛttau dūrasthena śabdo gṛhyate/ na ca vyañjakābhāve
GSP29nysvbh1u:1398: tasmān na vyañjakaḥ saṃyogaḥ, utpādake tu saṃyoge saṃyogajāc chabdāc chabdasantāne sati śrotrapratyāsannasya grahaṇam iti yuktaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1400: itaś ca śabda utpadyate nābhivyajyate---kṛtakavad upacārāt/ tīvraṃ mandam iti kṛtakam upacaryate, tīvraṃ sukhaṃ mandaṃ sukhaṃ tīvraṃ duḥkhaṃ mandaṃ duḥkham iti, upacaryate ca tīvraḥ śabdo mandaḥ śabda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1401: vyañjakasya tathābhāvād grahaṇasya tīvramandatā rūpavad iti ced na abhibhavopapatteḥ---saṃyogasya vyañjakasya tīvramandatayā śabdagrahaṇasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1402: tīvramandatā bhavati na tu śabdo bhidyate yathā prakāśasya tīvramandatayā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1403: rūpagrahaṇasyeti, tac ca na, evam abhibhavopapatteḥ---tīvro bherīśabdo mandaṃ tantrīśabdam abhibhavati na mandaḥ/ na ca śabdagrahaṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1404: abhibhāvakam, śabdaś ca na bhidyate, śabde tu bhidyamāne yukto 'bhibhavaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1407: prāptyabhāvāt---vyañjakena samānadeśe 'bhivyajyate śabda ity etasmin pakṣe nopapadyate 'bhibhavaḥ/ na hi bherīśabdena tantrīsvanaḥ prāpta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1408: aprāpte 'bhibhava iti cet śabdamātrābhibhavaprasaṅgaḥ---atha manyeta asatyām prāptāv abhibhavo bhavatīti, evaṃ sati yathā bherīśabdaḥ kañcit tantrīsvanam abhibhavati evam antikasthopādānam iva davīyaḥstho pādānān api tantrīsvanān abhibhaved aprāpter aviśeṣāt/ tatra kvacid eva bheryāṃ praṇāditāyāṃ sarvalokeṣu samānakālās tantrīsvanā na śrūyeran iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1409: nānābhūteṣu śabdasantāneṣu satsu śrotrapratyāsattibhāvena kasyacic chabdasya tīvreṇa mandasyābhibhavo yukta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1411: kaḥ punar ayam abhibhavo nāma? grāhyasamānajātīyagrahaṇakṛtam agrahaṇam abhibhavaḥ; yatholkāprakāśasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1412: NyS_2,2.14: na ghaṭābhāvasāmānyanityatvān nityeṣv apy anityavad upacārāc
GSP29nysvbh1u:1414: na khalu ādimattvād anityaḥ śabdaḥ/ kasmāt? vyabhicārāt/ ādimataḥ khalu ghaṭābhāvasya dṛṣṭaṃ nityatvam/ katham ādimān? kāraṇavibhāgebhyo hi ghaṭo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1415: na bhavati/ katham asya nityatvam? yo 'sau kāraṇavibhāgebhyo na bhavati na tasyābhāvo bhāvena kadācin nivartyata iti/ yad apy aindriyakatvāt, tad api vyabhicarati, aindriyakaṃ ca sāmānyaṃ nityaṃ ceti/ yad api kṛtakavad
GSP29nysvbh1u:1416: upacārād iti, etad api vyabhicarati; nityeṣv anityavad upacāro
GSP29nysvbh1u:1417: dṛṣṭaḥ---tathā hi bhavati vṛkṣasya pradeśaḥ kambalasya pradeśaḥ evam ākāśasya pradeśaḥ ātmanaḥ pradeśa iti bhavatīti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1419: nityam ity atra kiṃ tāvat tattvam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1420: arthāntarasyānutpattidharmakasyātmahānānupapattir nityatvam, tac cābhāve nopapadyate/ bhāktaṃ tu bhavati yat tatrātmānam ahāsīd yad bhūtvā na
GSP29nysvbh1u:1421: bhavati na jātu tat punar bhavati, tatra nitya iva nityo ghaṭābhāva ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:1422: ayaṃ padārtha iti/ tatra yathājātīyakaḥ śabdo na tathājātīyakaṃ kāryaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1424: yad api sāmānyanityatvād itīndriyapratyāsattigrāhyam aindriyakam iti---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1427: chabdasyānityatvam/ kiṃ tarhi indriyapratyāsattigrāhyatvāt santānānumānaṃ tenānityatvam iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:1428: yad api nityeṣv apy anityavad upacārād iti/ na---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1430: nityeṣv apy avyabhicāra iti/ evam ākāśapradeśaḥ ātmapradeśa iti nātrākāśātmanoḥ kāraṇadravyam abhidhīyate yathā kṛtakasya/ kathaṃ hy avidyamānam abhidhīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1431: avidyamānatā ca pramāṇato 'nupalabdheḥ/ kiṃ tarhi tatrābhidhīyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1433: vyāpnoti avyāpya vartata iti, tad asy kṛtakena dravyeṇa sāmānyam/ na hy āmalakayoḥ saṃyoga āśrayaṃ vyāpnoti/ sāmānyakṛtā ca bhaktir ākāśasya pradeśa iti/ anenātmapradeśo vyākhyātaḥ/ saṃyogavac ca śabdabuddhyādīnām
GSP29nysvbh1u:1434: avyāpyavṛttitvam iti/ parīkṣitā ca tīvramandatā śabdatattvaṃ na bhaktikṛteti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1435: kasmāt punaḥ sūtrakārasyāsminn arthe sūtraṃ na śrūyata iti? śīlam idaṃ bhavgavataḥ sūtrakārasya bahuṣv adhikaraṇeṣu dvau pakṣau na vyavasthāpayati tatra śāstrasiddhāntāt tattvāvadhāraṇaṃ pratipattum
GSP29nysvbh1u:1436: arhatīti manyate/ śāstrasiddhāntas tu nyāyasamākhyātam anumataṃ bahuśākham anumānam iti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1437: athāpi khalv idam asti idaṃ nāstīti kuta etat pratipattavyam iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1438: pramāṇata upalabdher anupalabdheś ceti/ avidyamānas tarhi śabdaḥ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1439: NyS_2,2.18: prāg uccāraṇād anupalabdher āvaraṇādyanupalabdheś ca ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1440: prāg uccāraṇān nāsti śabdaḥ/ kasmāt? anupalabdheḥ/ ``sato nupalabdhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:1441: āvaraṇādibhyaḥ'' etan nopapadyate/ kasmāt? āvaraṇādīnām anupalabdhikāraṇānām agrahaṇāt---anenāvṛtaḥ śabdo nopalabhyata asannikṛṣṭaś cendriyavyavadhānād ity evamādi anupalabdhikāraṇaṃ na gṛhyata iti so 'yam anuccārito nāstīti/ uccāraṇam asya vyañjakaṃ tadabhāvād prāg uccāraṇād anupalabdhir iti/ kim idam uccāraṇaṃ nāmeti? vivakṣājanitena prayatnena koṣṭhyasya vāyoḥ preritasya kaṇṭhatālvādipratighātaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1442: % prayatnena koṣṭhyasya vāyoḥ preritasya kaṇṭhatālvādipratighātaḥ,] p.615
GSP29nysvbh1u:1443: yathāsthānaṃ pratighātād varṇābhivyaktir iti/ saṃyogaviśeṣo vai pratighātaḥ, pratiṣiddhaṃ ca saṃyogasya vyañjakatvam, tasmān na vyañjakābhāvād agrahaṇam, api tv abhāvād eveti/ so 'yam uccāryamāṇaḥ śrūyate śrūyamāṇaś cābhūtvā bhavatīti anumīyate/ ūrdhvaṃ coccāraṇān na
GSP29nysvbh1u:1444: śrūyate sa bhūtvā na bhavati abhāvān na śrūyata iti/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1445: āvaraṇādyanupalabdher ity uktam/ tasmād utpattitirobhāvadharmakaḥ śabda
GSP29nysvbh1u:1446: evaṃ ca sati tattvaṃ pāṃśubhir ivāvakirann idam āha---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1448: yady anupalambhād āvaraṇaṃ nāsti, āvaraṇānupalabdhir api tarhy
GSP29nysvbh1u:1449: anupalambhāt nāstīti tasyā abhāvād apratiṣiddham āvaraṇam iti/ kathaṃ punar jānīte bhavān nāvaraṇānupalabdhir upalabhyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1451: kim atra jñeyaṃ pratyātmavedanīyatvāt samānam---ayaṃ khalv āvaraṇam anupalambhamānaḥ pratyātmam eva saṃvedayate nāvaraṇam upalabha iti, yathā kuḍyenāvṛtasyāvaraṇam upalabhamānaḥ pratyātmam eva saṃvedayate/ seyam āvaraṇopalabdhivad āvaraṇānupalabdhir api saṃvedyaiveti/ evaṃ ca saty
GSP29nysvbh1u:1454: NyS_2,2.20: anupalambhād apy anupalabdhisadbhāvān nāvaraṇānupapattir anupalambhāt ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1455: yathānupalambhamānāpy āvaraṇānupalabdhir asti evam anupalabhyamānam apy āvaraṇam astīti yady abhyanujānāti bhavān anupalabhyamānāvaraṇānupalabdhir astīti abhyanujñāya ca vadati nāsty āvaraṇam anupalambhād iti, etasminn apy abhyanujñāvāde pratipattiniyamo nopapadyata iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1457: yad upalabhyate tad asti, yan nopalabhyate tan nāsti, ity anupalambhātmakam asad iti vyavasthitam/ upalabdhyabhāvaś cānupalabdhir iti seyam abhāvatvān nopalabhyate/ sac ca khalv āvaraṇaṃ tasyopalabdhyā bhavitavyaṃ na copalabhyate tasmān nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1458: % khalv āvaraṇaṃ tasyopalabdhyā bhavitavyaṃ na copalabhyate tasmān
GSP29nysvbh1u:1460: tatra yad uktaṃ nāvaraṇānupapattir anupalambhād ity ayuktam iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1461: atha śabdasya nityatvaṃ pratijānānaḥ kasmād dhetoḥ pratijānīte---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1463: asparśam ākāśaṃ nityaṃ dṛṣṭam iti tathā ca śabda iti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1464: so 'yam ubhayataḥ savyabhicāraḥ---sparśavāṃś cāṇur nityaḥ, asparśaṃ ca karmānityaṃ dṛṣṭam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1472: sampradīyamānam avasthitaṃ dṛṣṭam, sampradīyate ca śabda
GSP29nysvbh1u:1475: yena sampradīyate yasmai ca, tayor antarāle 'vasthānam asya kena liṅgenopalabhyate/ sampradīyamāno 'hy avasthitaḥ sampradātur apaiti
GSP29nysvbh1u:1478: adhyayanaṃ liṅgam, asati sampradāne 'dhyāpanaṃ na syād iti//27//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1480: samānam adhyāpanam ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ saṃśayānivṛtteḥ, kim ācāryasthaḥ śabdo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1483: āhosvin nṛtyopadeśavad gṛhītasyānukaraṇam adhyāpanam iti/ evam adhyāpanam aliṅgaṃ sampradānasyeti//28//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1487: pañcakṛtvaḥ paśyatīti rūpam avasthitaṃ punaḥ punar dṛśyate/ bhavati ca śabde 'bhyāsaḥ---daśakṭtvo 'dhīto 'nuvāko viṃśatikṛtvo 'dhīta iti/ tasmād avasthitasya punaḥ punar uccāraṇam abhyāsa NyS_2,2.30: nānyatve 'py abhyāsasyopacārāt ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1488: anavasthāne 'py abhyāsasyābhidhānaṃ bhavati dvir nṛtyatu bhavān trir
GSP29nysvbh1u:1489: nṛtyatu bhavān iti, dvir anṛtyat trir anṛtyad dvir agnihotraṃ juhoti dvir bhuṅkte//30//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1490: evaṃ vyabhicārāt pratiṣiddhahetāv anyaśabdasya prayogaḥ pratiṣidhyate---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1491: NyS_2,2.31: anyad anyasmād ananyatvād ananyad ity anyatābhāvaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1492: yad idam anyad iti manyase tat svārthenānanyatvād anyan na bhavati, evam anyatāyā abhāvaḥ/ tatra yad uktam anyatve 'py abhyāsopacārād iti etad
GSP29nysvbh1u:1495: NyS_2,2.32: tadabhāve nāsty ananyatā tayor itaretarāpekṣasiddheḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1496: anyasmād ananyatām upapādayati bhavān, upapādya cānyat pratyācaṣṭe ananyad iti ca śabdam anujānāti, prayuṅkte cānanyad ity etat samāsapadam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1497: anyaśadbo 'yaṃ pratiṣedhena saha samasyate/ yadi cātrottaraṃ padaṃ nāsti kasyāyaṃ pratiṣedhena saha samāsaḥ? tasmāt tayor anyānanyaśabdayor itaro
GSP29nysvbh1u:1498: 'nanyaśabda itaram anyaśabdam apekṣamāṇaḥ sidhyatīti tatra yad uktam anyatāyā abhāva iti etad ayuktam iti//32//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1501: yad anityaṃ tasya vināśaḥ kāraṇād bhavati yathā loṣṭasya kāraṇadravyavibhāgāt/ śabdaś ced anityas tasya vināśo yasmāt kāraṇād bhavati tad upalabhyeta, na copalabhyate tasmān nitya NyS_2,2.34: aśravaṇakāraṇānupalabdheḥ satataśravaṇaprasaṅgaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1502: yathā vināśakāraṇānupalabdher avināśaprasaṅga evam aśravaṇakāraṇānupalabdheḥ satataṃ śravaṇaprasaṅgaḥ/ vyañjakābhāvād aśravaṇam iti cet? pratiṣiddhaṃ vyañjakam/ atha vidyamānasya nirnimittam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1503: aśravanam iti vidyamānasya nirnimitto vināśa iti/ samānaś ca dṛṣṭavirodho
GSP29nysvbh1u:1506: anumānāc copalabhyamāne śabdasya vināśakāraṇe vināśakāraṇānupalabdher asattvād ity anapadeśaḥ, yathā yasmād viṣāṇī tasmād aśva iti/ kim anumānam iti cet? santānopapattiḥ/ upapāditaḥ śabdasantānaḥ saṃyogavibhāgajāc
GSP29nysvbh1u:1507: chabdāc chabdāntaraṃ tato 'ntat tato 'py anyad iti/ tatra kāryaḥ śabdaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1508: kāraṇaśabdaṃ niruṇaddhi pratighātidravyasaṃyogas tv antyasya śabdasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1510: % pratighātidravyasaṃyogas tv antyasya śabdasya nirodhakaḥ/] p.629
GSP29nysvbh1u:1511: dṛṣṭaṃ hi tiraḥpratikuḍyam antikasthenāpy aśravaṇaṃ śabdasya śravaṇaṃ dūrasthenāpy asati vyavadhāne
GSP29nysvbh1u:1512: ghaṇṭāyām abhihanyamānāyāṃ tāras tārataro mando mandatara iti śrutibhedān nānāśabdasantāno 'vicchedena śrūyate/ tatra nitye śabde ghaṇṭāstham anyagataṃ vāvasthitaṃ santānavṛtti vābhivyaktikāraṇaṃ vācyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1514: yena śrutisantāno bhavatīti śabdabhede vāsati śrutibheda upapādayitavya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1515: iti/ anitye tu śabde ghaṇṭāsthaṃ santānavṛtti saṃyogasahakāri
GSP29nysvbh1u:1516: nimittāntaraṃ saṃskārabhūtaṃ paṭu mandam anuvartate tastānuvṛttyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1517: śabdasantānānuvṛttiḥ, paṭumandabhāvāc ca tīvramandatā śabdasya, tatkṛtaś ca śrutibheda iti//35//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1518: na vai nimittāntaraṃ saṃskāra upalabhyate/ anupalabdher nāstīti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1520: pāṇikarmaṇā pāṇighaṇṭāpraśleṣo bhavati tasmiṃś ca sati śabdasantāno notpadyate ataḥ śravaṇānupapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1522: tatra pratighātidravyasaṃyogaḥ śabdasya nimittāntaraṃ saṃskārabhūtaṃ niruṇaddhīty anumīyate; tasya ca nirodhāc chabdasantāno notpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1523: anutpattau śrutivicchedo yathā pratighātidravyasaṃyogād iṣoḥ kriyāhetau saṃskāre niruddhe gamanābhāva iti/ kampasantānasya sparśanendriyagrāhyasya coparamaḥ/ kāṃsyapātrādiṣu pāṇisaṃśleṣo liṅgaṃ saṃskārasantānasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1526: yadi yasya vināśakāraṇaṃ nopalabhyate tad avatiṣṭhate, avasthānāc ca tasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1527: nityatvaṃ prasajyate; evaṃ yāni khalv imāni śabdaśravaṇāni śabdābhivyaktaya iti matam, na teṣāṃ vināśakāraṇaṃ bhavatopapādyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1528: anupapādanād avasthānam avasthānāt teṣāṃ nityatvaṃ prasajyata iti/ atha
GSP29nysvbh1u:1529: naivam, na tarhi vināśakāraṇānupalabdheḥ śabdasyāvasthānān nityatvam iti//37//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1531: vaiyadhikaraṇye hi pratighātidravyapraśleṣāt samānādhikaraṇasyaivoparamaḥ syād iti---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1533: yad idaṃ nākāśaguṇaḥ śabda iti pratiṣidhyate ayam anupapannaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1534: asparśatvāc chabdāśrayasya/ rūpādisamānadeśasyāgrahaṇe śabdasantānopapatter asparśavyāpidravyāśrayaḥ śabda iti jñāyate na kampasamānāśraya iti//38//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1535: pratidravyaṃ rūpādibhiḥ saha sanniviṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ samānadeśo vyajyata iti nopapadyate/ katham?---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1537: santānopapatteś ceti cārthaḥ/ tad vyākhyātam/ yadi rūpādayaḥ śabdāś ca pratidravyaṃ samastāḥ samuditāḥ samuditās tasmin samāse samudāye yo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1538: yathājātīyakaḥ sanniviṣṭas tasya tathā jātīyasyaiva grahaṇena bhavitavyaṃ śabde rūpādivat/ tatra yo 'yaṃ vibhāga ekadravye nānārūpā bhinnaśrutayo vidharmāṇaḥ śabdā abhivyajyamānāḥ śrūyante yac ca vibhāgāntaraṃ sarūpāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1539: samānaśrutayaḥ sadharmāṇaḥ śabdās tīvramandadharmatayā bhinnāḥ śrūyante tad ubhayaṃ nopapadyate, nānābhūtānām utpadyamānānām ayaṃ dharmo naikasya vyajyamānasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1540: % bhūtānām utpadyamānānām ayaṃ dharmo naikasya vyajyamānasyeti/] p.638
GSP29nysvbh1u:1541: asti cāyaṃ vibhāgo vibhāgāntaraṃ ca, tena vibhāgopapatter manyāmahe na pratidravyaṃ rūpādibhiḥ saha śabdaḥ sanniviṣṭo vyajyata iti//39//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1542: dvividhaś cāyaṃ śabdo varṇātmako dhvanimātraś ca/ tatra varṇātmani tāvat---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1544: dadhy atreti kecit ikāra itvaṃ hitvā yatvam āpadyata iti vikāraṃ manyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1545: kecid ikārasya prayoge viṣayakṛte yad ikāraḥ sthānaṃ jahāti tatra yakārasya prayogaṃ bruvate/ saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye ikāro na prayujyate tasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1546: sthāne yakāraḥ prayujyate sa ādeśa iti ubhayam idam upadiśyate/ tatra na jñāyate kiṃ tattvam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1548: vikārānanumānam---saty anvaye kiñcin nivartate kiñcid upajāyata iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:1549: śakyeta vikāro 'numātum/ na cānvayo gṛhyate tasmād vikāro nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1550: bhinnakaraṇayoś ca varṇayor aprayoge prayogopapattiḥ---vivṛtakaraṇa ikāra īṣatspṛṣṭakaraṇo yakāraḥ, tāv imau pṛthakkaraṇākhyena
GSP29nysvbh1u:1551: prayatnenoccāraṇīyau, tayor ekasyāprayoge 'nyasya prayoga upapanna iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1552: avikāre cāviśeṣaḥ/ yatremāv ikārayakārau na vikārabhūtau---yatate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1553: yacchati, prāyaṃsta, iti, ikāra idam iti ca, yatra ca vikārabhūtau iṣṭyā dadhy āhareti, ubhayatra prayoktur aviśeṣo yatnaḥ śrotuś ca śrutir ity ādeśopapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1554: prayujyamānāgrahaṇāc ca/ na khalv ikāraḥ prayujyamāno yakāratām āpadyamāno
GSP29nysvbh1u:1555: gṛhyate/ kiṃ tarhi? ikārasya prayoge yakāraḥ prayujyate, tasmād avikāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1556: avikāre ca na śabdānvākhyānalopaḥ/ na vikriyante varṇā iti/ na caitasmin pakṣe śabdānvākhyānasyāsambhave yena varṇavikāraṃ pratipadyemahīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1557: na khalv varṇasya varṇāntaraṃ kāryam, na hi ikārād yakāra utpadyate yakārād vā ikāraḥ/ pṛthaksthānaprayatnotpādyā hīme varṇāḥ teṣām anyonyasya sthāne prayujyata iti yuktam/ etāvac caitat pariṇāmo vā vikāraḥ syāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:1558: kāryakāraṇabhāvo vā/ ubhayaṃ ca nāsti tasmāt na santi varṇavikārāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1560: ``bruvo vacir'' iti yathā varṇasamudāyasya dhātulakṣaṇasya kvacid viṣaye
GSP29nysvbh1u:1561: varṇāntarasamudāyo na pariṇāmo na kāryaṃ śabdāntarasya sthāne śabdāntaraṃ prayujyate tathā varṇasya varṇānataram iti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1564: prakṛtyanuvidhānaṃ vikāreṣu dṛṣṭam, yakāre hrasvadīrghānuvidhānaṃ nāsti
GSP29nysvbh1u:1567: dravyavikārā nyūnāḥ samāḥ adhikāś ca gṛhyante/ tadvad ayaṃ vikāro nyūnaḥ syād iti//42//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1568: NyS_2,2.43: dvividhasyāpi hetor abhāvād asādhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1569: atra nodāharaṇasādharmyād dhetur asti na vaidharmyāt/ anupasaṃhṛtaś ca hetunā dṛṣṭānto na sādhaka iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1570: pratidṛṣṭānte cāniyamaḥ prasajyeta/ yathānuḍuhaḥ sthāne 'śvo voḍhuṃ niyukto na tadvikāro bhavati evam ivarṇasya sthāne yakāraḥ prayukto na vikāra iti/ na cātra niyamahetur asti---dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhako na pratidṛṣṭānta
GSP29nysvbh1u:1573: atulyānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ prakṛtibhāvo vikalpate vikārāś ca prakṛtīr
GSP29nysvbh1u:1574: anuvidhīyante/ na tv ivarṇam anuvidhīyate yakāraḥ/ tasmād anudāharaṇaṃ dravyavikāra iti//44//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1576: yathā dravyabhāvena tulyāyāḥ prakṛter vikāravaiṣamyam, evaṃ varṇābhāvena tulyāyāḥ prakṛter vikāravikalpa iti//45//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1578: ayaṃ vikāradharmā dravyasāmānye, yadātmakaṃ dravyaṃ mṛd vā suvarṇaṃ vā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1579: tasyātmano 'nvaye pūrvo vyūho nivartate, vyūhāntaraṃ copajāyate; taṃ vikāram ācaṣṭe/ na varṇasāmānye kaścic chabdātmā 'nvayī ya itthaṃ jahāti
GSP29nysvbh1u:1580: yatvaṃ cāpadyate/ tatra yathā sati dravyabhāve vikāravaiṣamye nānaḍuho
GSP29nysvbh1u:1581: 'śvo vikāro vikāradharmānupapatteḥ, evam ivarṇasya na yakāro vikāro vikāradharmānupapatter
GSP29nysvbh1u:1584: anupapannā punarāpattiḥ/ katham? punarāpatter ananumānād iti/ ikāro yakāratvam āpannaḥ punar ikāro bhavati, na punar ikārasya sthāne yakārasya prayogo 'prayogaś cety atrānumānaṃ nāsti//47//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1585: ananumānād iti na/ idaṃ hy anumānam---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1587: suvarṇaṃ kuṇḍalatvaṃ hitvā rucakatvam āpadyate rucakatvaṃ hitvā punaḥ kuṇḍalatvam āpadyate, evam ikāro 'pi yakāratvam āpannaḥ punar ikāro
GSP29nysvbh1u:1588: vyabhicārād ananumānam yathā payo dadhibhāvam āpannaṃ punaḥ na payo bhavati kim evaṃ varṇānāṃ na punarāpattiḥ, atha suvarṇavat punarāpattir
GSP29nysvbh1u:1591: avasthitaṃ suvarṇaṃ hīyamānena dharmeṇa upajāyamānena ca dharmi bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1592: naivaṃ kaścic chabdātmā hīyamānena itvenopajāyamānena yatvena dharmī
GSP29nysvbh1u:1594: varṇatvāvyatirekād varṇavikārāṇām apratiṣedhaḥ/ varṇavikārā api varṇatvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1595: na vyabhicaranti yathā suvarṇavikāraḥ suvarṇatvam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1596: sāmānyavato dharmayogo na sāmānyasya/ kuṇḍalarucakau suvarṇasya dharmau na
GSP29nysvbh1u:1597: suvarṇatvasya, evam ikārayakārau kasya varṇātmano dharmau? varṇatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ na tasyemau dharmau bhavitum arhati/ na ca nivartamāno dharma upajāyamānasya prakṛtis tatra nivartamāna ikāro na yakārasyopajāyamānasya prakṛtir iti//49//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1600: nityā varṇā ity etasmin pakṣe ikārayakārau varṇau ity ubhayor nityatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:1601: vikārānupapattiḥ, nityatve 'vināśitvāt kaḥ kasya vikāra iti/ athānityā varṇā iti pakṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1603: evam apy anavasthānaṃ varṇānām/ kim idam anavasthānaṃ varṇānām? utpadya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1604: nirodhaḥ/ utpadya niruddhe ikāre yakāra utpadyate yakāre cotpadya niruddhe ikāra utpadyata iti kaḥ kasya vikāraḥ? tad etad avagṛhya sandhāne sandhāya cāvagrahe veditavyam iti//50//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1606: NyS_2,2.51: nityānām atīndriyatvāt taddharmavikalpāc ca varṇavikārāṇām apratiṣedhaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1607: nityā varṇā na vikalpanta iti vipratiṣedhaḥ/ yathā nityatve sati kiñcid atīndriyaṃ kiñcid indriyagrāhyam, indriyagrāhyāś ca varṇāḥ, evaṃ nityatve sati kiñcin na vikriyate, varṇās tu vikriyanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1608: virodhād ahetus taddharmavikalpaḥ/ nityaṃ nopajāyate nāpaity
GSP29nysvbh1u:1609: anupajanāpāyadharmakaṃ nityam anityaṃ punar upajanāpāyayuktam, na cāntareṇopajanāpāyau vikāraḥ sambhavati/ tad yadi varṇā vikriyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1610: nityatvam eṣāṃ nivartate/ atha nityāḥ, vikāradharmatvam eṣāṃ nivartate/ so
GSP29nysvbh1u:1614: yathānavasthāyināṃ varṇānāṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavaty evam eṣāṃ vikāro bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1615: asambandhād asamarthā arthapratipādikā varṇopalabdhiḥ na vikāreṇa sambandhād asamarthā yā gṛhyamāṇā varṇavikāram anumāpayed iti/ tatra yādṛg idaṃ yathā gandhaguṇā pṛthivy evaṃ śabdasukhādiguṇāpīti, tādṛg etad bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1616: % guṇā pṛthivy evaṃ śabdasukhādiguṇāpīti, tādṛg etad bhavatīti/] p.650
GSP29nysvbh1u:1617: na ca varṇopalabdhir varṇanivṛttau varṇāntaraprayogasya nivartikā/ yo 'yam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1618: ivarṇanivṛttau yakārasya prayogo yady ayaṃ varṇopalabdhyā nivartate tadā tatropalabhyamānā ivarṇo yatvam āpadyate iti gṛhyeta/ tasmād varṇopalabdhir ahetur varṇavikārasyeti//52//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1619: NyS_2,2.53: vikāradharmitve nityatvābhāvāt kālāntare vikāropapatteś cāpratiṣedhaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1620: taddharmavikalpād iti na yuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/ na khalv vikāradharmakaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1621: kiñcin nityam upalabhyata iti varṇopalabdhivad iti na yuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1622: avagrahe hi dadhi atreti prayujya ciraṃ sthitvā tataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ prayuṅkte dadhy atreti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1623: % prayujya ciraṃ sthitvā tataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ prayuṅkte dadhy atreti/] p.651
GSP29nysvbh1u:1624: ciranivṛtte cāyam ivarṇe yakāraḥ prayujyamānaḥ kasya vikāra iti pratīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1625: kāraṇābhāvāt kāryābhāva iti anuyogaḥ prasajyata iti//53//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1628: ikārasthāne yakāraḥ śrūyate yakārasthāne khalv ikāro vidhīyate vidhyatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1629: tad yadi syāt prakṛtivikārabhāvā varṇānām, tasya prakṛtiniyamaḥ syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1632: yo 'yaṃ prakṛter aniyama uktaḥ sa niyato yathāviṣayaṃ vyavasthito niyatatvān niyama iti bhavati, evaṃ saty aniyamo nāsti, tatra yad uktaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1635: niyama ity atrārthābhyanujñā, aniyama iti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1636: anujñātaniṣiddhayoś ca vyāghātād anarthāntaratvaṃ na bhavati/ aniyamaś ca niyatatvāt niyamo na bhavatīti nātrārthasya tathābhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate/ kiṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1638: niyamaśabda evopapadyate/ so 'yaṃ niyamād aniyame pratiṣedho na
GSP29nysvbh1u:1639: na ceyaṃ varṇavikāropapattiḥ pariṇāmāt kāryakāraṇabhāvād vā/ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1641: sthānyādeśabhāvād aprayogo vikāraśabdārthaḥ, sa bhidyate/ guṇāntarāpattiḥ udāttasyānudātta ity evamādiḥ/ upamardo nāma ekarūpanivṛttau
GSP29nysvbh1u:1642: rūpāntaropajanaḥ/ hrāso dīrghasya hrasvaḥ/ vṛddhir hrasvasya dīrghaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1643: tayor vā plutaḥ/ leśo lāghavam, sta ity aster vikāraḥ/ śleṣa āgamaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1644: prakṛteḥ pratyayasya vā/ eta eva viśeṣā vikārā iti/ eta evādeśāḥ, ete ced vikārā upapadyante tarhi varṇavikārā iti//57//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1646: yathādarśanaṃ vikṛtā varṇā vibhaktyantāḥ padasaṃjñā bhavanti/ vibhaktir
GSP29nysvbh1u:1647: dvayī---nāmiky ākhyātikī ca, brāhmaṇaḥ pacatīty udāharaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1649: yathādarśanaṃ vikṛtā varṇā vibhaktyantāḥ padasaṃjñā bhavanti/ vibhaktir dvayī --- nāmiky ākhyātikī ca, brāhmaṇaḥ pacatīty udāharaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1650: upasarganipātās tarhi na padasaṃjñāḥ lakṣaṇāntaraṃ vācyam iti; śiṣyate ca khalu nāmikyā vibhakter avyayāl lopaḥ tayoḥ padasaṃjñārtham iti//58//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1651: padenārthasampratyaya iti prayojanam, nāmapadaṃ cādhikṛtya parīkṣā, gaur iti padaṃ khalv idam udāharaṇaṃ tadarthe ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1654: gaur iti prayujyate, tatra na jñāyate kim anyatamaḥ padārthaḥ utaitat sarvam iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1657: vyaktiḥ padārthaḥ/ kasmāt? yāśabdaprabhṛtīnāṃ vyaktāv upacārāt/ upacāraḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1658: prayogaḥ/ yā gaus tiṣṭhati yā gaur niṣaṇṇeiti, nedaṃ vākyaṃ jāter
GSP29nysvbh1u:1661: gavāṃ samūha iti bhedād dravyābhidhānaṃ na jāter abhedāt/ vaidyāya gāṃ dadatīti dravyasya tyāgo na jāter amūrtatvāt pratikramānukramānupapatteeś
GSP29nysvbh1u:1662: ca/ parigrahaḥ svatvenābhisambandhaḥ, kauṇḍinyasya gaur brāhmaṇasya gaur
GSP29nysvbh1u:1663: iti; dravyābhidhāne dravyabhedāt sambandhabheda ity upapannam, abhinnā tu jātir iti/ saṅkhyā --- daśa gāvo viṃśatir gāva iti bhinnaṃ dravyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1664: saṅkhyāyate, na jātir abhedād iti/ vṛddhiḥ kāraṇavato dravyasyāvayavopacayaḥ avardhata gaur iti; niravayavā tu jātir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1665: etenāpacayo vyākhyātaḥ/ varṇaḥ --- śuklā gauḥ kapilā gaur iti; dravyasya guṇayogo na sāmānyasya/ samāsaḥ --- gohitaṃ gosukham iti, dravyasya sukhādiyogo na jāter iti/ anubandhaḥ --- sarūpaprajananasantāno gaur gāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1666: janayatīti, tadutpattidharmatvād dravye yuktaṃ na jātau viparyayād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1670: na vyaktiḥ padārthaḥ/ kasmāt? anavasthānāt/ yāśabdaprabhṛtibhir yo viśeṣyate sa gośabdārtho yā gaus tiṣṭhati yā gaur niṣaṇṇeti, na dravyamātram aviśiṣṭaṃ jātyā vinābhidhīyate/ kiṃ tarhi? jātiviśiṣṭam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1673: yadi na vyaktiḥ padārthaḥ kathaṃ tarhi vyaktāv upacāra iti? nimittād atadbhāve 'pi tadupacāraḥ/ dṛśyate khalu ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1676: atadbhāve 'pi tadupacāra iti atacchabdasya tena śabdenābhidhānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1679: sthānāt --- mañcāḥ krośantīti mañcasthāḥ puruṣā abhidhīyante/ tādarthyāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:1680: --- kaṭārtheṣu vīraṇeṣu vyuhyamāneṣu kaṭaṃ karotīti bhavati/ vṛtāt ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1681: yamo rājā kubero rājeti tadvadvartata iti/ mānāt --- āḍhakena mitāḥ saktavaḥ āḍhakasaktava iti/ dhāraṇāt --- tulāyāṃ dhṛtaṃ candanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1682: tulācandanam iti/ sāmīpyāt --- gaṅgāyāṃ gāvaś carantīti deśo 'bhidhīyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:1683: sannikṛṣṭaḥ/ yogāt --- kṛṣṇena rāgeṇa yuktaḥ śāṭakaḥ kṛṣṇa ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:1684: abhidhīyate/ sādhanāt --- annaṃ prāṇā iti/ ādhipatyāt --- ayaṃ puruṣaḥ kulam ayaṃ gotram iti/ tatrāyaṃ sahacaraṇād yogād vā jātiśabdo vyaktau
GSP29nysvbh1u:1686: yadi gaur ity asya padasya na vyaktir arthaḥ, astu tarhi ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1689: sattvāvayavānāṃ tadavayavānāṃ ca niyato vyūha ākṛtiḥ, tasyāṃ gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ sattvavyavasthānaṃ sidhyaty ayam gaur ayaṃ aśva iti, nāgṛhyamāṇāyām/ yasya grahaṇāt sattvavyavasthānaṃ sidhyati taṃ śabdo 'bhidhātum arhati so 'syārtha iti//63//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1690: tad upapadyate yasya jātyā yogas tad atra jātiviśiṣṭam abhidhīyate gaur
GSP29nysvbh1u:1692: cāvayavavyūhasya jātyā yogaḥ/ kasya tarhi? niyatāvayavavyūhasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1695: NyS_2,2.64: vyaktyākṛtiyukte 'py aprasṅgāt prokṣādīnāṃ mṛdagavake jātiḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1696: jātiḥ padārthaḥ/ kasmāt? vyaktyākṛtiyukte 'pi mṛdgavake prokṣaṇādīnām aprasaṅgād iti/ gāṃ prokṣaya gām ānaya gāṃ dehīti naitāni mṛdgavake prayujyante/ kasmāt? jāter abhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1698: asti hi tatra vyaktiḥ asty ākṛtiḥ yadabhāvāt tatrāsampratyayaḥ sa padārtha
GSP29nysvbh1u:1700: jāter abhivyaktir ākṛtivyaktī apekṣate, nāgṛhyamāṇāyām ākṛtau vyaktau ca jātimātraṃ śuddhaṃ gṛhyate; tasmān na jātiḥ padārtha iti//65//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1701: na vai padārthena na bhavituṃ śakyam, kaḥ khalv idānīṃ padārtha iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1703: tuśabdo viśeṣaṇārthaḥ/ kiṃ viśiṣyate? pradhānāṅgabhāvasyāniyamena padārthatvam iti/ yadā hi bhedavivakṣā viśeṣagatiś ca tadā vyaktiḥ pradhānam aṅgaṃ tu jātyākṛtī/ yadā tu bhedo 'vivakṣitaḥ sāmānyagatiś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1704: tadā jātiḥ pradhānam aṅgaṃ tu vyaktyākṛtī/ tad etad bahulaṃ prayogeṣu/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1706: kathaṃ punar jñāyate nānā vyaktyākṛtijātaya iti? lakṣaṇabhedāt/ tatra tāvat ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1708: vyajyata iti vyaktir indriyagrāhyeti na sarvaṃ dravyaṃ vyaktiḥ/ yo guṇaviśeṣāṇāṃ sparśāntānāṃ gurutvaghanatvadravatvasaṃskārāṇām avyāpinaḥ parimāṇasyāśrayo yathāsambhavaṃ tad dravyaṃ mūrtiḥ mūrcchitāvayavatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:1710: yayā jātir jātiliṅgāni ca prakhyāyante tām ākṛtiṃ vidyāt/ sā ca nānyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1711: sattvāvayavānāṃ tadavayavānāṃ ca niyatād vyūhād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1713: niyatāvayavavyūhāḥ khalu sattvāvayavā jātiliṅgam, śirasā pādena gām
GSP29nysvbh1u:1714: anuminvanti/ niyate ca sattvāvayavānāṃ vyūhe sati gotvaṃ prakhyāyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1715: anākṛtivyaṅgyāyāṃ jātau mṛtsuvarṇaṃ rajatam ity evamādiṣv ākṛtir nivartate jahāti padārthatvam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1717: yā samānaṃ buddhiṃ prasūte bhinneṣv adhikaraṇeṣu, yayā bahūnīteretarato na
GSP29nysvbh1u:1718: vyāvartante yo 'rtho 'nekatra pratyayānuvṛttinimittaṃ tat sāmānyam/ yac ca keṣāñcid abhedaṃ kutaścid bhedaṃ karoti tat sāmānyaviśeṣo jātir iti//69//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1719: iti vātsyāyanīye nyāyabhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1722: parīkṣitāni pramāṇāni, prameyam idānīṃ parīkṣyate/ tac cātmādīty ātmā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1723: vivicyate, kiṃ dehendriyamanobuddhivedanāsaṅghātamātram ātmā āhosvit tadvayatirikta iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:1724: kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ vyapadeśyobhayathā siddheḥ/ kriyākaraṇayoḥ kartrā sambandhasyābhidhānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1726: sa dvividhaḥ, avayavena samudāyasya --- mūlair vṛkṣas tiṣṭhati, stambhaiḥ prāsādo dhriyata iti/ anyenānyasya vyapadeśaḥ --- paraśunā vṛścati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1727: pradīpena paśyati/ asti cāyaṃ vyapadeśaḥ cakṣuṣā paśyati manasā vijānāti buddhyā vicārayati śarīreṇa sukhaduḥkham anubhavatīti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:1728: tatra nāvadhāryate kim avayavena samudāyasya dehādisaṅghātasya, athānyenānyasya tadvyatiriktasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1731: darśanena kaścid artho gṛhītaḥ sparśanenāpi so 'rtho gṛhyate --- yam aham adrākṣaṃ cakṣuṣā taṃ sparśanenāpi spṛśāmīti, yaṃ cāspārkṣaṃ sparśanena taṃ cakṣuṣā paśyāmīti/ ekaviṣayau cemau pratyayāv ekakartṛkau pratisandhīyete,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1733: na ca saṅghātakartṛkau, nendriyeṇaikakartṛkau/ tad yo 'sau cakṣuṣā tvagindriyeṇa caikārthasya grahītā bhinnanimittāv anyakartṛkau pratyayau samānaviṣayau pratisandadhāti so 'rthāntarabhūta ātmā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1735: kathaṃ punar nendriyeṇaikakartṛkau? indriyaṃ khalu svasvaviṣayagrahaṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1736: ananyakartṛkaṃ pratisandhātum arhati nendriyāntarasya viṣayāntaragrahaṇam iti/ kathaṃ na saṅghātakartṛkau? ekaḥ khalv ayaṃ bhinnanimittau svātmakartṛkau paryayau pratisaṃhitau vedayate na saṅghātaḥ/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1737: anivṛttaṃ hi saṅghāte pratyekaṃ viṣayāntaragrahaṇasyāpratisandhānam indriyāntareṇeveti//1//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1739: na dehādisaṅghātād anyaś cetanaḥ/ kasmāt? viṣayavyavasthānāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1740: vyavasthitaviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi, cakṣuṣy asati rūpaṃ na gṛhyate sati ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:1741: gṛhyate/ yac ca yasminn asati na bhavati sati bhavati tasya tad iti vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1743: tasmād rūpagrahaṇaṃ cakṣuṣaḥ, cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyati/ evaṃ ghrāṇādiṣv apīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1744: tānīndriyāṇīmāni svasvaviṣayagrahaṇāc cetanāni indriyāṇāṃ bhāvābhāvayor viṣayagrahaṇasya tathābhāvāt/ evaṃ sati kim anyena cetanena?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1745: sandhigdhatvād ahetuḥ --- yo 'yam indriyāṇāṃ bhāvābhāvayor viṣayagrahaṇasya tathābhāvaḥ, sa kiṃ cetanatvāt, āhosvic cetanopakaraṇānāṃ grahaṇanimittatvād iti sandihyate/ cetanopakaraṇatve 'pīndriyāṇāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1749: yadi khalv ekam indriyam avyavasthitaviṣayaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvaviṣayagrāhi cetanaṃ syāt kas tato 'nyaṃ cetanam anumātuṃ śaknuyāt? yasmāt tu vyavasthitaviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi tasmāt tebhyo 'nyaś cetanaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvaviṣayagrāhī viṣayavyavasthitam atīto 'numīyate/ tatredam abhijñānam apratyākhyeyaṃ cetanavṛttam udāhriyate/ rūpadarśī khalv ayaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ vā pūrvagṛītam anuminoti/ gandhapratisaṃvedī ca rūparasāv anuminoti/ evaṃ viṣayaśeṣe 'pi vācyam/ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā (emend.; dṛṣṭā, ed.) gandhaṃ jighrati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1750: ghrātvā ca gandhaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati/ tad evam aniyataparyāyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1753: pratyakṣānumānāgamasaṃśayān pratyayāṃś ca nānāviṣayān svātmakartṛkān pratisandhāya vedayate, sarvaviṣayaṃ ca śāstraṃ pratipadyate, artham aviṣayabhūtaṃ śrotrasya kramabhāvino varṇān śrutvā padavākyabhāvena pratisandhāya śabdārthavyavasthāṃ ca budhyamāno 'nekaviṣayam arthajātam agrahaṇīyam ekaikenendriyeṇa gṛhṇāti/ seyaṃ sarvajñasya jñeyāvyavasthānupadaṃ na śakyā parikramitum/ ākṛtimātraṃ tūdāhṛtam/ tatra yad uktam indriyacaitanye sati kim aneya cetanena tad ayuktaṃ bhavati //3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1754: itaś ca dehādivyatirikta ātmā, na dehādisaṅghātamātram
GSP29nysvbh1u:1757: prāṇibhūtaṃ śarīraṃ dahataḥ prāṇihiṃsākṛtapāpaṃ pātakam ity ucyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:1758: tasyābhāvaḥ, tatphalena kartur asambandhāt, akartuś ca sambandhāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1759: śarīrendriyabuddhivedanāprabandhe khalv anyaḥ saṅghāta utpadyate anyo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1764: iti/ evaṃ ca sati yo dehādisaṅghātaḥ prāṇibhūto hiṃsāṃ karoti nāsau
GSP29nysvbh1u:1765: hiṃsāphalena sambadhyate, yaś ca sambadhyate na tena hiṃsā kṛtā/ tad evaṃ sattvabhede kṛtahānam akṛtābhyāgamaḥ prasajyate/ sati ca sattvotpāde
GSP29nysvbh1u:1766: sattvanirodhe cākarmanimittaḥ sattvasarsargaḥ prāpnoti, tatra muktyartho brahmacaryavāso na syāt/ tad yadi dehādisaṅghātamātraṃ sattvaṃ syāt śarīradāhe pātakaṃ na bhavet, aniṣṭaṃ caitat/ tasmād dehādisaṅghātavyatirikta ātmā nitya iti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1768: yasyāpi nityenātmanā sātmakaṃ śarīraṃ dahyate tasyāpi śarīradāhe pātakaṃ na bhaved dagdhuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1770: kasmāt? nityatvād ātmanaḥ; na jātu kaścin nityaṃ hiṃsitum arhati/ atha
GSP29nysvbh1u:1771: hiṃsyate, nityatvam asya na bhavati/ seyam ekasmin pakṣe hiṃsā niṣphalā anyasmiṃs tv anupapanneti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1773: na brūmo nityasya sattvasya badho hiṃsā, api tv anucchittidharmakasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1774: sattvasya kāryāśrayasya śarīrasya svaviṣayopalabdheś ca kartṛṇām indriyāṇām upaghātaḥ pīḍā vaikalyalakṣaṇaḥ prabandhocchedo vā pramāpaṇalakṣaṇo vā vadho hiṃseti/ kāryaṃ tu sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1777: kāryāśrayasya śarīrasya svaviṣayopalabdheś ca kartṛṇām indriyāṇāṃ badho
GSP29nysvbh1u:1778: hiṃsā, na nityasyātmanaḥ/ tatra yad uktam --- ``tadabhāvaḥ sātmakapradāhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:1779: 'pi tannityatvād'' ity etad ayuktam/ yasya sattvocchedo hiṃsā tasya kṛtahānam akṛtābhyāgamaś ceti doṣaḥ/ etāvac caitat syāt --- sattvocchedo vā hiṃsā, anucchittidharmakasya sattvasya kāryāśrayakartṛvadho vā; na kalpāntaram asti/ sattvocchedaś ca pratiṣiddhaḥ, tatra kim anyat? śeṣaṃ yathābhūtam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1780: atha vā kāryāśrayakartṛvadhād iti, kāryāśrayo dehendriyabuddhisaṅghātaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1781: nityasyātmanas tatra sukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedanam, tasyādhiṣṭhānam āśrayaḥ tadāyatanaṃ tad bhavati na tato 'nyad iti sa eva kartā/ tannimittā hi sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanasya nivṛttiḥ na tam antareṇeti/ tasya vadha upaghātaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1782: pīḍā pramāpaṇam vā hiṃsā na nityatvenātmocchedaḥ/ tatra yad uktam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1787: tam evaitarhi paśyāmi yam ajñāsiṣam sa evāyam artha iti savyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭasyetareṇāpi cakṣuṣā pratyabhijñānād yam adrākṣaṃ tam evaitarhi
GSP29nysvbh1u:1790: indriyacaitanye tu nānyadṛṣṭam anyaḥ pratyabhijānātīti pratyabhijñānupapattiḥ/ asti tv idaṃ pratyabhijñanam tasmād indriyavyatiriktaś cetanaḥ//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1792: ekam idaṃ cakṣur madhye nāsāsthivyavahitaṃ tasyāntau gṛhyamāṇau dvitvābhimānaṃ prayojayato madhyavyavahitasya dīrghasyeva//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1794: ekasminn upahate coddhṛte vā cakṣuṣi dvitīyam avatiṣṭhate
GSP29nysvbh1u:1797: ekavināśe dvitīyāvināśād ity ahetuḥ/ kasmāt? vṛkṣasya hi kāsucic chākhāsu chinnāsūpalabhyate eva vṛkṣaḥ//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1799: na kāraṇadravyasya vibhāge kāryadravyam avatiṣṭate nityatvaprasaṅgāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1800: bahuṣv avayaviṣu yasya kāraṇāni vibhaktāni tasya vināśaḥ, yeṣāṃ kāraṇāny avibhaktāni tāni
GSP29nysvbh1u:1801: atha vā dṛśyamānārthavirodho dṛṣṭāntavirodhaḥ/ mṛtasya hi śiraḥkapāle dvāv avaṭau nāsāsthivyavahitau cakṣuṣaḥ sthāne bhedena gṛhyete na caitad
GSP29nysvbh1u:1803: atha vā ekavināśasyāniyamād dvāv imāv arthau, tau ca pṛthagāvaraṇopaghātau
GSP29nysvbh1u:1806: avapīḍanāc caikasya cakṣuṣo raśmiviṣayasannikarṣasya bhedād dṛśyabheda iva
GSP29nysvbh1u:1807: gṛhyate; tac caikatve virudhyate; avapīḍananivṛttau cābhinnapratisandhānam iti/ tasmād ekasya vyavadhānānupapattiḥ//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1810: kasyacid amlaphalasya gṛhītatadrasasāhacarye rūpe gandhe vā kenacid indriyeṇa gṛhyamāṇe rasanasyendriyāntarasya vikāraḥ rasānusmṛtau rasagardhivartito dantodakasaṃplavabhūto gṛhyate/ tasyendriyacaitanye
GSP29nysvbh1u:1813: smṛtir nāma dharmo nimittād utpadyate, tasyāḥ smartavyo viṣayaḥ, tatkṛta indriyāntaravikāro nātmakṛta iti//13//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1815: tasyā ātmaguṇatve sati sadbhāvād apratiṣedha ātmanaḥ/ yadi smṛtir ātmaguṇaḥ, evaṃ sati smṛtir upapadyate nānyad dṛṣṭam anyaḥ samaratīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1817: pratisandhāne vā viṣayavyavasthānupapattiḥ/ ekas tu cetano 'nekārthadarśī
GSP29nysvbh1u:1818: bhinnanimittaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭam artham smaratīti ekasyānekārthadarśino darśanapratisandhānāt smṛter ātmaguṇatve sati sadbhāvaḥ viparyaye
GSP29nysvbh1u:1821: smṛtyāśrayāḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ sarve vyavahārāḥ/ ātmaliṅgam udāharaṇamātram indriyāntaravikāra
GSP29nysvbh1u:1822: aparisaṅkhyānāś ca smṛtiviṣayasya --- aparisaṅghyāya ca smṛtiviṣayam idam ucyate ``na smṛteḥ smartavyaviṣayatvād'' iti/ yeyaṃ smṛtir agṛhyamāṇe
GSP29nysvbh1u:1823: 'rthe ajñāsiṣam aham amum artham iti, etasyā jñātṛjñānaviśiṣṭaḥ pūrvajñāto
GSP29nysvbh1u:1824: 'rtho viṣayo nārthamātram, jñātavān aham amum artham,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1825: asav artho mayā jñataḥ, asminn arthe mama jñānam abhūd iti caturvidham etadvākyaṃ smṛtiviṣayajñāpakaṃ samānārtham/ sarvatra khalu jñātā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ ca gṛhyate/ atha pratyakṣe 'rthe yā smṛtis tayā trīṇi jñānāni ekasminn arthe pratisandhīyante samānakartṛkāṇi, na nānākartṛkāṇi nākartṛkāṇi/ kiṃ tarhi? ekakartṛkāṇi/ adrākṣam amum arthaṃ yam evaitarhi paśyāmi/ adrākṣam iti darśanaṃ darśanasaṃvic ca, na khalv asaṃvidite sve darśane syād etad adrakṣam iti/ te khalv ete dve jñāne, yam evaitarhi paśyāmīti tṛtīyaṃ jñānam, evam eko 'rthas tribhir jñānair yujyamāno
GSP29nysvbh1u:1828: ekakartṛka iti/ so 'yaṃ smṛtiviṣayo 'parisaṅkhyāyamāno vidyamānaḥ prajñāto 'rthaḥ pratiṣidhyate --- nāsty ātmā smṛteḥ smartavyaviṣayatvād iti/ na cedaṃ smṛtimātraṃ smartavyamātraviṣayam vā idaṃ khalu jñānapratisandhānavat smṛtipratisandhānam ekasya sarvaviṣayatvāt/ eko 'yaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1829: jñātā sarvaviṣayaḥ svāni jñānāni pratisandhatte amum arthaṃ jñāsyāmi amum artham vijānāmy amum artham ajñāsiṣam amum arthaṃ jijñāsamānaś ciram ajñātvādhyavasyaty ajñāsiṣam iti/ evaṃ smṛtim api trikālaviśiṣṭāṃ suṣmūrṣāviśiṣṭāṃ ca pratisandhatte/ saṃskārasantatimātre tu sattve
GSP29nysvbh1u:1830: utpadyotpadya saṃskārās tirobhavanti/ sa nāsty eko 'pi saṃskāro yas trikālaviśiṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ smṛtiṃ cānubhavet/ na cānubhavam antareṇa jñānasya smṛteś ca pratisandhānam ahaṃ mameti cotpadyate dehāntaravat/ ato
GSP29nysvbh1u:1831: 'numīyate asty ekaḥ sarvaviṣayaḥ pratidehaṃ svajñānaprabandhaṃ smṛtiprabandhaṃ ca pratisandhatta iti, yasya dehāntareṣu vṛtter abhāvān na pratisandhānaṃ bhavatīti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1833: na dehādisaṅghātavyatirikta ātmā/ kasmāt? ātmapratipattihetūnāṃ manasi sambhavāt ---``darśanasparśanābhyām ekārthagrahaṇād'' ity evamādīnām ātmapratipādakānāṃ hetūnāṃ manasi sambhavo yataḥ, mano hi sarvaviṣayam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1836: jñātuḥ khalu jñānasādhanāny upapadyante --- cakṣuṣā paśyati ghrāṇena
GSP29nysvbh1u:1837: jighrati sparśanena spṛśati, evaṃ mantuḥ sarvaviṣayasya matisādhanam antaḥkaraṇabhūtaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ vidyate yenāyaṃ manyata iti/ evaṃ sati jñātary ātmasaṃjñā na mṛṣyate manaḥsaṃjñābhyanujñāyate/ manasi ca manaḥsaṃjñā na mṛṣyate matisādhanaṃ tv abhyanujñāyate/ tad idaṃ saṃjñābhedamātraṃ nārthe vivāda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1838: pratyākhyāne vā sarvendriyavilopaprasaṅaḥ/ atha mantuḥ sarvaviṣayasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1839: matisādhanaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ pratyākhyāyate nāstīti, evaṃ rūpādiviṣayagrahaṇasādhanāny api na santīti sarvendriyavilopaḥ prasajyata
GSP29nysvbh1u:1841: yo 'yam niyama iṣyate, rūpādigrahaṇasādhanāny asya santi, matisādhanaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ nāstīti, ayaṃ niyamo niranumānaḥ/ nātrānumānam asti yena
GSP29nysvbh1u:1843: rūpādibhyaś ca viṣayāntaraṃ sukhādayas tadupalabdhau karaṇāntarasadbhāvaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1844: yathā cakṣuṣā gandho na gṛhyata iti karaṇāntaraṃ ghrāṇam evaṃ cakṣur ghrāṇābhyāṃ raso na gṛhyata iti karaṇāntaraṃ rasanam/ evaṃ śeṣeṣv api/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1845: tathā cakṣurādibhiḥ sukhādayo na gṛhyanta iti karaṇāntareṇa bhavitavyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1847: tac ca jñānāyaugapadyaliṅgam/ yac ca sukhādyupalabdhau karaṇaṃ tac ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:1848: jñānāyaugaoadyaliṅgaṃ tasyendriyam indriyaṃ prati sannidher asannidheḥ ca na yugapaj jñānāny utpadyanta iti/ tatra yad uktam ``ātmapratipattihetūnāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1850: kiṃ punar ayaṃ dehādisaṅghātād anyo nityaḥ utānitya iti/ kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1851: ubhayathā dṛṣṭatvāt saṃśayaḥ/ vidyamānam ubhayathā bhavati nityam anityaṃ ca/ pratipādite ca ātmasadbhāve saṃśayānivṛttir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1852: ātmasadbhāvahetubhir evāsya prāg dehabhedād avasthānaṃ siddham ūrddhvam api dehabhedād avatiṣṭhate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1854: jātaḥ khalv ayaṃ kumārako 'smin janmany agṛhīteṣu harṣabhayaśokahetuṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:1855: harṣabhayaśokān pratipadyate liṅgānumeyān/ te ca smṛtyanubandhād
GSP29nysvbh1u:1856: utpadyante nānyathā/ smṛtyanubandhaś ca pūrvābhyāsam antareṇa na bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1857: pūrvābhyāsaś ca pūrvajanmani sati, nānyatheti sidhyaty etat avatiṣṭhate
GSP29nysvbh1u:1860: yathā padmādiṣv anityeṣu prabodhaḥ sammīlanaṃ vikāro bhavati evam anityasyātmano harṣabhayaśokasampratipattir vikāraḥ syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1861: hetvabhāvād ayuktam --- anena hetunā padmādiṣu prabodhasammīlanavikāravad anityasyātmano harṣādisampratipattir iti nātrodāharaṇasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetur na vaidharmyād asti hetvabhāvāt asambaddhārthakam apārthakam ucyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1862: dṛṣṭāntāc ca harṣādinimittasyānivṛttiḥ --- yā ceyam āseviteṣu viṣayeṣu harṣādisampratipattiḥ smṛtyanubandhakṛtā pratyātmanaṃ gṛhyate seyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1863: padmādisammīlanadṛṣṭāntena na nivartate/ yathā ceyaṃ na nivarttate tathā jātasyāpīti/ kriyājātau ca parṇavibhāgasaṃyogau prabodhasammīlane,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1864: kriyāhetuś ca kriyānumeyaḥ/ evaṃ ca sati kiṃ dṛṣṭāntena pratiṣidhyate//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1865: atha nirnimittaḥ padmādiṣu prabodhasammīlanavikāra iti matam evam ātmano 'pi harṣādisampratipattir iti/ tac ca ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1867: uṣṇādiṣu satsu bhāvād asatsv abhāvāt tannimittāḥ pañcabhūtānugraheṇa nivṛttānāṃ padmādīnāṃ prabodhasammīlanavikārā iti na nirnimittāḥ/ evaṃ harṣādayo 'pi vikārā nimittad bhavitum arhanti na nimittam antareṇa/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1869: na cānyat pūrvābhyastasmṛtyanubandhān nimittam astīti/ na cotpattitirodhakāraṇānumānam ātmano dṛṣṭāntāt, na harṣādīnāṃ nimittam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1870: antareṇotpattiḥ, noṣṇādivan nimittāntaropādānaṃ harṣādīnām, tasmād ayuktam etat//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1873: jātamātrasya vatsasya pravṛttiliṅgaḥ stanyābhilāṣo gṛhyate/ sa ca nāntareṇāhārābhyāsam/ kayā yuktyā? dṛśyate hi śarīriṇāṃ kṣudhā pīḍyamānānām āhārābhyāsakṛtāt smaraṇānubandhād āhārābhilāṣaḥ/ na ca pūrvaśarīrābhyāsam antareṇāsau jātamātrasyopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1875: tenānumīyate bhūtapūrvaṃ śarīraṃ yatrānenāhāro 'bhyasta iti/ sa khalv ayam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1876: ātmā pūrvaśarīrāt pretya śarīrāntaram āpannaḥ kṣutpīḍitaḥ pūrvābhyastam āhāram anusmaran stanyam abhilaṣati/ tasmān na dehabhedād ātmā bhidyate bhavaty evorddhvaṃ dehabhedād iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1878: yathā khalv ayo 'bhyāsam antareṇāyaskāntam upasarpati, evam āhārābhyāsam antareṇa bālaḥ stanyam abhilaṣati//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1879: kim idam ayaso 'yaskāntābhisarpaṇaṃ nirnimittam atha nimittād iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1882: yadi nirnimittam, loṣṭādayo 'py ayaskāntam upasarpeyuḥ/ na jātu niyame
GSP29nysvbh1u:1883: kāraṇam astīti/ atha nimittāt, tat kenopalabhyate iti/ kriyāliṅgaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1885: pravṛttyabhāvaḥ, bālasyāpi niyatam upasarpaṇakriyopalabhyate/ na ca stanyābhilāṣaliṅgam anyad āhārābhyāsakṛtāt smaraṇāubandhāt/ nimittaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1888: na cāsati nimitte kasyacid utpattiḥ/ na ca dṛṣṭānto dṛṣṭam abhilāṣahetuṃ bādhate/ tasmād ayaso 'yaskāntābhigamanam adṛṣṭānta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1889: ayasaḥ khalv api nānyatra pravṛttir bhavati, na jātv ayo loṣṭam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1890: upasarpati, kiṃkṛito 'sya niyama iti? yadi kāraṇaniyamāt, sa ca kriyāniyamaliṅgaḥ/ evaṃ bālasyāpi niyataviṣayo 'bhilāṣaḥ kāraṇaniyamād bhavitum arhati/ tac ca kāraṇam abhyastasmaraṇam anyad veti dṛṣṭena
GSP29nysvbh1u:1891: viśiṣyate/ dṛṣṭo hi śarīriṇām abhastasmaraṇād āhārābhilāṣa iti//23//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1894: sarāgo jāyata ity arthād āpadyate/ ayaṃ jāyamāno rāgānubhaddho jāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1895: rāgasya pūrvānubhūtaviṣayānucintanaṃ yoniḥ, pūrvānubhavaś ca viṣayāṇām
GSP29nysvbh1u:1898: so 'yam ātmā pūrvaśarīrānubhūtān viṣayān anusmaran teṣu teṣu rajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1899: tathā cāyaṃ dvayor janmanoḥ pratisandhiḥ/ evaṃ pūrvaśarīrasya pūrvatareṇa
GSP29nysvbh1u:1900: pūrvatarasya pūrvatamenetyādinānādiś cetanasya śarīrayogaḥ, anādiś ca rāgānubandha iti siddhaṃ nityatvam iti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1901: kathaṃ punar jñāyate pūrvānubhūtaviṣayānucintanajanito jātasya rāgaḥ, na punaḥ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1903: athotpattidharmakasya dravyasya guṇāḥ kāraṇata utpadyante tathotpattidharmakasyātmano rāgaḥ kutaścid utpadyate/ atrāyam uditānuvādo nidarśanārthaḥ//25//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1905: na khalu saguṇadravyotpattivad utpattir ātmano rāgasya ca/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1906: saṅkalpanimittatvād rāgādīnām/ ayaṃ khalu prāṇināṃ viṣayān āsevamānānāṃ saṅkalpajanito rāgo gṛhyate, saṅkalpaś ca pūrvānubhūtaviṣayānucintanayoniḥ/ tenānumīyate jātasyāpi pūrvānubhūtārthacintanakṛto rāga iti/ ātmotpādādhikaraṇāt tu rāgotpattir
GSP29nysvbh1u:1907: bhavantī saṅkalpād anyasmin rāgakāraṇe sati vācyā kāryadravyaguṇavat/ na cātmotpādaḥ siddho nāpi saṅkalpād anyad rāgakāraṇam asti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1908: % nāpi saṅkalpād anyad rāgakāraṇam asti/] p.751
GSP29nysvbh1u:1909: tasmād ayuktaṃ saguṇadravyotpattivat tayor utpattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1910: athāpi saṅkalpād anyad rāgakāraṇaṃ dharmādharmalakṣaṇam adṛṣṭam upādīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1911: tathāpi pūrvaśarīrayogo 'pratyākhyeyaḥ/ tatra hi tasya nirvṛttiḥ nāsmin janmani/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1912: tanmayatvād rāga iti/ viṣayābhyāsaḥ khalv ayaṃ bhāvanāhetuḥ tanmayatvam ucyate iti/ jātiviśeṣāc ca rāgaviśeṣa iti/ karma khalv idaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1913: jātiviśeṣanirvartakaṃ tādarthyāt tācchabdyaṃ vijñāyate/ tasmād anupapannaṃ saṅkalpād anyad rāgakāraṇam iti//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1914: anādiś cetanasya śarīrayoga ity uktam, svakṛtakarmanimittaṃ cāsya śarīraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1915: sukhaduḥkhādhiṣṭhānam/ tat parīkṣyate --- kiṃ ghrāṇādivad ekaprakṛtikam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1916: uta nānāprakṛtīti/ kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ? vipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ/ pṛthivyādīni bhūtāni saṅkhyāvikalpena śarīraprakṛtir iti pratijānata iti/ kiṃ tatra tattvam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1918: tatra mānuṣaṃ pārthivam/ kasmāt? guṇāntaropalabdheḥ/ gandhavatī pṛthivī gandhavac ca śarīram/ abādīnām agandhatvāt tatprakṛtyagandhaṃ syāt/ na tv idam abādibhir asampṛktayā pṛthivyārabdhaṃ ceṣṭendriyārthāśrayabhāvena kalpate ity ataḥ pañcānāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃyoge sati śarīraṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1919: bhūtasaṃyogo hi mithaḥ pañcānāṃ na niṣiddha iti/ āpyataijasavāyavyāni lokāntare śarīrāṇi teṣv api bhūtasaṃyogaḥ puruṣārthatantra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1920: sthālyādidravyaniṣpattāv api niḥsaṃśayo nābādisaṃyogam antarena niṣpattir
GSP29nysvbh1u:1924: ta ime sandigdhā hetava ity upekṣitavān sūtrakāraḥ/ kathaṃ sandigdhāḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1925: sati ca prakṛtibhāve bhūtānāṃ dharmopalabdhir asati ca saṃyogāpratiṣedhāt sannihitānām iti, yathā sthālyām udakatejovāyvākāśānām iti/ tad idam anekabhūtaprakṛti śarīram agandham arasam arūpam asparśaṃ ca prakṛtyanuvidhānāt syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1926: % -m arūpam asparśaṃ ca prakṛtyanuvidhānāt syāt,] p.755
