GSP29nysvbh1u:1929: ``sūryaṃ te cakṣurgacchatād'' ity atra mantre ``pṛthivīṃ te śarīram'' iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:1930: śrūyate/ tad idaṃ prakrtau vikārasya pralayābhidhānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1932: ``sūryaṃ te cakṣuḥ spṛṇomi'' ity atra mantrāntare ``pṛthivīṃ te śarīraṃ spṛṇomīti'' śrūyate/ seyaṃ kāraṇād vikārasya spṛtir abhidhīyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1933: sthālyādiṣu ca tulyajātīyānām ekakāryārambhadarśanād bhinnajātīyānām ekakāryārambhānupapattiḥ//31//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1934: athedānīm indriyāṇi prameyakrameṇa vicāryante --- kim āvyaktikāny āhosvid
GSP29nysvbh1u:1938: NyS_3,1.32: kṛṣṇasāre saty upalambhād vyatiricya copalambhāt saṃśayaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1939: kṛṣṇasāraṃ bhautikam, tasminn anupahate rūpopalabdhiḥ upahate cānupalabdhir iti/ vyatiricya kṛṣṇasāram avasthitasya viṣayasya upalambho na kṛṣṇasāraprāptasya/ na cāprāpyakāritvam indriyāṇām, tad idam abhautikatve vibhutvāt sambhavati/ evam ubhayadharmopalabdheḥ saṃśayaḥ//32//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1943: mahad iti mahattaraṃ mahattamaṃ copalabhyate yathā nyagrodhaparvatādi/ aṇv iti aṇutaram aṇutamaṃ ca gṛhyate yathā nyagrodhadhānādi/ tadubhayam upalabhyamānaṃ cakṣuṣo bhautikatvaṃ bādhate/ bhautikaṃ hi yāvat tāvad eva vyāpnoti/ abhautikaṃ tu vibhutvāt sarvavyāpakam iti//33//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1944: na mahadaṇugrahaṇamātrād abhautikatvaṃ vibhutvaṃ cendriyāṇāṃ śakyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1947: tayor mahadaṇvor grahaṇaṃ cakṣūraśmer arthasya ca sannikarṣaviśeṣād bhavati yathā pradīparaśmer arthasya ceti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1949: raśmyarthasannikarṣaś cāvaraṇaliṅgaḥ/ cākṣuṣo hi raśmiḥ kuḍyādibhir āvṛtam arthaṃ na prakāśayati yathā pradīparaśmir iti//34//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1952: rūpasparśavad dhi tejaḥ, mahattvād anekadravyavattvād rūpavattvāc
GSP29nysvbh1u:1953: copalabdhir iti pradīpavat pratyakṣata upalabhyeta cākṣuṣo raśmir yadi syād iti//35//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1955: sannikarṣapratiṣedhārthenāvaraṇena liṅgenānumīyamānasya raśmer yā pratyakṣato 'nupalabdhir nāsāv abhāvaṃ pratipādayati yathā candramasaḥ parabhāgasya prthivyāś cādhobhāgasya//36//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1957: bhinnaḥ khalv ayaṃ dravyadharmo guṇadharmaś ca, mahadanekadravyavac ca viṣaktāvayavam āpyaṃ dravyaṃ pratyakṣato nopalabhyate sparśas tu śīto gṛhyate/ tasya dravyasyānubandhād hemantaśiśirau kalpyete tathāvidham eva
GSP29nysvbh1u:1958: ca taijasaṃ dravyam anudbhūtarūpaṃ saha rūpeṇa nopalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1960: sparśas tv asyoṣṇa upalabhyate tasya dravyasyānubandhād grīṣmavasantau
GSP29nysvbh1u:1963: tatra rūpaṃ ca dravyaṃ ca tadāśrayaḥ pratyakṣata upalabhyate/ rūpaviśeṣas tu yadbhāvāt kvacid rūpopalabdhiḥ yadabhāvāc ca dravyasya kvacid
GSP29nysvbh1u:1964: anupalabdhiḥ sa rūpadharmo 'yam udbhava samākhyāta iti/ anudbhūtarūpaś cāyaṃ nāyano raśmiḥ, tasmāt pratyakṣato nopalabhyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1966: dṛṣṭaś ca tejaso dharmabhedaḥ, udbhūtarūpasparśaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tejo yathā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1967: ādityaraśmayaḥ/ udbhūtarūpam anudbhūtasparśaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ yathā pradīparaśmayaḥ/ udbhūtasparśam anudbhūtarūpam apratyakṣaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1968: yathābādisaṃyuktaṃ tejaḥ/ anudbhūtarūpasparśo 'pratyakṣaś cākṣuṣo raśmir iti//38//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1970: yathā cetanasyārtho viṣayopalabdhibhūtaḥ sukhaduḥkhopalabdhibhūtaś ca kalpyate tathendriyāṇi vyūḍhāni, viṣayaprāptyarthaś ca raśmeś cākṣuṣasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1971: vyūhaḥ/ rūpasparśānabhivyaktiś ca vyavahāraprakḷptyarthā, dravyaviśeṣe ca pratīghātād āvaraṇopapattir vyavahārārthā/ sarvadravyāṇāṃ viśvarūpo vyūha
GSP29nysvbh1u:1972: indriyavat karmakāritaḥ puruṣārthatantraḥ/ karma tu dharmādharmabhūtaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1974: avyabhicārāc ca pratīghāto bhautikadharmaḥ/ yaś cātvaraṇopalambhād indriyasya dravyaviśeṣe pratighātaḥ sa bhautikadharmo na bhūtāni
GSP29nysvbh1u:1975: vyabhicarati, nābautikaṃ pratighātadharmakaṃ dṛṣṭam iti/ apratighātas tu vyabhicārī bhautikābhautikayoḥ samānatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1976: yad api manyeta pratighātād bhautikānīndriyāṇi, apratighātād abhautikānīti prāptam? dṛṣṭaś cāpratighātaḥ kācābhrapaṭalasphaṭikāntaritopalabdheḥ/ tan na yuktam/ kasmāt? yasmād bhautikam api na pratihanyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1980: yathā ``anekadravyeṇa samavāyād rūpaviśeṣāc copalabdhir'' iti saty upalabdhikāraṇe madhyandinolkāprakāśo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1982: copalabhir iti saty upalabdhikāraṇe cākṣuṣo raśmir nopalabhyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:1983: nimittāntarataḥ// tac ca vyākhyātam anudbhūtarūpasparśasya dravyasya pratyakṣato 'nupalabdhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:1984: atyantānupalabdhiś cābhāvakāraṇam/ yo hi bravīti loṣṭaprakāśo madhyandine ādityaprakāśābhibhavān nopalabhyata iti, tasyaitat syāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1986: apy anumānato 'nupalabdher iti/ evam atyantānupalabdher loṣṭaprakāśo
GSP29nysvbh1u:1987: nāsti, na tv evaṃ cakṣuṣo raśmir iti//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1992: sati ca prakāśānugrahe śītasparśopalabdhau ca satyāṃ tadāśrayasya dravyasya cakṣuṣā 'grahaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1994: seyaṃ rūpānabhivyaktito rūpāśrayasya dravyasyānupalabdhir dṛṣṭā/ tatra yad uktaṃ ``tadanupalabdher ahetur'' iti etad ayuktam//42//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1995: kasmāt punar abhibhavo 'nupalabdhikāraṇaṃ cākṣuṣasya raśmer nocyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1997: bāhyaprakāśānugrahanirapekṣatāyāṃ ceti cārthaḥ/ yad rūpam abhivyaktam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1998: udbhūtaṃ bāhyaprakāśānugrahaṃ ca nāpekṣate tadviṣayo 'bhibhavaḥ, viparyaye
GSP29nysvbh1u:2002: evam upapannam asti cākṣuṣo raśmir iti//43//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2004: dṛśyante hi naktaṃ nayanaraśmayo naktañcarāṇāṃ vṛṣadaṃśaprabhṛtīnām, tena śeṣasyānumānam iti/ jātibhedavad indriyabheda iti cet? dharmabhedamātraṃ cānupapannam āvaraṇasya prātipratiṣedhārthasya darśanād iti//44//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2007: tṛṇādi sarpad dravyaṃ kāce abhrapaṭale vā pratihataṃ dṛṣt'm, avyavahitena sannikṛṣyate vyāhanyate vai prāptir vyavadhāneneti/ yadi ca raśmyarthasannikarṣo grahaṇahetuḥ syāt na vyavahitasya sannikarṣa ity agrahaṇaṃ syāt/ asti ceyaṃ kācābhrapaṭalasphaṭikāntaritopalabdhiḥ sā jñāpayati aprāpyakārīṇīndriyāṇi ata evābhautikāni, prāpyakāritvaṃ hi bhautikadharma iti//45//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2012: na ca kāco 'bhrapaṭalaṃ vā nayanaraśmiṃ viṣṭabhnāti so 'pratihanyamānaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2014: yaś ca manyate na bhautikasyāpratighāta iti tan na ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2017: avighātād iti ca padābhisambandhād vākyabheda iti/ prativākyaṃ cārthabheda iti/ ādityaraśmiḥ kumbhādiṣu na pratihanyate, avighātāt kumbhastham udakaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2018: tapati/ prāptau hi dravyāntaraguṇasya uṣṇasya sparśasya grahaṇaṃ tena ca śītasparśābhibhava iti/ sphaṭikāntarite 'pi prakāśanīye pradīparaśmīnām apratighātaḥ, apratighātāt prāptasya grahaṇam iti/ bharjanakapālādisthaṃ ca dravyam āgneyena tejasā dahyate tatrāvighātāt prāptiḥ, prāptau tu dāho
GSP29nysvbh1u:2020: avighātād iti ca kevalaṃ padam upādīyate, ko 'yam avighāto nāma?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2021: avyuhyamānāvayavena vyavadhāyena dravyeṇa sarvato dravyasyāviṣṭhmbhaḥ kriyāhetor apratibandhaḥ prāpter apratiṣedha iti/ dṛṣṭaṃ hi kalaśaniṣaktānām apāṃ bahiḥ śītasparśasya grahaṇam/ na cendriyeṇāsannikṛṣṭasya dravyasya sparśopalabdhiḥ/ dṛṣṭau ca praspandaparisravau/ tatra kācābhrapaṭalādibhir nayanaraśmer apratighātād vibhidyārthena saha sannikarṣād upapannaṃ grahaṇam NyS_3,1.49: netaretaradharmaprasaṅgāt ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2022: kācābhrapaṭalādivad vā kuḍyādibhir apratighātaḥ, kuḍyādivad vā kācābhrapaṭalādibhiḥ pratighāta iti prasajyate, niyame kāraṇaṃ vācyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2024: ādarśodakayoḥ prasādo rūpaviśeṣaḥ svo dharmo niyamadarśanāt, prasādasya vā svo dharmo rūpopalambhanam/ yathā ādarśapratihatasya parāvṛttasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2025: nayanaraśmeḥ svena mukhena sannikarṣe sati svamukhopalambhanaṃ pratibimbagrahaṇākhyam ādarśarūpānugrahāt tannimittaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2027: ādarśarūpopaghāte tadabhāvāt, kuḍyādiṣu ca pratibimbagrahaṇaṃ na bhavati evaṃ kācābhrapaṭalādibhir avighātaś cakṣūraśmeḥ kuḍyādibhiś ca pratighāto dravyasvabhāvaniyamād iti//50//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2029: pramāṇasya tattvaviṣayatvāt/ na khalu bhoḥ parīkṣamāṇena dṛṣṭānumitā arthāḥ śakyā niyoktum evaṃ bhavateti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2031: nāpi pratiṣeddhum evaṃ na bhavateti/ na hīdam upapadyate rūpavad gandho 'pi cākṣuṣo bhavatv iti, gandhavad vā rūpaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ mā bhūd iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2033: udakāpratipattivad vā dhūmenāgnipratipattir api mā bhūd iti/ kiṃ kāraṇam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2034: yathā khalv arthā bhavanti ya eṣāṃ svo bhāvaḥ svo dharma iti tathābhūtāḥ pramāṇena pratipadyanta iti/ tathābhūtaviṣayakaṃ hi pramāṇam iti/ imau khalu niyogapratiṣedhau bhavatā deśitau kācābhrapaṭalādivad vā kuḍyādibhir apratighāto bhavatu kuḍyādivad vā kācābhrapaṭalādibhir apratighāto mā bhūd iti/ na, dṛṣṭānumitāḥ khalv ime dravyadharmāḥ, pratighātāpratighātayor hy upalabdhī vyavasthāpike/ vyavahitānupalabdhyānumīyate kuḍyādibhiḥ pratighātaḥ, vyavahitopalabdhyānumīyate kācābhrapaṭalādibhir apratighāta
GSP29nysvbh1u:2035: athāpi khalv ekam idam indriyaṃ bahūnīndriyāṇi vā? kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2036: NyS_3,1.52: sthānānyatve nānātvād avayavinānāsthānatvāc ca saṃśayaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2037: bahūni dravyāṇi nānāsthānāni dṛśyante, nānāsthānaś ca sann eko 'vayavī
GSP29nysvbh1u:2041: tvag ekam indriyam ity āha/ kasmāt? avyatirekāt/ na tvacā kiñcid
GSP29nysvbh1u:2042: indriyādhiṣṭhānaṃ na prāptam, na cāsatyāṃ tvaci kiñcid viṣayagrahaṇaṃ bhavati, yayā satvendriyasthānāni vyāptāni yasyāṃ ca satyāṃ viṣayagrahaṇaṃ bhavati sā tvag ekam indriyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2044: gṛhyamāṇe tvagindriyeṇa sparśe indriyāntarārthā rūpādayo na gṛhyante
GSP29nysvbh1u:2045: andhādibhiḥ/ na sparśagrāhakāt indriyād indriyāntaram astīti sparśavad
GSP29nysvbh1u:2046: andhādibhir gṛhyeran rūpādayaḥ, na ca gṛhyante tasmān naikam indriyaṃ tvag
GSP29nysvbh1u:2048: tvagavayavaviśeṣeṇa dhūmopalabdhivat tadupalabdhiḥ/ yathā tvaco 'vayavaviśeṣaḥ kaścic cakṣuṣi sannikṛṣṭo dhūmasparśaṃ gṛhṇāti nānyaḥ, evaṃ tvaco 'vayavaviśeṣā rūpādigrāhakās teṣām upaghātād andhādibhir na gṛhyante
GSP29nysvbh1u:2049: rūpādaya iti/ vyāhatatvād ahetuḥ/ tvagavyatirekād ekam indriyam ity uktvā ``tvag avayavaviśeṣeṇa dhūmopalabdhivad rūpādyupalabdhir'' ity ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2050: evaṃ ca sati nānābhūtāni viṣayagrāhakāṇi viṣayavyavasthānāt tadbhāve viṣayagrahaṇasya bhāvāt tadupaghāte cābhāvāt, tathā ca pūrvo vāda uttareṇa vādeṇa vyāhanyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2051: sandigdhaś cāvyatirekaḥ/ pṛthivyādibhir api bhūtair indriyādhiṣṭhānāni
GSP29nysvbh1u:2052: vyāptāni, na ca teṣv asatsu viṣayagrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti/ tasmān na tvag anyad vā sarvaviṣayam ekam indriyam iti//53//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2054: ātmā manasā sambadhyate, mana indriyeṇa, indriyaṃ sarvārthaiḥ sannikṛṣṭam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2055: iti, ātmendriyamanorthasannikarṣebhyo yugapad grahaṇāni syuḥ/ na ca yugapad rūpādayo gṛhyante tasmān naikam indriyaṃ sarvaviṣayam astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2056: asāhacaryāc ca viṣayagrahaṇānāṃ naikam indriyaṃ sarvaviṣayakam, sāhacarye hi viṣayagrahaṇānām andhādyanupapattir iti//54//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2057: NyS_3,1.55: vipratiṣedhāc ca na tvag ekā ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2058: na khalu tvag ekam indriyaṃ vyāghātāt --- tvacā rūpāṇy aprāptāni gṛhyanta ity aprāpyakāritve sparśādiṣv apy evaṃ prasaṅgaḥ/ sparśādīnāṃ ca prāptānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2059: grahaṇād rūpādīnāṃ prāptānāṃ grahaṇam iti prāptam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2060: prāpyāprāpyakāritvam iti cet? āvaraṇānupapatter viṣayamātrasya grahaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2061: athāpi manyeta prāptāḥ sparśādayas tvacā gṛhyante rūpāṇi tv aprāptānīti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2062: evaṃ sati nāsty āvaraṇam, āvaraṇānupapatteś ca rūpamātrasya grahaṇaṃ vyavahitasya cāvyavahitasya ceti/ dūrāntikānuvidhānaṃ ca rūpopalabdhyanupalabdhyor na syāt/ aprāptaṃ tvacā gṛhyate rūpam iti dūre
GSP29nysvbh1u:2063: rūpasyāgrahaṇam antike ca grahaṇam ity etan na syād iti//55//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2064: pratiṣedhāc ca nānātvasiddhau sthāpanāhetur apy upādīyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2066: arthaḥ prayojanam, tat pañcavidham indriyāṇām, sparśanenendriyeṇa sparśagrahaṇe sati na tenaiva rūpaṃ gṛhyata iti rūpagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2068: % tenaiva rūpaṃ gṛhyata iti rūpagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ cakṣur anumīyate/] p.788
GSP29nysvbh1u:2069: sparśarūpagrahaṇe ca tābhyām eva na gandho gṛhyata iti gandhagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ ghrāṇam anumīyate/ trayāṇāṃ grahaṇe na tair eva raso gṛhyata iti rasagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ rasanam anumīyate/ na ca caturṇāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2070: grahaṇe tair eva śabdaḥ śrūyata iti śabdagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ śrotram anumīyate/ evam indriyaprayojanasyānitaretarasādhanasādhyatvāt NyS_3,1.57: na, tadarthabahutvāt ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2071: na khalv indriyārthapañcatvāt pañcendriyāṇīti sidhyati/ kasmāt? teṣām arthānāṃ bahutvāt/ bahavaḥ khalv ime indriyārthāḥ, sparśās tāvat śītoṣnānuṣṇāśītā iti/ rūpāṇi śuklaharitādīni/ gandhā iṣṭāniṣṭopekṣaṇīyāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2072: rasāḥ kaṭukādayaḥ, śabdā varṇātmāno dhvanimātrāś ca bhinnāḥ/ tad yasyendriyārthapañcatvāt pañcendriyāṇi tasyendriyārthabahutvād bahūni indriyāṇi prasajyanta iti//57//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2074: gandhatvādibhiḥ svasāmānyaiḥ kṛtavyavasthānāṃ gandhādīnāṃ yāni gandhādigrahaṇāni tāny asamānasādhanasādhyatvād grāhakāntarāṇi na prayojayanti/ arthasamūho 'numānamukto nārthaikadeśaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2076: arthaikadeśaṃ cāśritya viṣayapañcatvamātraṃ bhavān pratiṣedhati tasmād ayukto 'yaṃ pratiṣedha
GSP29nysvbh1u:2077: kathaṃ punar gandhatvādibhiḥ svasāmānyaiḥ kṛtavyavasthā gandhādaya iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2078: sparśaḥ khalv ayaṃ trividhaḥ śīta uṣṇo 'nuṣṇāśītaś ca sparśatvena svasāmānyena saṃgṛhītaḥ/ gṛhyamāṇe ca śītasparśe noṣṇasyānuṣṇāśītasya vā sparśasya grahaṇaṃ grāhakāntaraṃ prayojayati sparśabhedānām ekasādhanasādhyatvād yenaiva śītasparśo gṛhyate tenaivetarāv apīti/ evaṃ gandhatvena gandhānām, rūpatvena rūpāṇām, rasatvena rasānām, śabdatvena śabdānām iti/ gandhādigrahaṇāni punar asamānasādhanasādhyatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2082: viṣayatvena hi sāmānyena gandhādayaḥ saṅgṛhītā iti//59//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2084: na khalu viṣayatvena sāmānyena kṛtavyavasthā viṣayā grāhakāntaranirapekṣā ekasādhanagrāhyā anumīyante, anumīyante ca pañca gandhādayo gandhatvādibhiḥ svasāmānyaiḥ kṛtavyavasthā indriyāntaragrāhyāḥ, tasmād asambaddham etat/ ayam eva cārtho 'nūdyate buddhilakṣaṇapañcatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2085: buddhaya eva lakṣaṇāni viṣayagrahaṇaliṅgatvāt indriyāṇām, tad etat ``indriyārthapañcatvāt'' ity etasmin sūtre kṛtabhāṣyam iti/ tasmād buddhilakṣaṇapañcatvāt pañcendriyāṇi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2086: adhiṣṭhānāny api khalu pañcendriyāṇām, sarvaśarīrādhiṣṭhānaṃ sparśanaṃ sparśagrahaṇaliṅgam, kṛṣṇasārādhiṣṭhānaṃ cakṣuḥ bahirniḥsṛtaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2091: rūpādhikaraṇāni dravyāṇi prāpnoti/ sparśanādīni tv indriyāṇi viṣayā evāśrayopasarpaṇāt pratyāsīdanti/ santānavṛttyā śabdasya śrotrapratyāsattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2092: ākṛtiḥ khalu parimāṇam iyattā sā pañcadhā/ svasthānamātrāṇi ghrāṇarasanasparśanāni viṣayagrahaṇenānumeyāni/ cakṣuḥ kṛṣṇasārāśrayaṃ bahirniḥsṛtaṃ viṣayavyāpi/ śrotraṃ nānyad ākāśāt, tac ca vibhu
GSP29nysvbh1u:2093: śabdamātrānubhavānumeyaṃ puruṣasaṃskāropagrahaṇāc cādhiṣṭhānaniyamena śabdasya vyañjakam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2094: jātir iti yoniṃ pracakṣate/ pañca khalv indriyayonayaḥ pṛthivyādīni
GSP29nysvbh1u:2095: bhūtāni, tasmāt prakṛtipañcatvād api pañcendriyāṇīti siddham//60//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2098: dṛṣṭo hi vāyvādīnāṃ bhūtānāṃ guṇaviśeṣābhivyaktiniyamaḥ/ vāyuḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2099: sparśavyañjakaḥ, āpo rasavyañjikāḥ, tejo rūpavyañjakam, pārthivaṃ kiñcid dravyaṃ kasyacid dravyasya gandhavyañjakam/ asti cāyam indriyāṇāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2101: gandhādayaḥ pṛthivyādiguṇā ity uddiṣṭam uddeśaś ca pṛthivyādīnām ekaguṇatve cānekaguṇatve ca samāna ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2104: sparśaparyantānām iti vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ/ ākāśasyottaraḥ śabdaḥ sparśaparyantebhya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2106: kathaṃ tarhi tarabnirdeśaḥ? svatantraviniyogasāmarthyāt/ tenottaraśabdasya parārthābhidhānaṃ vijñāyate/ uddeśasūtre hi sparśaparyantebhyaḥ paraḥ śabda iti/ tantraṃ vā sparśasya vivakṣitatvāt --- sparśaparyanteṣu niyukteṣu yo 'nyas taduttaraḥ śabda iti//62-63//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2108: nāyaṃ guṇaniyogaḥ sādhuḥ/ kasmāt? yasya bhūtasya ye guṇā na te
GSP29nysvbh1u:2109: tadātmakenendriyeṇa sarve upalabhyante/ pārthivena hi ghrāṇena
GSP29nysvbh1u:2110: sparśaparyantā na gṛhyante gandha eva eko gṛhyate evaṃ śeṣeṣv apīti//64//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2113: gandhādīnām ekaiko yathākramaṃ pṛthivyādīnām ekaikasya guṇaḥ, ataḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2116: ghrāṇena rasarūpasparśānāṃ rasanena rūpasparśayoḥ cakṣuṣā sparśasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2117: kathaṃ tarhy anekaguṇāni bhūtāni gṛhyanta iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2118: saṃsargāc cānekaguṇagrahaṇam/ abādisaṃsargāc ca pṛthivyāṃ rasādayo gṛhyante evaṃ śeṣeṣv apīti//65//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2119: niyamas tarhi na prāpnoti saṃsargasyāniyamāt caturguṇā pṛthivī triguṇā āpo dviguṇaṃ teja ekaguṇo vāyur iti/ niyamaś copapadyate/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2121: pṛthivyādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvam uttareṇottareṇa viṣṭam ataḥ saṃsarganiyama iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2124: neti trisūtrīṃ pratyācaṣṭe/ kasmāt? pārthivasya dravyasyāpy asya ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:2125: pratyakṣaṭvāt/ mahatvānekadravyatvād rūpāc copalabdhir iti taijasam eva
GSP29nysvbh1u:2126: dravyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syāt na pārthivam āpyaṃ vā rūpābhāvāt/ taijasavat tu pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt na saṃsargād anekaguṇagrahaṇaṃ bhūtānām iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2127: bhūtāntararūpakṛtaṃ ca pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ bruvataḥ pratyakṣo vāyuḥ prasajyate niyame vā kāraṇam ucyatām iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2128: rasayor vā pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt --- pārthivo rasaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ, āpyo madhura eva; na caitat saṃsargād bhavtitum arhati/ rūpayor vā pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt taijasarūpānugṛhītayoḥ, saṃsarge hi vyañjakam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2129: eva rūpaṃ na vyaṅgyam astīti/ ekānekavidhatve ca pārthivāpyayoḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2131: āpyaṃ tu śuklam aprakāśakam, na caitad ekaguṇānāṃ saṃsarge saty upapadyata
GSP29nysvbh1u:2132: iti/ udāharaṇamātraṃ caitat, ataḥ paraṃ prapañcaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2134: sparśaḥ, uṣṇas taijasaḥ pratyakṣaḥ, na caitad ekaguṇānām
GSP29nysvbh1u:2136: atha vā pārthivāpyayor dravyayor vyvasthitaguṇayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2137: caturguṇaṃ pārthivaṃ dravyaṃ triguṇam āpyaṃ pratyakṣam, tena tatkāraṇam anumīyate tathābhūtam iti/ tasya kāryaṃ liṅgaṃ kāraṇabhāvād dhi kāryabhāva
GSP29nysvbh1u:2138: iti/ evaṃ taijasavāyavyayor dravyayoḥ pratyakṣatvād guṇavyavasthāyāḥ tatkāraṇe dravye vyavasthānumānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2139: dṛṣṭaś ca vivekaḥ pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt/ pārthivaṃ dravyam abādibhir viyuktaṃ pratyakṣato
GSP29nysvbh1u:2141: āpyaṃ ca parābhyām, taijasaṃ ca vāyunā, na caikaikaguṇaṃ gṛhyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2142: niranumānaṃ tu ``viṣṭaṃ hy aparaṃ pareṇa'' ity etad iti/ nātra liṅgam anumāpakaṃ gṛhyata iti yenaitad evaṃ pratipadyemahi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2143: yac coktaṃ viṣṭaṃ hy aparaṃ pareṇeti bhūtasṛṣṭau veditavyaṃ na sāmpratam iti niyamakāraṇābhāvād ayuktam/ dṛṣṭaṃ ca sāmpratam aparaṃ pareṇa viṣṭam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2144: iti, vāyunā ca viṣṭaṃ teja iti/ viṣṭatvaṃ saṃyogaḥ, sa ca dvayoḥ samānaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2145: vāyunā ca viṣṭatvāt sparśavat tejo na tu tejasā viṣṭatvād rūpavān vāyur iti niyamakāraṇaṃ nāstīti/ dṛṣṭaṃ ca taijasena sparśena vāyavyasya sparśasyābhibhavād agrahaṇam iti, na ca tenaiva tasyābhibhava iti//67//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2146: tad evaṃ nyāyaviruddhaṃ pravādaṃ pratiṣidhya ``na sarvaguṇānupalabdher''
GSP29nysvbh1u:2149: tasmān na sarvaguṇopalabdhiḥ, ghrāṇādīnāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ gandhāder guṇasyotkarṣāt tat tat pradhānam/ kā pradhānatā? viṣayagrāhakatvam/ ko
GSP29nysvbh1u:2150: guṇotkarṣaḥ? abhivyaktau samarthatvam/ yathā bāhyānāṃ pārthivāpyataijasānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ caturguṇatriguṇadviguṇānāṃ na sarvaguṇavyañjakatvaṃ gandharasarūpotkarṣāt tu yathākramaṃ gandharasarūpavyañjakatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2152: evaṃ ghrāṇa rasanacakṣuṣā.ṃ caturguṇatriguṇadviguṇānāṃ na sarvaguṇagrāhakatvam, gandharasarūpotkarṣāt tu yathākramaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2153: gandharasarūpagrāhakatvam/ tasmād ghrāṇādibhir na sarveṣāṃ guṇānām upalabdhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2154: yas tu pratijānīte gandhaguṇatvād ghrāṇaṃ gandhasya grāhakam evaṃ rasanādiṣv apīti, tasya yathāguṇayogaṃ ghrāṇādibhir guṇagrahaṇaṃ prasajyata iti//68//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2155: kiṃkṛtaṃ punar vyavasthānam --- kiñcit pārthivam indriyaṃ na sarvāṇi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2158: arthanirvṛttisamarthasya pravibhaktasya dravyasya saṃsargaḥ puruṣasaṃskārakārito bhūyastvam/ dṛṣṭo hi prakarṣe bhūyastvaśabdaḥ, yathā prakṛṣṭo viṣayo bhūyān ity ucyate/ yathā pṛthagarthakriyāsamarthāni puruṣasaṃskāravaśād viṣauṣadhimaṇiprabhṛtīni dravyāṇi nirvartyante, na sarvaṃ sarvārtham; evaṃ pṛthagviṣayagrahaṇasamarthāni ghrāṇādīni
GSP29nysvbh1u:2160: svaguṇān nopalabhanta indriyāṇi/ kasmād iti cet?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2162: svān gandhādīn nopalabhante ghrāṇādīni/ kena kāraṇeneti cet? svaguṇaiḥ saha ghrāṇādīnām indriyabhāvāt/ ghrāṇaṃ svena gandhena samānārthakāriṇā saha bāhyaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇāti tasya svagandhagrahaṇaṃ sahakārivaikalyān na
GSP29nysvbh1u:2164: yadi punar gandhaḥ sahakārī ca syād ghrāṇasya grāhyaś cety ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2166: na guṇopalabdhir indriyāṇām/ yo brūte --- yathā bāhyaṃ dravyaṃ cakṣuṣā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2167: (corr.; cakṣaṣā, ed.) gṛhyate tathā tenaiva cakṣuṣā tad eva cakṣur gṛhyatām iti, tādṛṅ idam; tulyo hy ubhayatra pratipattihetvabhāva
GSP29nysvbh1u:2169: svaguṇān nopalabhanta indriyāṇīti etan na bhavati/ upalabhyate hi svaguṇaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2172: na śabdena guṇena saguṇam ākāśam indriyaṃ bhavati/ na śabdaḥ śabdasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2173: vyañjakaḥ, na ca ghrāṇādīnāṃ svaguṇagrahaṇaṃ pratyakṣam, nāpy anumīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2174: anumīyate tu śrotreṇākāśena śabdasya grahaṇam, śabdaguṇatvaṃ ca ākāśasyeti/ pariśeṣaś cānumānaṃ veditavyam/ ātmā tāvat śrotā na karaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2175: manasaḥ śrotratve badhiratvābhāvaḥ, pṛthivyādīnāṃ ghrāṇādibhāve sāmarthyam, śrotrabhāve
GSP29nysvbh1u:2177: asti cedaṃ śrotram ākāśaṃ ca śiṣyate, pariśeṣād ākāśaṃ śrotram iti//73//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2180: parīkṣitānīndriyāṇy arthāś ca, buddher idānīṃ parīkṣākramaḥ, sā kim anityā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2183: asparśavattvaṃ tābhyāṃ samāno dharma upalabhyate buddhau, viśeṣaś
GSP29nysvbh1u:2184: copajanāpāyadharmavattvam, viparyayaś ca yathāsvam anityanityayos tasyāṃ buddau nopalabhyate, tena saṃśaya iti//1//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2185: anupapannarūpaḥ khalv ayaṃ saṃśayaḥ/ sarvaśarīriṇāṃ hi pratyātmavedanīyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2188: bhavati ca saṃvittiḥ --- jñāsyāmi jānāmi ajñāsiṣam iti/ na copajanāpāyāv antareṇa traikālyavyāktiḥ, tataś ca traikālyavyakter anityā buddhir ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:2189: etat śiddham/ pramāṇasiddhaṃ cedaṃ śāstare 'py uktam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2192: dṛṣṭipravādopālambhārthan tu prakaraṇam/ evaṃ hi paśyantaḥ pravadanti sāṅkhyāḥ --- puruṣasyāntaḥkaraṇabhūtā nityā buddhir iti/ sādhanaṃ ca pracakṣate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2194: kiṃ punar idaṃ pratyabhijñānam? yaṃ pūrvam ajñāsiṣam arthaṃ tam imaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2195: jānāmīti jñānyoḥ samāne 'rthe pratisandhijñānaṃ pratyabhijñānam, etac cāvasthitāyā buddher upapannam/ nānātve tu buddhibhedeṣūtpannāpavargiṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:2198: yathā khalu nityatvaṃ buddheḥ sādhyam evaṃ pratyabhijñānam apīti/ kiṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2199: kāraṇam? cetanadharmasya karaṇe 'nupapattiḥ/ puruṣadharmaḥ khalv ayaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2200: jñānaṃ darśanam upalabdhir bodhaḥ pratyayaḥ adhyavasāya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2202: cetano hi pūrvajñātam arthaṃ pratyabhijānāti, tasyaitasmād dhetor nityatvaṃ yuktam iti/ karaṇacaitanyābhyupagame tu cetanasvarūpaṃ vacanīyaṃ nānirdiṣṭasvarūpam ātmāntaraṃ śakyam astīti pratipattum/ jñānaṃ ced buddher antaḥkaraṇasyābhyupagamyate cetanasyedānīṃ kiṃ svarūpaṃ ko dharmaḥ kiṃ tattvam? jñānena ca buddhau vartamānenāyaṃ cetanaḥ kiṃ karotīti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2203: cetayate iti cet na, jñānād arthāntaravacanam --- puruṣaś cetayate buddhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:2204: jānātīti nedaṃ jñānād arthāntaram ucyate, cetayate jānīte buddhyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:2205: paśyati upalabhate ity eko 'yam artha iti/ buddhir jñpayatīti cet addhā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2206: --- jānīte puruṣo buddhir jñāpayatīti satyam etat/ evaṃ cābhyupagame jñānaṃ puruṣasyeti siddhaṃ bhavati na buddher antaḥkaraṇasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2207: pratipuruṣaṃ ca śabdāntaravyavasthāpratijñāne pratiṣedhahetuvacanam/ yaś ca pratijānīte --- kaścit puruṣaś cetayate, kaścid buddhyate, kaścid
GSP29nysvbh1u:2208: upalabhate, kaścit paśyatīti; puruṣāntarāṇi khalv imāni cetano boddhopalabdhā draṣṭeti naikasyaite dharmā iti atra kaḥ pratiṣedhahetur
GSP29nysvbh1u:2210: arthasyābheda iti cet samānam/ abhinnārthā ete śabdā iti tatra vyavasthānupapattir ity evaṃ cen manyase, samānaṃ bhavati --- puruṣaś cetayate buddhir jānīte ity atrāpy artho na bhidyate tatrobhayoś cetanatvād anyataralopa iti/ yadi punar budhyate 'nayeti bodhanaṃ buddhiḥ mana evocyate tac ca nityam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2212: astv etad evam, na tu manaso viṣayapratyabhijñānān nityatvam/ dṛṣṭaṃ hi karaṇabhede jñātur ekatvāt pratyabhijñānaṃ `savyadṛṣṭasyetareṇa
GSP29nysvbh1u:2214: cakṣurvat pradīpavac ca; pradīpāntaradṛṣṭasya pradīpāntareṇa pratyabhijñānam iti/ tasmāj jñātur ayaṃ nityatve hetur iti//3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2215: yac ca manyate buddher avasthitāyā yathāviṣayaṃ vṛttayo jñānāni niścaranti vṛttiś ca vṛttimato nānyeti, tac ca ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2217: vṛttivṛttimator ananyatve vṛttimato 'vasthānād vṛttīnām avasthānam iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2218: yānīmāni viṣayagrahaṇāni tāny avatiṣṭanta iti yugapad viṣayāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ prasajyata iti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2220: atīte ca pratyabhijñāne vṛttimān apy atīta ity antaḥkaraṇasya vināśaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2222: avibhu caikaṃ manaḥ paryāyeṇendriyaiḥ saṃyujyata iti ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2226: apratyabhijñānam anupalabdhiḥ/ anupalabdhiś ca kasyācid arthasya viṣayāntaravyāsakte manasy upapadyate vṛttivṛttimator nānātvāt, ekatve hi anarthako vyāsaṅga iti//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2229: prāptānīndriyāṇy antaḥkaraṇeneti prāptyarthasya gamanasyābhāvaḥ/ tatra kramavṛttitvābhāvād ayugapad grahaṇānupapattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2230: gatyabhāvāc ca pratiṣiddhaṃ vibhuno 'ntaḥkaraṇasyāyugapadgrahaṇaṃ na liṅgāntareṇānumīyate iti/ yathā cakṣuṣo gatiḥ pratiṣiddhā sannikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭayos tulyakālagrahaṇāt pāṇicandramasor vyavadhānena pratīghāte so'numīyata iti so 'yaṃ nāntaḥ karaṇe vivādo na tasya nityatve/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2231: % karaṇe vivādo na tasya nityatve] p.819
GSP29nysvbh1u:2232: siddhaṃ hi mano 'ntaḥkaraṇaṃ nityaṃ ceti/ kva tarhi vivādaḥ? tasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2233: vibhutve, tac ca pramāṇato 'nupalabdheḥ pratiṣiddham iti/ ekaṃ cāntaḥkaraṇaṃ nānā caitā jñānātmakā vṛttayaḥ, cakṣurvijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ rūpavijñānaṃ gandhavijñānam/ etac ca vṛttivṛttimator ekatve
GSP29nysvbh1u:2234: 'nupapannam iti/ puruṣo jānīte nāntaḥkaraṇam iti/ etena viṣayāntaravyāsaṅgaḥ pratyuktaḥ/ viṣayāntaragrahaṇalakṣaṇo viṣayāntaravyāsaṅgaḥ puruṣasya nāntaḥkaraṇasyeti, kenacid indriyeṇa sannidhiḥ kenacid asannidhir ity ayaṃ tu vyāsaṅgo 'nujñāyate manasa
GSP29nysvbh1u:2235: ekam antaḥkaraṇaṃ nānā vṛttaya iti/ saty abhede vṛtter idam ucyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2237: tasyāṃ vṛttau nānātvābhimānaḥ, yathā dravyāntaropahite sphaṭike
GSP29nysvbh1u:2238: anyatvābhimāno nīlo lohita iti; evaṃ viṣayāntaropadhānād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2239: na hetvabhāvāt/ sphaṭikānyatvābhimānavad ayaṃ jñāneṣu nānātvābhimāno gauṇo na punar gandhādyanyatvābhimānavad iti hetur nāsti hetvabhāvād anupapanna iti/ samāno hetvabhāva iti cet na jñānānāṃ krameṇopajanāpāyadarśanāt krameṇa hīndriyārtheṣu jñānāny upajāyante cāpayanti ceti dṛśyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2241: tasmād gandhādyanyatvābhimānavad ayaṃ jñāneṣu nānātvābhimāna iti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2242: sphaṭikānyatvābhimānavad ity etad amṛṣyamāṇaḥ kṣaṇikavādy āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2243: NyS_3,2.10: sphaṭike 'py aparāparotpatteḥ kṣaṇikatvād vyaktīnām ahetuḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2244: sphaṭikasyābhedenāvasthitasyopadhānabhedān nānātvābhimāna ity ayam avidyamānahetukaḥ pakṣaḥ/ kasmāt? sphaṭike 'py aparāparotpatteḥ/ sphaṭike
GSP29nysvbh1u:2245: 'pi anyā vyaktaya utpadyante anyā nirudhyanta iti/ katham? kṣaṇikatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2246: vyaktīnām/ kṣaṇaś cālpīyān kālaḥ kṣaṇasthitikāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ/ kathaṃ punar gamyate kṣaṇikā vyaktaya iti? upacayāpacayaprabandhadarśanāc charīrādiṣu/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2247: paktinirvṛttasyāhārarasasya śarīre rudhirādibhāvenopacayo 'pacayaś ca prabandhena pravarttate/ upacayād vyaktīnām utpādaḥ, apacayād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2248: vyaktinirodhaḥ/ evaṃ ca saty avayavapariṇāmabhedena vṛddhiḥ śarīrasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2249: kālāntare gṛhyate iti so 'yaṃ vyaktiviśeṣadharmo vyaktimātre veditavya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2251: sarvāsu vyaktiṣu upacayāpacayaprabandhaḥ śarīravad iti nāyaṃ niyamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2252: kasmāt? hetvabhāvāt/ nātra pratyakṣam anumānaṃ vā pratipādakam astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2253: tasmād yathādarśanam abhyanujñā/ yatra yatropacayāpacayaprabandho dṛśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2257: yathā śarīrādiṣu/ yatra yatra na dṛśyate tatra tatra pratyākhyāyate yathā grāvaprabhṛtiṣu/ sphaṭike 'py upacayāpacayaprabandho na dṛśyate, tasmād ayuktaṃ sphaṭike 'py aparāprotpattir iti/ yathā cārkasya kaṭukimnā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2258: sarvadravyāṇāṃ kaṭukimānām āpādayet tādṛg etad iti//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2259: yaś cāśeṣanirodhenāpūrvotpādaṃ niranvayaṃ dravyasantāne kṣaṇikatāṃ manyate tasyaitat ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2261: utpattikāraṇaṃ tāvad upalabhyate avayavopacayo valmīkādīnām, vināśakāraṇaṃ copalabhyate ghaṭādīnām
GSP29nysvbh1u:2263: yasya tv anapacitāvayavaṃ nirudhyate anupacitāvayavaṃ cotpadyate tasyāśeṣanirodhe niranvaye vāpūrvotpāde na kāraṇam ubhayatrāpy upalabhyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:2264: NyS_3,2.13: kṣīravināśe kāraṇānupalabdhivad dadhyutpattivac ca tadupapattiḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2265: yathānupalabhyamānaṃ kṣīravināśakāraṇaṃ dadhyutpattikāraṇaṃ cābhyanujñāyate tathā sphaṭike parāparāsu vyaktiṣu vināśakāraṇam utpādakāraṇaṃ cābhyanujñeyam iti//13//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2267: kṣīravināśaliṅgaṃ kṣīravināśakāraṇaṃ dadhyutpattiliṅgaṃ dadhyutpattikāraṇaṃ ca gṛhyate 'to nānupalabdhiḥ, viparyayas tu sphaṭikādiṣu dravyeṣu aparāparotpattau vyaktīnāṃ na liṅgam astīty anutpattir eveti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2270: payasaḥ pariṇāmo na vināśa ity eka āha/ pariṇāmaś cāvasthitasya dravyasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2272: guṇāntaraprādurbhāva ity apara āha/ satā dravyasya pūrvaguṇanivṛttau
GSP29nysvbh1u:2273: guṇāntaram utpadyata iti/ sa khalv ekapakṣībhāva iva//15//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2277: saṃmūrchanalakṣaṇād avayavavyūhād dravyāntare dadhni utpanne gṛhyamāṇe pūrvaṃ payodravyam avayavavibhāgebhyo nivṛttam ity anumīyate, yathā mṛdavayavānāṃ vyūhāntarād dravyāntare sthālyām utpannāyāṃ pūrvaṃ mṛtpiṇḍadravyaṃ mṛdavayavavibhāgebhyo nivarttate iti/ mṛdvac cāvayavānvayaḥ payodadhnor nāśeṣanirodhe niranvayo dravyāntarotpādo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2279: abhyanujñāya ca niṣkāraṇaṃ kṣīravināśaṃ dadhyutpādaṃ ca pratiṣedha ucyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2280: NyS_3,2.17: kvacid vināśakāraṇānupalabdheḥ kvacic copalabdher anekāntaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2281: kṣīradadhivan niṣkāraṇau vināśotpādau sphaṭikavyaktīnām iti nāyam ekānta
GSP29nysvbh1u:2282: iti/ kasmāt? hetvabhāvāt/ nātra hetur asti akāraṇau vināśotpādau sphaṭikādivyaktīnāṃ kṣīradadhivat, na punar yathā vināśakāraṇabhāvāt kumbhasya vināśa utpattikāraṇabhāvāc cotpattiḥ evaṃ sphaṭikādivyaktīnāṃ vināśotpattikāraṇabhāvād vināśotpattibhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2283: niradhiṣṭhānaṃ ca dṛṣṭāntavacanam/ gṛhyamāṇayor vināśotpādayoḥ sphaṭikādiṣu syād ayam āśrayavān dṛṣṭāntaḥ kṣīravināśakāraṇānupalabdhivad
GSP29nysvbh1u:2284: dadhyutpattivac ceti, tau tu na gṛhyete/ tasmān niradhiṣṭhāno 'yaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2286: abhyanujñāya ca sphaṭikasyotpādavināśau yo 'tra sādhakas tasyābhyanujñānād apratiṣedhaḥ/ kumbhavan na niṣkāraṇau vināśotpādau sphaṭikādīnām ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:2287: anujñeyo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratiṣeddham aśakyatvāt/ kṣīradadhivat tu niṣkāraṇau vināśotpādāv iti śakyo 'yaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ kāraṇato vināśotpattidarśanāt/ kṣīradadhnor vināśotpattī paśyatā tatkāraṇam anumeyaṃ kāryaliṅgaṃ hi kāraṇam iti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2288: upapannam anityā buddhir iti/ idaṃ tu cintyate kasyeyaṃ buddhir ātmeindriyamano 'rthānāṃ guṇa iti/ prasiddho 'pi khalv ayam arthaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2289: parīkaṣāśeṣaṃ pravarttayāmīti prakriyate/ so 'yaṃ buddhau sannikarṣotpatteḥ saṃśayaḥ viśeṣasyāgrahaṇād iti/ tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2291: nendriyāṇām vā guṇo jñānaṃ teṣāṃ vināśo 'pi jñānasya bhāvāt/ bhavati khalv idam indriye 'rthe ca vinaṣṭe jñānam adrākṣam iti/ na ca jñātari vinaṣthe jñānaṃ bhavitum arhati/ anyat khalu vai tad indriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ jñānaṃ yad indriyārthavināśe na bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2293: idam anyad ātmamanaḥsannikarṣajam, tasya yukto bhāva iti/smṛtiḥ khalv iyam adrākṣam iti pūrvadṛṣṭaviṣayā/ na ca vijñātari naṣṭe pūrvopalabdheḥ smaraṇaṃ yuktam, na cānyadṛṣṭam anyaḥ smarati/ na ca manasi jñātary abhyupagamyamāne śakyam indriyārthayor jñātṛtvaṃ pratipādayitum//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2295: NyS_3,2.19: yugapaj jñeyānupalabdheś ca na manasaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2296: yugapaj jñeyānupalabdhir antaḥkaraṇasya liṅgam, tatra yugapaj jṇeyānupalabdhyā yad anumīyate antaḥkaraṇam, na tasya guṇo jñānam/ kasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2298: vaśī jñātā vaśyaṃ karaṇam, jñānaguṇatve ca karaṇabhāvanivṛttiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2299: ghrāṇādisādhanasya ca jñātur gandhādijñānabhāvād anumīyate antaḥkaraṇasādhanasya sukhādijñānaṃ smṛtiś ceti/ tatra yaj jñānaguṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2300: manaḥ sa ātmā, yat tu sukhādyupalabdhisādhanam antaḥkaraṇaṃ manas tad iti saṃjñābhedamātraṃ nārthabheda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2301: yugapaj jñeyopalabdheś ca yogina iti vā cārthaḥ/ yogī khalu ṛddhau
GSP29nysvbh1u:2302: prādurbhūtāyāṃ vikaraṇadharmā nirmāya sendriyāṇi śarīrāntarāṇi teṣu yugapaj jñeyāny upalabhate/ tac caitad vibhau jñātary upapadyate nāṇau
GSP29nysvbh1u:2303: manasīti/ vibhutve vā manaso jñānasya nātmaguṇatvapratiṣedhaḥ/ vibhu ca manastadantaḥkaraṇabhūtam iti tasya sarvendriyair yugapat saṃyogād yugapaj jñānāny utpadyerann iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2305: vibhur ātmā sarvendriyaiḥ saṃyukta iti yugapaj jñānotpattiprasaṅga
GSP29nysvbh1u:2308: kāraṇam, tasya cāyaugapadyam aṇutvān manasaḥ/ ayaugapadyād anutpattir yugapaj jñānānām ātmaguṇatve 'pīti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2314: ``tadātmaguṇatve 'pi tulyam'' ity etad anena samuccīyate/ dvividho hi guṇanāśahetuḥ, guṇānām āśrayābhāvo virodhī ca guṇaḥ/ nityatvād ātmano 'nupapannaḥ pūrvaḥ, virodhī ca buddher guṇo na gṛhyate --- tasmād ātmaguṇatve sati buddher nityatvaprasaṅgaḥ//23//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2315: NyS_3,2.24: anityatvagrahād buddher buddhyantarād vināśaḥ śabdavat ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2316: anityā buddhir iti sarvaśarīriṇāṃ pratyātmavedanīyam etat/ gṛhyate ca buddhisantānaḥ tatra buddher buddhyantaraṃ virodhī guṇa ity anumīyate yathā śabdasantāne śabdaḥ śabdāntaravirodhīti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2317: asaṅkhyeyeṣu jñānakāriteṣu saṃskāreṣu smṛtihetuṣv ātmasamaveteṣv ātmamanasoś ca sannikarṣe samāne smṛtihetau sati na kāraṇasyāyaugapadyam astīti yugapat smṛtayaḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ yadi buddhir ātmaguṇaḥ syād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2319: NyS_3,2.25: jñānasamavetātmapradeśasannikarṣān manasaḥ smṛtyutpatter na yugapadutpattiḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2320: jñānasādhanaḥ saṃskāro jñānam ity ucyate jñānasaṃskṛtair ātmapradeśaiḥ paryāyeṇa manaḥ sannikṛṣyate/ ātmamanaḥsannikarṣāt smṛtayo 'pi paryāyeṇa
GSP29nysvbh1u:2322: sadehasyātmano manasā saṃyogo vipacyamānakarmāśayasahito jīvanam iṣyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2323: tatrāsya prāk prāyaṇād antaḥśarīre vartamānasya manasaḥ śarīrād bahirjñānasaṃskṛtair ātmapradeśaiḥ saṃyogo nopapadyata iti//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2325: vipacyamānakarmāśayamātraṃ jīvanam, evaṃ ca sati sādhyam antaḥśarīravṛttitvaṃ manasa iti//27//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2327: susmūrṣayā khalv ayaṃ manaḥ praṇidadhānaś cirād api kaṃcid arthaṃ smarati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2328: smarataś ca śarīradhāraṇaṃ dṛśyate/ ātmamanaḥsannikarṣajaś ca prayatno
GSP29nysvbh1u:2329: dvividhaḥ --- dhārakaḥ prerakaś ca, niḥsṛte ca śarīrād bahir manāsi dhārakasya prayatnasyābhāvād gurutvāt patanaṃ syāt śarīrasya smarata
GSP29nysvbh1u:2331: āśugati manaḥ tasya bahiḥśarīrātmapradeśena jñānasaṃskṛtena sannikarṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2332: pratyāgatasya ca prayatnotpādanam ubhayaṃ yujyata iti/ utpādya vā dhārakaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2333: prayatnaṃ śarīrān niḥsaraṇaṃ manasaḥ, atas tatropapannaṃ dhāraṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2335: kiñcit kṣipraṃ smaryate kiñcic cireṇa/ yadā cireṇa, tadā susmūrṣayā manasi
GSP29nysvbh1u:2336: dhāryamāṇe cintāprabandhe sati kasyacid arthasya liṅgabhūtasya cintanam ārādhitaṃ smṛtihetur bhavati/ tatraitac ciraniścarite manasi nopapadyata
GSP29nysvbh1u:2338: śarīrasaṃyogānapekṣaś cātmamanaḥsaṃyogo na smṛtihetuḥ śarīrasya bhogāyatanatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2339: upabhogāyatanaṃ puruṣasya jñātuḥ śarīraṃ na tato niścaritasya manasa ātmasaṃyogamātraṃ jñānasukhādīnām utpattau kalpate, kḷptau vā śarīravaiyarthyam iti//30//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2341: ātmapreraṇena vā manaso bahiḥ śarīrāt saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ syāt, yadṛcchayā vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2342: ākasmikatayā jñatayā vā manasaḥ? sarvathā cānupapattiḥ/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2343: smartavyatvāt, icchātaḥ smaraṇāj jñānāsambhavāc ca/ yadi tāvad ātmā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2344: amuṣyārthasya smṛtihetuḥ saṃskāraḥ amuṣminn ātmadeśe samavetas tena manaḥ saṃyujyatām iti manaḥ prerayati tadā smṛta evāsāv artho bhavati na
GSP29nysvbh1u:2345: smartavyaḥ/ na cātmapratyakṣa ātmapradeśaḥ saṃskāro vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2346: tatrānupapannātmapratyakṣeṇa saṃvittir iti/ susmūrṣayā cāyaṃ manaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2347: praṇidadhānaś cirād api kañcid arthaṃ smarati nākasmāt, jñatvaṃ ca manaso
GSP29nysvbh1u:2351: yadā khalv ayaṃ vyāsaktamanāḥ kvacid deśe śarkarayā kaṇṭakena vā pādavyathanam āpnoti tadā ātmamanaḥ saṃyogaviśeṣa eṣitavyaḥ, dṛṣṭaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ duḥkhavedanaṃ ceti/ tatrāyaṃ samānaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/ yadṛcchayā tu na
GSP29nysvbh1u:2352: viśeṣo nākasmikī kriyā nākasmikaḥ saṃyoga iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2353: karmādṛṣṭam upabhogārthaṃ kriyāhetur iti cet samānam/ karmādṛṣṭaṃ puruṣasthaṃ puruṣopabhogārthaṃ manasi kriyāhetuḥ evaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasaṃvedanaṃ ca sidhyatīty evaṃ cen manyase, samānam --- smṛtihetāv api saṃyogaviśeṣo bhavitum arhati/ tatra yad uktam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2354: ``ātmapreraṇayadṛcchājñatābhiś ca na saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ'' ity ayam apratiṣedha
GSP29nysvbh1u:2355: iti/ pūrvas tu pratiṣedho ``nāntaḥśarīravṛttitvān manasa'' iti//32//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2356: kaḥ khalv idānīṃ kāraṇayaugapadyasadbhāve yugapad asmaraṇasya hetur iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2358: yathā khalv ātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣaḥ saṃskāraś ca smṛtihetur evaṃ praṇidhānaṃ liṅgādijñānāni tāni ca na yugapadbhavanti tatkṛtā smṛtīnāṃ yugapad anutpattir iti/ pratibhavat tu praṇidhānādyanapekṣe smārte
GSP29nysvbh1u:2359: yaugapadyaprasaṅgaḥ/ yat khalv idaṃ prātibham iva jñānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2360: praṇidhānādyanapekṣaṃ smārttam utpadyate kadācit tasya yugapadutpattiprasaṅgo hetvabhāvāt/ sataḥ smṛtihetor asaṃvedanāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:2361: prātibhena samānābhimānaḥ/ bahvarthaviṣaye vai cintāprabandhe kaścid evārthaḥ kasyacit smṛtihetuḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2362: % cintāprabandhe kaścid evārthaḥ kasyacit smṛtihetuḥ,] p.864
GSP29nysvbh1u:2363: tasyānucintanāt tasya smṛtir bhavati/ na cāyaṃ smartā sarvaṃ smṛtihetuṃ saṃvedayate evaṃ me smṛtir utpanneti/ asaṃvedanāt prātibham iva jñānam idaṃ smārtam iti abhimanyate, na tv asti praṇidhānādyanapekṣaṃ smārtam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2364: prātibhe katham iti cet puruṣakarmaviśeṣād upabhogavan niyamaḥ/ prātibham idānīṃ jñānaṃ yugapat kasmān notpadyate? yathopabhogārthaṃ karma yugapadupabhogaṃ na karoti evaṃ puruṣakarmaviśeṣaḥ pratibhāhetur na yugapad anekaṃ prātibhaṃ jñānam utpādayati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2365: hetvabhāvād ayuktam iti cet, na karaṇasya pratyayaparyāye sāmarthyāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2366: ``upabhogavan niyama'' ity asti dṛṣṭānto hetur nāstīti cen manyase? na,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2367: karaṇasya pratyayaparyāye sāmarthyāt/ naikasmin jñeye yugapad anekaṃ jñānam utpadyate, na cānekasmin/ tad idaṃ dṛṣṭena pratyayaparyāyeṇānumeyaṃ karaṇasāmarthyam itthambhūtam iti na jñātuḥ vikaraṇadharmaṇo dehanānātve pratyayayaugapadyād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2368: % pratyayaparyāyeṇānumeyaṃ karaṇasāmarthyam itthambhūtam iti na jñātuḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2370: ayaṃ ca dvitīyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ, avasthitaśarīrasya cānekajñānasamavāyād ekapradeśe yugapad anekārthasmaraṇaṃ syāt/ kvacid deśe 'vasthitaśarīrasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2371: jñātur indriyārthaprabandhena jñānam anekam ekasminn ātmapradeśe
GSP29nysvbh1u:2372: samavaiti/ tena yadā manaḥ saṃyujyate tadā jñātapūrvasyānekasya yugapat smaraṇaṃ prasajyate pradeśasaṃyogaparyāyābhāvād iti/ ātmapradeśānām adravyāntaratvād ekārthasamavāyasyāviśeṣe sati
GSP29nysvbh1u:2374: śabdasantāne tu śrotrādhiṣṭhānapratyāsattyā śabdaśravaṇavat saṃskārapratyāsattyā manasaḥ smṛtyutpatter na yugapad utpattiprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2375: pūrva eva tu pratiṣedho nānekajñānasamavāyād ekapradeśe yugapat smṛtiprasaṅga iti//33//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2376: puruṣadharmo jñānam antaḥkaraṇasyecchādveṣaprayatnasukhaduḥkhāni dharmā iti kasyacid darśanam, tat pratiṣidhyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2378: ayaṃ khalu jānāti tāvad idaṃ me sukhasādhanam idaṃ me duḥkhasādhanam iti jñātvā svasya sukhasādhanam āptum icchati, duḥkhasādhanaṃ hātum icchati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2380: jihāsāprayuktasya duḥkhasādhanaparivarjanaṃ nivṛttiḥ, evaṃ jñānecchāprayatnadveṣasukhaduḥkhānām ekenābhisambandhaḥ/ ekakartṛkatvaṃ jñānecchāpravṛttīnāṃ samānāśrayatvaṃ ca/ tasmāj jñasyecchādveṣaprayatnasukhaduḥkhāni dharmā nācetanasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2381: ārambhanivṛttyoś ca pratyagātmani dṛṣṭatvāt paratrānumānaṃ veditavyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2384: ārambhanivṛttiliṅgāv icchādveṣāv iti yasyārambhanivṛttī tasyecchādveṣau tasya jñānam iti prāptaṃ pārthivāpy ataijasavāyavīyānāṃ śarīrāṇām ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣajñānair yoga iti NyS_3,2.36: paraśvādiṣv ārambhanivṛttidarśanāt ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2385: śarīre caitanyanivṛttiḥ/ ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣajñānair yoga iti prāptaṃ paraśvādeḥ karaṇasyārambhanivṛttidarśanāc caitanyam iti/ atha śarīrasyecchādibhir yogaḥ, paraśvādes tu karaṇasyārambhanivṛttī
GSP29nysvbh1u:2386: vyabhicarataḥ, na tarhy ayaṃ hetuḥ pārthivāpy ataijasavāyavīyānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2388: ayaṃ tarhy anyo 'rthaḥ --- talliṅgatvād icchādveṣayoḥ pārthivādyeṣv
GSP29nysvbh1u:2389: apratiṣedhaḥ/ pṛthivyādīnāṃ bhūtānām ārambhas tāvat trasasthāvaraśarīreṣu tadavayavavyūhaliṅgaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ loṣṭādiṣu ca liṅgābhāvāt pravṛttiviśeṣābhāvo nivṛttiḥ/ ārambhanivṛttiliṅgāv icchādveṣāv iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2390: pārthivādyeṣv aṇuṣu taddarśanād icchādveṣayogas tadyogāj jñānayoga iti siddhaṃ bhūtacaitanyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2391: kumbhādiṣv anupalabdher ahetuḥ/ kumbhādimṛdavayavānāṃ vyūhaliṅgaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣa ārambhaḥ, sikatādiṣu pravṛttiviśeṣābhāvo nivṛttiḥ/ na ca mṛtsikatānām ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣaprayatnajñānair yogaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2392: tasmāt talliṅgatvād icchādveṣayor ity ahetur iti//36//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2397: kiṃ tarhi? prayojyāśraye/ tatra prayujyamāneṣu bhūteṣu pravṛttinivṛttī staḥ na sarveṣv ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:2398: yasya tu jñatvād bhūtānām icchādveṣanimitte ārambhanivṛttī svāśraye tasya niyamaḥ syāt, yathā bhūtānāṃ guṇāntaranimittā pravṛttir guṇapratibandhāc ca nivṛttir bhūtamātre bhavati niyamena, evaṃ bhūtamātre jñānecchādveṣanimitte pravṛttinivṛttī svāśraye syātām, na tu bhavataḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2399: tasmāt prayojakāśritā jñānecchādveṣaprayatnāḥ, prayojyāśraye tu pravṛttinivṛttīti siddham/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2400: ekaśarīre tu jñātṛbahutvaṃ niranumānam/ bhūtacaitanikasyaikaśarīre bahūni bhūtāni jñānecchādveṣaprayatnaguṇānīti jñātṛbahutvaṃ prāptam/ om iti bruvataḥ pramāṇaṃ nāsti, yathā nānāśarīreṣu nānā jñātāro
GSP29nysvbh1u:2401: buddhyādiguṇavyavasthānāt, evam ekaśarīre 'pi buddhyādivyavasthānumānaṃ syāj jñātṛbahutvasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2402: dṛṣṭaś ca anyaguṇanimittaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣo bhūtānāṃ so 'numānam anyatrāpi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2403: dṛṣṭaḥ karaṇalakṣaṇeṣu bhūteṣu paraśvādiṣu upādānalakṣaṇeṣu ca mṛtprabhṛtiṣv anyaguṇanimittaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ/ so 'numānam anyatrāpi
GSP29nysvbh1u:2405: anyaguṇanimitta iti/ sa ca guṇaḥ prayatnasamānāśrayaḥ saṃskāro dharmādharmasamākhyātaḥ sarvārthaḥ puruṣārthārādhanāya prayojako bhūtānāṃ prayatnavad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2406: ātmāstitvahetubhir ātmanityatvahetubhiś ca bhūtacaitanyapratiṣedhaḥ kṛto veditavyaḥ/ ``nendriyārthayos tadvināśe 'pi jjānāvasthānād''iti ca samānaḥ pratiṣedha iti/ kriyāmātraṃ kriyoparamamātraṃ cārambhanivṛttī ity abhipretyoktam ``talliṅgatvād icchādveṣayoḥ pārthivādyeṣv apratiṣedhaḥ''/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2407: anyathā tv ime ārambhanivṛttī ākhyāte, na ca tathāvidhe pṛthivyādiṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:2408: dṛśyete/ tasmād ayuktam ``talliṅgatvād icchādveṣayoḥ pārthivādyeṣv apratiṣedha''iti//37
GSP29nysvbh1u:2410: NyS_3,2.38: yathoktahetutvāt pāratantryād akṛtābhyāgamāc ca na manasaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2411: ``icchādveṣaprayatnasukhaduḥkhajñānāny ātmano liṅgam''ity ataḥ prabhṛti yathoktaṃ saṅgṛhyate, tena bhūtendriyamanasāṃ caitanyapratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2412: pāratantryāt --- paratantrāṇi bhūtendriyamanāṃsi dhāraṇapreraṇavyūhanakriyāsu prayatnavaśāt pravarttante, caitanye punaḥ svatantrāṇi syur iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2413: akṛtābhyāgamāc ca --- ``pravṛttir vāgbuddhiśarīrārambha''iti caitanye bhūtendriyamanasāṃ parakṛtaṃ karma puruṣeṇopabhujyata iti syāt, acaitanye tu tatsādhanasya svakṛtakarmaphalopabhogaḥ puruṣasyety upapadyata
GSP29nysvbh1u:2416: ātmaguṇo jñānam iti prakṛtam/ pariśeṣo nāma `prasaktapratiṣedhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:2417: anyatrāprasaṅgāc chiṣyamāṇe sampratyayaḥ''/ bhūtendriyamanasāṃ pratiṣedhe dravyāntaraṃ na prasajyate śiṣyate cātmā tasya guṇo jñānam iti jñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2421: atha vā upapatteś ceti hetvantaram evedam/ nityaḥ khalv ayam ātmā, yasmād ekasmin śarīre dharmaṃ caritvā kāyasya bhedāt svarge deveṣūpapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2422: adharmaṃ caritvā dehabhedāt narakeṣūpapadyata iti/ upapattiḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2423: śarīrāntaraprāptilakṣaṇā, sā sati sattve nitye cāśrayavatī,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2424: buddhiprabandhamātre tu nirātmake nirāśrayā nopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2426: śarīraprabandhocchedaś cāpavargo muktir ity upapadyate/ buddhisantatimātre tv ekasattvānupapatter na kaścid dīrgham adhvānaṃ sandhāvati na kaścic charīraprabandhād vimucyata iti saṃsārāpavargānupapattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2427: buddhisantatimātre ca sattvabhedāt sarvam idaṃ prāṇivyavahārajātam apratisaṃhitam avyāvṛttam apariniṣṭhaṃ ca syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2428: % -jātam apratisaṃhitam avyāvṛttam apariniṣṭhaṃ ca syāt,] p.876
GSP29nysvbh1u:2429: tataḥ smaraṇābhāvāt nānyadṛṣṭam anyaḥ smaratīti/ smaraṇaṃ ca khalu
GSP29nysvbh1u:2430: pūrvajñātasya samānena jñātrā grahaṇam ajñāsiṣam amum arthaṃ jñeyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2431: so .yam eko jñātā pūrvajñātam arthaṃ gṛhṇāti tac cāsya grahaṇaṃ smaraṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2434: upapadyata iti/ ātmana eva smaraṇaṃ na buddhisantatimātrasyeti/ tuśabdo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2435: 'vadhāraṇe/ katham? jñasvabhāvatvāt/ jña iti asya svabhāvaḥ svo dharmaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2436: ayaṃ khalu jñāsyati jānāti ajñāsīd iti trikālaviṣayeṇānekena jñānena sambadhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2438: tac cāsya trikālaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ jñāsyāmi jānāmi ajñāsiṣam iti varttate, tad yasyāyaṃ svo dharmas tasya smaraṇaṃ na buddhiprabandhamātrasya nirātmakasyeti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2439: smṛtihetūnām ayaugapadyād yugapad asmaraṇam ity uktam/ atha kebhyaḥ smṛtir
GSP29nysvbh1u:2442: susmūrṣayā manaso dhāraṇaṃ praṇidhānaṃ susmūrṣitaliṅgacintanaṃ cārthasmṛtikāraṇam/ nibandhaḥ khalv ekagranthopayamo 'rthānām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2443: ekagranthopayatāḥ khalv arthā anyonyasmṛtihetava ānupūrvyeṇetarathā vā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2446: dhāraṇaśāstrakṛto vā prajñāteṣu vastuṣu smartavyānām upanikṣepo nibandha
GSP29nysvbh1u:2448: abhyāsas tu samāne viṣaye jñānānām abhyāvṛttiḥ, abhyāsajanitaḥ saṃskāra ātmaguṇo 'bhyāsaśabdenocyate, sa ca smṛtihetuḥ samāna iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2449: liṅgaṃ punaḥ saṃyogi samavāyy ekārthasamavāyi virodhi ceti/ yathā dhūmo 'gneḥ, gor viṣāṇam, pāṇiḥ pādasya, rūpaṃ sparśasya abhūtaṃ bhūtasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2450: lakṣaṇaṃ paśvavayavasthaṃ gotrasya smṛtihetuḥ, vidānām idaṃ gargāṇām idam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2451: iti/ sādṛśyaṃ citragataṃ pratirūpakaṃ devadattasyetyevamādi/ parigrahāt svena vā svāmī svāminā vā svaṃ smaryate/ āśrayād grāmaṇyā tadadhīnaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2452: saṃsmarati/ āśritāt tadadhīnena grāmaṇyam iti/ sambandhād antevāsinā yuktaṃ guruṃ smarati, ṛtvijā yājyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2454: ānantaryād iti karaṇīyeṣv artheṣu/ viyogād yena viyujyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:2455: tadviyogapratisaṃvedī bhṛśaṃ smarati/ ekakāryāt kartrantaradarśanāt kartrantare smṛtiḥ/ virodhāt, vijigīṣamāṇayor anyataradarśanād anyataraḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2456: smaryate/ atiśayād yenātiśaya utpāditaḥ/ prāpteḥ yato 'nena kiṃcit prāptam āptavyaṃ vā bhavati tam abhīkṣṇaṃ smarati/ vyavadhānāt kośādibhir asiprabhṛtīni smaryante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2458: sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ taddhetuḥ smaryate/ icchādveṣābhyāṃ yam icchati yaṃ ca dveṣṭi taṃ smarati/ bhayād yato bibheti/ arthitvād yenārthī bhojanenācchādanena vā/ kriyayā rathena rathakāraṃ smarati/ rāgād yasyāṃ striyāṃ rakto bhavati tām abhīkṣṇaṃ smarati/ dharmāj jātyantarasmaraṇam iha cādhītaśrutāvadhāraṇam iti/ adharmāt prāganubhūtaduḥkhasādhanaṃ smarati/ na caiteṣu nimitteṣu yugapat saṃvedanāni bhavantīti yugapad asmaraṇam iti/ nidarśanaṃ cedaṃ smṛtihetūnāṃ na parisaṅkhyānam iti//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2459: anityāyāṃ ca buddhāv utpannāpavargitvāt kālāntarāvāsthānāc ca anityānāṃ saṃśayaḥ kim utpatpannāpavargiṇī buddhiḥ śabdavat āhosvit kālāntarāvasthāyinī kumbhavad iti/ utpannāpavargiṇīti pakṣaḥ parigṛhyate/kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2461: karmaṇo 'navasthāyino grahaṇād iti/ kṣiptasyeṣor āpatanāt kriyāsantāno
GSP29nysvbh1u:2462: gṛhyate, pratyarthaniyamāc ca buddhīnāṃ kriyāsantānavad buddhisantānoupapattir iti/ avasthitagrahaṇe ca vyavadhīyamānasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2463: pratyakśanivṛtteḥ/ avasthite ca kumbhe gṛhyamāṇe santānenaiva buddhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:2464: vartate prāg vyavadhānāt tena vyavahite pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ nivartate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2465: % santānena iva buddhir ... j,jānaṃ nivartate,] p.882
GSP29nysvbh1u:2466: kālāntarāvasthāne tu buddher dṛśyavyavadhāne 'pi pratyakṣam avatiṣṭheteti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2467: smṛtiś cāliṅgaṃ buddhyavasthāne saṃskārasya buddhijasya smṛtihetutvāt/ yaś ca manyeta avatiṣṭhate buddhiḥ dṛṣṭā hi buddhiviṣaye smṛtiḥ sā ca buddhāv
GSP29nysvbh1u:2468: anityāyāṃ kāraṇābhāvān na syād iti/ tad idam aliṅgam/ kasmāt? buddhijo hi saṃskāro guṇāntaraṃ smṛtihetur na buddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2469: hetvabhāvād ayuktam iti cet? buddhyavasthānāt pratyakṣatve smṛtyabhāvaḥ/yāvad avatiṣṭhate buddhis tāvad asau boddhavyārthiḥ pratyakṣaḥ pratyskṣe ca smṛtir anupapanna iti//42//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2472: yady utpannāpavargiṇī buddhiḥ prāptam avyaktaṃ boddhavyasya grahaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2473: yathā vidyutsampāte vaidyutasya prakāśasyānavasthānād avyaktaṃ rūpagrahaṇam iti; vyaktaṃ tu dravyāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ tasmād ayuktam etad
GSP29nysvbh1u:2475: utapannāpavargiṇī buddhir iti pratiṣeddhavyaṃ tad eva abhyanujñāyate vidyutsampāte rūpāvyaktagrahaṇavad
GSP29nysvbh1u:2476: yatrāvyaktagrahaṇaṃ tatrotpannāpavargiṇī buddhir iti/ grahaṇahetuvikalpād grahaṇavikalpo na buddhivikalpāt/ yad idaṃ kvacid avyaktaṃ kvacid vyaktaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2477: grahaṇam ayaṃ vikalpo grahaṇahetuvikalpāt yatrānavasthito grahaṇahetuḥ tatrāvyaktaṃ grahaṇam yatra avasthitas tatra vyaktam, na tu buddher
GSP29nysvbh1u:2478: avasthānānavasthānābhyām iti/ kasmāt? arthagrhaṇaṃ hi buddhiḥ yat tadarthagrahaṇam avyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ vā buddhiḥ sā iti/ viśeṣāgrahaṇe ca sāmānyagrahaṇamātram avyaktagrahaṇaṃ tatra viṣayāntare buddhyanatarānutpattir nimittābhāvāt/ yatra samānadharmayuktaś ca dharmī gṛhyate viśeṣadharmayuktaś ca tad vyaktam grahaṇam, yatra tu viśeṣe
GSP29nysvbh1u:2479: 'gṛhyamāṇe sāmānyagrahaṇamātraṃ tad avyaktaṃ grahaṇam/ samānadharmayogāc ca viśiṣthadharmayogo viṣayāntaram, tatra yad grahaṇaṃ na bhavati tad
GSP29nysvbh1u:2481: yathāviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇaṃ vyaktam eva pratyarthaniyatatvāc ca buddhīnām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2482: sāmānyaviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇaṃ svaviṣayaṃ prati vyaktaṃ viśeṣaviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇaṃ svaviṣayaṃ prati vyaktaṃ pratyarthaniyatā hi buddhayaḥ, tad idam avyaktagrahaṇaṃ deśitaṃ kva viṣaye buddhyanavasthānakāritaṃ syyad iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2483: dharmiṇas tu dharmabhede buddhinānātvasya bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ tadupapattiḥ/dharmiṇaḥ khalv arthasya samānāś ca dharmā viśiṣṭāś ca, teṣu pratyarthaniyatā nānābuddayaḥ, tā ubhayo yadi dharmiṇi vartante tadā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2484: vyakataṃ grahaṇaṃ dharmiṇam abhipretya/ yadā tu sāmānyagrahaṇamātraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2485: tadāvyaktaṃ grahaṇam iti/ evaṃ dharmiṇam abhipretya vyaktāvyakatayor grahaṇayor upapattir
GSP29nysvbh1u:2486: na cedam avyaktaṃ grahaṇaṃ budder boddhavyasya vānavasthāyitvād upapadyate iti/ idaṃ hi
GSP29nysvbh1u:2488: anavasthāyitve 'pi buddhes teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ vyaktaṃ pratipattavyam/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2489: pradīpārciḥsantatyabhivyaktagrahaṇavat/ pradīpārciṣāṃ santatyā vartamānānāṃ grahaṇānavasthānaṃ grāhyānavasthānaṃ ca pratyarthaniyatatvād buddhīnāṃ yāvanti pradīpārcīṃṣi tāvatyo buddaya iti/ dṛśyate cātra vyaktaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2491: cetanā śarīraguṇaḥ sati śarīre bhāvād asati ca abhāvād iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2493: sāṃśayikaḥ sati bhāvaḥ, svaguṇo 'psu dravatvam upalabhyate, paraguṇaś
GSP29nysvbh1u:2494: coṣṇatā, tenāyaṃ saṃśayaḥ kiṃ śarīraguṇaś cetanā śarīre gṛhyata atha dravyāntaraguṇa iti//46//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2497: na rūpādihīnaṃ śarīraṃ gṛhyate cetanāhīnan tu gṛhyate yathoṣṇatāhīnā āpaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2499: saṃskāravad iti ced na kāraṇānucchedāt/ yathāvidhe dravye saṃskāraḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2500: tathāvidha evoparamo na, tatra kāraṇocchedād atyantaṃ saṃskārānupapattir
GSP29nysvbh1u:2501: bhavati/ yathāvidhe śarīre cetanā gṛhyate tathāvidhe evātyantoparamaś
GSP29nysvbh1u:2502: cetanāyā gṛhyate/ tasmāt saṃskāravad ity asamaḥ samādhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2503: athāpi śarīrasthaṃ cetanotpattikāraṇaṃ syāt? dravyāntarasthaṃ vā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2504: ubhayasthaṃ vā? tan na, niyamahetvabhāvāt/ śarīrasthena kadācic cetanotpadyate kadācin neti niyame hetur nāstīti/ dravyāntarasthena ca śarīra eva cetanotpadyate na loṣṭādiṣv ity atra na niyame hetur astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2505: ubhayasthasya nimittatve śarīrasamānajātīyadravye cetanā notpadyate śarīra eva cotpadyate iti niyame hetur nāstīti//47//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2506: yac ca manyeta sati śyāmādiguṇe dravye śyāmādyuparamo dṛṣṭaḥ evaṃ cetanoparamaḥ syād iti ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2508: nātyantaṃ rūpoparamo dravyasya, śyāme rūpe nivṛtte pākajaṃ guṇāntaraṃ raktaṃ rūpam utpadyate, śarīre tu cetanāmātroparamo 'tyantam iti//48//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2511: yāvatsu dravyeṣu pūrvaguṇapratidvandvisiddhis tāvatsu pākajotpattir dṛśyate pūrvaguṇaiḥ saha pākajānām avasthānasyāgrahaṇāt/ na ca śarīre
GSP29nysvbh1u:2512: cetanāpratidvandvisiddhau sahānavasthāyi guṇāntaraṃ gṛhyate yenānumīyeta tena cetanāyā virodhaḥ/ tasmād apratiṣiddhā cetanā yāvac charīraṃ varteta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2513: na tu vartate, tasmān na śarīraguṇaś cetanā iti//49//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2516: śarīraṃ śarīrāvayavāś ca sarve cetanotpattyā vyāptā iti na kvacid anutpattiś cetanāyāḥ, śarīravac charīrāvayavāś cetanā iti prāptaṃ cetanabahutvam/ tatra yathā pratiśarīraṃ cetanabahutve sukhaduḥkhajñānānāṃ vyavasthā liṅgam evam ekaśarīre 'pi syāt, na tu bhavati, tasmān na śarīraguṇaś cetaneti//50//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2517: yad uktaṃ na kvacic charīrāvayave cetanāyā anutpattir iti sā ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2519: keśeṣu nakhādiṣu cānutpattiś cetanāyā iti anupapannaṃ śarīravyāpitvam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2521: indriyāśrayatvaṃ śarīralakṣaṇam, tvakparyantaṃ jīvamanaḥsukhaduḥkhasaṃvittyāyatanabhūtaṃ śarīram, tasmān na keśādiṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:2522: cetanotpadyate/ arthakāritas tu śarīropanibandhaḥ keśādīnām iti//52//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2525: dvividhaḥ śarīraguṇaḥ --- apratyakṣaś ca gurutvam, indriyagrāhyaś ca rūpādiḥ, vidhāntaraṃ tu cetanā, nāpratyakṣā saṃvedyatvāt, nendriyagrāhyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2528: yathā itaretaravidharmāṇo rūpādayo na śarīraguṇatvaṃ jahaty evaṃ rūpādivaidharmyāc cetanā śarīraguṇatvaṃ na hāsyatīti//54//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2530: apratyaksatvāc ceti/ yathetaretaravidharmāṇo rūpādayo na dvaividhyam ativartante tathā rūpādivaidharmyāc cetanā na dvaividhyam ativarteta yadi
GSP29nysvbh1u:2531: śarīraguṇaḥ syād iti/ ativarttate tu, tasmān na śarīraguṇa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2532: bhūtendriyamanasāṃ jñānapratiṣedhāt siddhe saty ārambho viśeṣajñāpanārthaḥ, bahudhā parīkṣyamāṇaṃ tattvaṃ suniścitataraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2533: parīkṣitā buddhiḥ, manasa idānīṃ parīkṣākramaḥ/ tat kiṃ pratiśarīram ekam anekam iti vicāre
GSP29nysvbh1u:2535: asti khalu vai jñānāyaugapadyam ekaikasyendriyasya yathāviṣayam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2536: karaṇasyaikapratyayanirvṛttau sāmarthyāt, na tadekatve manaso liṅgam/ yat tu khalv idam indriyāntarāṇāṃ viṣayāntareṣu jñānāyaugapadyam iti tal
GSP29nysvbh1u:2537: liṅgam/ kasmāt? sambhavati khalu vai bahuṣu manaḥsv indriyamanaḥsaṃyogayaugapadyam iti jñānayaugapadyaṃ syāt, na tu bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2540: ayaṃ khalv adhyāpako 'dhīte vrajati kamaṇḍaluṃ dhārayati panthānaṃ paśyati śṛṇoty āraṇyajān śabdān bibhyad vyālaliṅgāni bubhutsate smarati ca gantavyaṃ sthānīyam iti/ kramasyāgrahaṇād yugapad etāḥ kriyā iti prāptaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2543: āśusañcārād alātasya bhramato vidyamānaḥ kramo na gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2546: tathā buddhīnāṃ kriyāṇāṃ cāśuvṛttitvād vidyamānaḥ kramo na gṛhyate kramasyāgrahaṇād yugapat kriyā bhavanntīty abhimāno bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2547: kiṃ punaḥ kramasyāgrahaṇād yugapat kriyābhimānaḥ, atha yugapadbhāvād eva
GSP29nysvbh1u:2548: yugapadanekakriyopalabdhir iti nātra viśeṣapratipatteḥ kāraṇam ucyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2549: uktam indriyāntarāṇāṃ viṣayāntareṣu paryāyeṇa buddhayo bhavantīti tac cāpratyākhyeyam ātmapratyakṣatvāt/ athāpi dṛṣṭaśrutān arthān cintayataḥ krameṇa buddhayo vartante na yugapad anenānumātavyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2551: katham? vākyastheṣu khalu varṇeṣūccaratsu prativarṇaṃ tāvac chravaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2552: bhavati, śrutaṃ varṇam ekam anekaṃ vā padabhāvena sa pratisandhatte,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2553: pratisandhāya padaṃ vyavasyati, padavyavasāyena smṛtyā padārthaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2554: pratipadyate, padasamūhapratisandhānāc ca vākyaṃ vyavasyati, sambaddhāṃś ca padārthān gṛhītvā vākyārthaṃ pratipadyate/ na cāsāṃ krameṇa
GSP29nysvbh1u:2555: vartamānānāṃ buddhīnām āśuvṛttitvāt kramo gṛhyate, tad etad anumānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2556: anyatra buddhikriyāyaugapadyābhimānasyeti/ na cāsti muktasaṃśayā yugapad utpattir buddhīnāṃ yayā manasāṃ bahutvam ekaśarīre 'numīyeta iti//58//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2558: aṇu mana ekaṃ ceti dharmasamuccayo jñānāyaugapadyāt/ mahattve manasaḥ sarvendriyasaṃyogād yugapad viṣayagrahaṇaṃ syād iti//59//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2559: manasaḥ khalu bhoḥ sendriyasya śarīre vṛttilābho nānyatra śarīrāt/ jñātuś ca puruṣasya śarīrāyatanā buddhyādayo viṣayopabhogo jihāsitahānam īpsitāvāptiś ca sarve ca śarīrāśrayā vyavahārāḥ/ tatra khalu vipratipatteḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2560: saṃśayaḥ --- kim ayaṃ puruṣakarmanimittaḥ śarīrasarga āhosvid bhūtamātrād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2561: akarmanimitta iti/ śrūyate khalv atra vipratipattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2564: pūrvaśarīre yā pravṛttir vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhalakṣaṇā tat pūrvakṛtaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2568: tasyotpattiḥ śarīrasya, na svatantrebhya iti/ yad adhiṣṭhāno 'yam ātmā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2569: 'yam aham iti manyamāno yatrābhiyukto yatropabhogatṛṣṇayā viṣayānupalabhamāno dharmādharmau saṃskaroti tad asya śarīram, tena saṃskāreṇa dharmādharmalakṣaṇena bhūtasahite patite 'smin śarīra uttaraṃ niṣpadyate, niṣpannasya cāsya pūrvaśarīravat puruṣārthakriyā, puruṣasya ca pūrvaśarīravat pravṛttir iti karmāpekṣebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ śarīrasarge saty etad upapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2570: % pravṛttir iti karmāpekṣebhyo ... upapadyata iti/] p.901
GSP29nysvbh1u:2571: dṛṣṭā ca puruṣaguṇena prayatnena prayuktebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ puruṣārthkriyāsamarthānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ rathaprabhṛtīnām utpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2572: tathānumātavyaṃ śarīram api puruṣārthakriyāsamartham utpadyamānaṃ puruṣasya guṇāntarāpekṣebhyo bhūtebhya utpadyata iti//60//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2575: yathā karmanirapekṣebhyo bhūtebhyo nirvṛttā mūrtayaḥ sikatāśarkarāpāṣāṇagairikāñjanaprabhṛtayaḥ puruṣārthakāritvād upādīyante tathā karmanirapekṣebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ śarīram utpannaṃ puruṣārthakāritvād upādīyate iti//61//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2577: yathā śarīrotpattir akarmanimittā sādhyā tathā sikatāśarkarāpāṣāṇagairikāñjanaprabhṛtīnām apy akarmanimittaḥ sargaḥ sādhyaḥ sādhyasamatvād asādhanam iti ``bhūtebhyo mūrtyupādānavad'' iti cānena sādhyam//62//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2579: viṣamaś cāyam upanyāsaḥ/ kasmāt? nirbījā imā mūrtaya utpadyante bījapūrvikā tu śarīrotpattiḥ/ mātāpitṛśabdena lohitaretasī bījabhūte
GSP29nysvbh1u:2580: gṛhyete/ tatra sattvasya garbhavāsānubhavanīyaṃ karma pitroś ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:2581: putraphalānubhavanīye karmaṇī mātur garbhāśraye śarīrotpattiṃ bhūtebhyaḥ prayojayantīty upapannaṃ bījānuvidhānam iti//63//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2583: utpattinimittatvād iti prakṛtam/ bhuktaṃ pītam āhāraḥ tasya paktinirvṛttaṃ rasadravyaṃ mātṛśarīre copacīyate bīje garbhāśayasthe bījasamānapākam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2584: mātrayā copacayo bīje yāvad vyūhasamarthaḥ sañcaya iti/ sañcitaṃ ca kalalārbudamāṃsapeśīkaṇḍarāśiraḥpāṇyādinā ca vyūhenendriyādhiṣṭhānabhedena
GSP29nysvbh1u:2585: vyuhyate, vyūhe ca garbhanāḍyāvatāritaṃ rasadravyam upacīyate yāvat
GSP29nysvbh1u:2586: prasavasamartham iti/ na cāyam annapānasya sthālyādigatasya kalpata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2587: etasmāt kāraṇāt karmanimittatvaṃ śarīrasya vijñāyata iti//64//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2589: na sarvo dampatyoḥ saṃyogo garbhādhānahetur dṛśyate tatrāsati karmaṇi na bhavati sati ca bhavatīty anupapanno niyamābhāva iti/ karmanirapekṣeṣu bhūteṣu śarīrotpattihetuṣu niyamaḥ syāt na hy atra kāraṇābhāva iti//65//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2592: yathā khalv idaṃ śarīraṃ dhātuprāṇasaṃvāhinīnāṃ nāḍīnāṃ śukrāntānāṃ dhātūnāṃ ca snāyutvagasthiśirāpeśīkalalakaṇḍarāṇāṃ ca śirobāhūdarāṇāṃ sakthnāṃ ca koṣṭhagānāṃ vātapittakaphānāṃ ca mukhahṛdayāmāśayapakvāśayādhaḥsrotasāṃ ca paramaduḥkhasampādanīyena sanniveśena vyūhanam aśakyaṃ pṛthivyādibhiḥ karmanirapekṣair utpādayitum iti karmanimittā śarīrotpattir iti vijñāyate; evaṃ ca pratyātmaniyatasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2593: nimittasyābhāvān niratiśayair ātmabhiḥ sambandhāt sarvātmanāṃ ca samānaiḥ pṛthivyādibhir utpāditaṃ śarīraṃ pṛthivyādigatasya ca niyamahetor abhāvāt sarvātmanāṃ sukhaduḥkhasaṃvittyāyatanaṃ samānaṃ prāptam/ yat tu pratyātmaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2594: vyavatiṣṭhate tatra śarīrotpattinimittaṃ karma vyavashtāhetur iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2595: vijñāyate/ paripacyamāno hi pratyātmaniyataḥ karmāśayo yasminn ātmani
GSP29nysvbh1u:2596: vartate tasyaivopabhogāyatanaṃ śarīram utpādya vyavasthāpayati/ tad evaṃ ``śarīrotpattinimittavat saṃyoganimittaṃ karma'' iti vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2597: pratyātmavyavasthānaṃ tu śarīrasyātmanā saṃyogaṃ pracakṣmaha iti//66//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2599: yo .yam akarmanimitte śarīrasarge saty aniyama ity ucyate, ayaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2602: kas tāvad ayaṃ niyamaḥ? yathaikasyātmanaḥ śarīraṃ tathā sarveṣām iti niyamaḥ/ anyasyānyathānyasyānyathety aniyamo bhedo vyāvṛttir viśeṣa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2603: % -ty aniyamo bhedo vyāvṛttir viśeṣa iti/] p.909
GSP29nysvbh1u:2604: dṛṣṭā ca janmavyāvṛttir uccābhijano nikṛṣṭābhijana iti, praśastaṃ nindatam iti, vyādhibahulam arogam iti, samagraṃ vikalam iti, pīḍābahulaṃ sukhabahulam iti, puruṣātiśayalakṣaṇopapannaṃ viparītam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2605: praśastalakṣaṇaṃ ninditalakṣaṇam iti, paṭvindriyaṃ mṛḍvindriyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2606: sūkṣmaś ca bhedo 'parimeyaḥ/ so 'yam janmabhedaḥ pratyātmaniyatāt karmabhedād upapadyate, asati karmabhede pratyātmaniyate niratiśayatvād ātmanāṃ samānatvāc ca pṛthivyādīnāṃ pṛthivyādigatasya niyamahetor ahbāvāt sarvaṃ sarvātmanāṃ prasajyeta, na tv idam itthambhūtaṃ janma/ tasmān nākarmanittā śarīrotpattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2607: upapannaś ca tadviyogaḥ karmakṣayopapatteḥ/ karmanimitte śarīrasarge tena
GSP29nysvbh1u:2608: śarīreṇātmano viyoga upapannaḥ/ kasmāt? karmakṣayopapatteḥ/ upapadyate khalu karmakṣayaḥ samyagdarśanāt prakṣīṇe mohe vītarāgaḥ punarbhavahetukarma kāyavāṅmanobhir na karotīty uttarasyānupacayaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2609: pūrvopacitasya vipākapratisaṃvedanāt prakṣayaḥ/ evaṃ prasavahetor abhāvāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:2611: akarmanimitte tu śarīrasarge bhūtakṣayānupapattes tadviyogānupapattir iti//67//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2612: NyS_3,2.68: tad adṛṣṭakāritam iti cet punas tatprasaṅgo 'pavarge ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2613: adarśanaṃ khalv adṛṣṭam ity ucyata adṛṣṭakāritā bhūtebhyaḥ śarīrotpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2614: na jātv anutpanne śarīre draṣṭā nirāyatano dṛśyaṃ paśyati/ tac cāsya dṛśyaṃ dvividhaṃ viṣayaś ca nānātvaṃ cāvyaktātmanaḥ, tadarthaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2615: śarīrasargaḥ/ tasminn avasite caritārthāni bhūtāni na śarīram
GSP29nysvbh1u:2616: utpādayantīty upapannaḥ śarīraviyoga ity evaṃ cen manyase, ``punas tat prasaṅgo 'pavarge'' --- punaḥ śarīrotpattiḥ prasajyata iti/ yā cānutpanne śarīre darśanānutpattir adarśanābhimatā yā cāpavarge śarīranivṛttau
GSP29nysvbh1u:2617: darśanānutpattir adarśanabhūtā naitayor adarśanayoḥ kvacid viśeṣa ity adarśanasyānivṛtter apavarge punaḥ śarīrotpattiprasaṅga iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2618: caritārthatā viśeṣa iti cet na karaṇākaraṇayor ārambhadarśanāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2619: caritārthāni bhūtāni darśanāvasānān na śarīrāntaram ārabhanta ity ayaṃ viśeṣa evaṃ ced ucyate; na, karaṇākaraṇayor ārambhadarśanāt ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2620: caritārthānāṃ bhūtānāṃ viṣayopalabdhikaraṇāt punaḥ punaḥ śarīrārambho dṛśyate prakṛtipuruṣayor nānātvadarśanasyākaraṇān nirarthakaḥ śarīrārambhaḥ punaḥ punar dṛśyate/ tasmād akarmanimittāyāṃ bhūtasṛṣṭau na darśanārthā śarīrotpattir yuktā, yuktā tu karmanimitte sarge darśanārthā śarīrotpattiḥ/ karmavipākasaṃvedanaṃ darśanam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2621: tad adṛṣṭakāritam iti cet? kasyacid darśanam adṛṣṭaṃ nāma paramāṇūnāṃ guṇaviśeṣaḥ kriyāhetus tena preritāḥ paramāṇavaḥ sammūrcchitāḥ śarīram utpādayantīti tan manaḥ samāviśati svaguṇenādṛṣṭena preritaṃ samanaske śarīre draṣṭur upalabdhir bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2622: etasmin vai darśane guṇānucchedāt punas tatprasaṅgo 'pavarge/ apavarge śarīrotpattiḥ paramāṇuguṇasyādṛṣṭasyānucchedyatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2624: manoguṇenādṛṣṭena samāveśite manasi saṃyogavyucchedo na syāt, tac ca kiṃkṛtaṃ śarīrād apasarpaṇaṃ manasa iti? karmāśayakṣaye tu karmāśayāntarād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2625: vipacyamānād apasarpaṇopapattir iti/ adṛṣṭād evāpasarpaṇam iti cet --- yo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2626: 'dṛṣṭaḥ śarīropasarpaṇahetuḥ sa evāpasarpaṇahetur apīti? na, ekasya jīvanaprāyaṇahetutvānupapatteḥ --- evaṃ ca saty ekam adṛṣṭaṃ jīvanaprāyaṇayor hetur iti prāptam, naitad upapadyate//69//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2628: vipākasaṃvedanāt karmāśayakṣaye śarīrapātaḥ prāyaṇam, karmāśayāntarāc ca punarjanma/ bhūtamātrāt tu karmanirapekṣāc charīrotpattau kasya kṣayāc
GSP29nysvbh1u:2629: charīrapātaḥ prāyaṇam iti? prāyaṇānupapatteḥ khalu vai nityatvaprasaṅgaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2630: vidmaḥ/ yādṛcchike tu prāyaṇe prāyaṇabhedānupapattir iti//70//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2631: punas tatprasaṅgo 'pavarga ity etat samādhitsur āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2633: yathāṇoḥ śyāmatā nityā agnisaṃyogena pratiṣiddhā na punar utpadyata evam adṛṣṭakāritaṃ śarīram apavarge punar notpadyata iti// 71 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2635: nāyam asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ/ kasmāt? akṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgāt/ akṛtaṃ pramāṇato 'nupapannam, tasyābhyāgamo 'bhyupapattir vyavasāyaḥ, etacchraddadhānena pramāṇato ṇupapannaṃ mantavyam/ tasmān nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto na pratyakṣaṃ na
GSP29nysvbh1u:2636: cānumānaṃ kiṃcid ucyata iti/ tad idaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyasamatvam abhidhīyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2637: atha vā nākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgāt/ aṇuśyāmatādṛṣṭāntenākarmanimittāṃ śarīrotpattiṃ samādadhānasyākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgaḥ/ akṛte sukhaduḥkhahetau karmaṇi puruṣasya sukhaṃ duḥkham abhyāgacchatīti prasajyeta/ om iti bruvataḥ pratyakṣānumānāgamavirodhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2639: pratyātmavedanīyatvāt pratyakṣaṃ sarvaśarīriṇām/ ko bhedaḥ? tīvraṃ mandaṃ ciram āśu nānāprakāram ekaprakāram ity evam ādir viśeṣaḥ/ na cāsti pratyātmaniyataḥ sukhaduḥkhahetuviśeṣaḥ, na cāsati hetuviśeṣe phalaviśeṣo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2640: dṛśyate/ karmanimitte tu sukhaduḥkhayoge karmaṇāṃ tīvramandatopapatteḥ karmasañcayānāṃ cotkarṣāpakarṣabhāvāt nānāvidhaikavidhabhāvāc ca karmaṇāṃ sukhaduḥkhabhedopapattiḥ/ so 'yaṃ hetubhedābhāvād dṛṣṭaḥ sukhaduḥkhabhedo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2643: sukhaduḥkhavyavasthānam/ yaḥ khalu cetanāvān sādhananirvartanīyaṃ sukhaṃ buddhvā tad īpsan sādhanāvāptaye prayatate sa sukhena yujyate na
GSP29nysvbh1u:2644: viparītaḥ/ yaś ca sādhananirvartanīyaṃ duḥkhaṃ buddhvā taj jihāsuḥ sādhanaparivarjanāya yatate sa ca duḥkhena tyajyate na viparītaḥ/ asti cedaṃ yatnam antareṇa cetanānāṃ sukhaduḥkhavyavasthānaṃ tenāpi cetanaguṇāntaravyavasthākṛtena bhavitavyam ity anumānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2646: tad etad akarmanimitte sukhaduḥkhayoge virudhyata iti/ tac ca guṇāntaram
GSP29nysvbh1u:2647: asaṃvedyatvād adṛṣṭaṃ vipākakālāniyamāc cāvyavasthitam/ buddhyādayas tu saṃvedyāś cāpavargiṇaś
GSP29nysvbh1u:2648: athāgamavirodhaḥ --- bahu khalv idam ārṣam ṛṣīṇām upadeśajātam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2651: tac cobhayam etasyāṃ dṛṣṭau ``nāsti karma sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ vā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2652: karmanimittaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ sukhaduḥkhayogaḥ'' iti virudhyate/ seyaṃ pāpiṣṭhānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ --- akarmanimittā śarīrasṛṣṭir akarmanimittaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2654: iti śrīvātsyāyanīye nyāyabhāṣye tṛtīyādhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam// 2 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2657: manaso 'nantaraṃ pravṛttiḥ parīkṣitavyā/ tatra khalu yāvad
GSP29nysvbh1u:2658: dharmādharmāśrayaśarīrādi parīkṣitam, sarvā sā pravṛtteḥ parīkṣety āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2661: pravṛttyanantarās tarhi doṣāḥ parīkṣyantām ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2663: parīkṣitā iti/ buddhisamānāśrayatvād ātmaguṇāḥ, pravṛttihetutvāt punarbhavapratisandhānasāmarthyāc ca saṃsārahetavaḥ, saṃsārasyānāditvād anādinā prabandhena pravartante, mithyājñānanivṛttis tattvajñānāt tannivṛttau rāgadveṣaprabandhocchyede 'pavarga iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2665: pravartanālakṣaṇā doṣā ity uktam, tathā ceme mānerṣyāsūyāvicikitsāmatsarādayaḥ, te kasmān nopasaṅkhyāyante ity ata āha
GSP29nysvbh1u:2667: teṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ trayo rāśayas trayaḥ pakṣāḥ/ rāgapakṣaḥ --- kāmo matsaraḥ spṛhā tṛṣṇā lobha iti/ dveṣapakṣaḥ --- krodha īrṣyā asūyā droho 'marṣa
GSP29nysvbh1u:2669: mithyājñānaṃ vicikitsā mānaḥ pramāda iti/ trairāśyān nopasaṅkhyāyante iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2670: lakṣaṇasya tarhy abhedāt tritvam anupapannam? nānupapannam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2672: āsaktilakṣaṇo rāgaḥ, amarṣalakṣaṇo dveṣaḥ, mithyāpratipattilakṣaṇo moha iti/ etat pratyātmavedanīyaṃ sarvaśarīriṇām --- vijānāty ayaṃ śarīrī rāgam utpannam ``asti me 'dhyātmaṃ rāgadharma'' iti/ virāgaṃ ca vijānāti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2673: ---``nāsti me 'dhyātmaṃ rāgadharma'' iti/ evam itarayor apīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2674: mānerṣyāsūyāprabhṛtayas tu trairāśyam anupatitā iti nopasaṅkhyāyante//3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2676: nārthāntaraṃ rāgādayaḥ/ kasmāt? ekapratyanīkabhāvāt --- tattvajñānaṃ samyaṅmatir āryaprajñā sambodha ity ekam idaṃ pratyanīkaṃ trayāṇām
GSP29nysvbh1u:2678: ekapratyanīkāḥ pṛthivyāṃ śyāmādayo 'gnisaṃyogenaikena, ekayonayaś ca pākajā iti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2681: mohaḥ pāpaḥ, pāpataro vā dvāv abhipretyoktam/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2684: amūḍhasya rāgadveṣā notpadyante mūḍhasya tu yathāsaṅkalpam utpattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2685: viṣayeṣu rañjanīyāḥ saṅkalpā rāgahetavaḥ, kopanīyāḥ saṅkalpā dveṣahetavaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2686: ubhaye ca saṅkalpā na mithyāpratipattilakṣaṇatvān mohād anye, tāv imau mohayonī rāgadveṣāv iti/ tattvajñānāc ca mohanivṛttau rāgadveṣānutpattir ity ekapratyanīkabhāvopapattiḥ/ evaṃ ca kṛtvā tattvajñānād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2687: ``duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānām uttarottarāpāye tadanantarābhāvād apavarga'' iti vyākhyātam iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2690: anyad dhi nimittam anyac ca naimittikam iti doṣanimittatvād adoṣo moha
GSP29nysvbh1u:2692: pravarttanālakṣaṇā doṣā ity anena doṣalakṣaṇenāvarudhyate doṣeṣu moha
GSP29nysvbh1u:2694: dravyāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ vānekavidhavikalpo nimittanaimittikabhāve tulyajātīyānāṃ dṛṣṭa iti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2695: doṣānantaraṃ pretyabhāvaḥ, tasyāsiddhir ātmano nityatvāt --- na khalu nityaṃ kiṃcij jāyate mriyate vā iti janmamaraṇayor nityatvād ātmano
GSP29nysvbh1u:2696: 'nupapattiḥ, ubhayaṃ ca pretyabhāva iti tatrāyaṃ siddhānuvādaḥ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2698: nityo 'yam ātmā praiti pūrvaśarīraṃ jahāti mriyate iti, pretya ca pūrvaśarīraṃ hitvā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2699: bhavati jāyate śarīrāntaram upādatta iti/ tac caitad ubhayaṃ ``punar
GSP29nysvbh1u:2700: utpattiḥ pretyabhāvaḥ'' ity atroktaṃ pūrvaśarīraṃ hitvā śarīrāntaropādānaṃ pretyabhāvaḥ iti tac caitannityatve sambhavatīti/ yasya tu sattvotpādaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2701: sattvanirodhaḥ pretyabhāvaḥ tasya kṛtahānam akṛtābhyāgamaś ca doṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2705: kena prakāreṇa kiṃdharmakāt kāraṇād vyaktaṃ śarīrādy utpadyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2706: vyaktād bhūtasamākhyātāt pṛthivyāditaḥ paramasūkṣmān nityād vyaktaṃ śarīrendriyaviṣayopakaraṇādhāraṃ prajñātaṃ dravyam utpadyate/ vyaktaṃ ca khalv indriyagrāhyaṃ tatsāmānyāt kāraṇam api vyaktam/ kiṃ sāmānyam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2707: rūpādiguṇayogaḥ rūpādiguṇayuktebhyaḥ pṛthivyādibhyo nityebhyo rūpādiguṇayuktaṃ śarīrādy utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2709: pratyakṣaprāmāṇyāt --- dṛṣṭo hi rūpādiguṇayuktebhyo mṛtprabhṛtibhyas tathābhūtasya dravyasyotpādaḥ, tena cādṛṣṭasyānumānam iti/ rūpādīnām anvayadarśanāt prakṛtivikārayoḥ, pṛthivyādīnāṃ nityānām atīndriyāṇāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2712: idam api pratyakṣam --- na khalu vyaktād ghaṭād vyakto ghaṭa utpadyamāno dṛśyate iti, vyaktād vyaktasyānutpattidarśanān na vyaktaṃ kāraṇam iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2714: na brūmaḥ sarvaṃ sarvasya kāraṇam iti, kin tu yad utpadyate vyaktaṃ dravyaṃ tat tathābhūtād evotpadyate iti/ vyaktaṃ ca tanmṛddravyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2715: kapālasaṃjñakaṃ yato ghaṭa utpadyate/ na caitannihnuvānaḥ kvacid
GSP29nysvbh1u:2716: abhyanujñāṃ labdhum arhatīti/ tad etat tattvam//13//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2719: asataḥ sad utpadyate ity ayaṃ pakṣaḥ/ kasmāt? upamṛdya prādurbhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2720: upamṛdya bījam aṅkura utpadyate nānupamṛdya, na ced vījopamardo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2724: upamṛdya prādurbhāvād ity ayuktaḥ prayogo vyāghātāt/ yad upamṛdnāti na tad upamṛdya prādurbhavitum arhati vidyamānatvāt/ yac ca prādurbhavati na tenāprādurbhūtenāvidyamānenopamarda iti//15//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2726: atīte cānāgate cāvidyamāne kārakaśabdāḥ prayujyante/ putro janiṣyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2727: janiṣyamāṇaṃ putram abhinandati, putrasya janiṣyamāṇasya nāma karoti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2728: abhūt kumbhaḥ, bhinnaṃ kumbham anuśocati, bhinnasya kumbhasya kapālāni,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2729: ajātāḥ putrāḥ pitaraṃ tāpayantīti bahulaṃ bhāktāḥ prayogā dṛśyante/ kā punar iyaṃ bhaktiḥ? ānantaryaṃ bhaktiḥ, ānantaryasāmarthyād upamṛdya prādurbhāvārthaḥ, prādurbhaviṣyann aṅkura upamṛdnātīti bhāktaṃ kartṛtvam iti//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2731: na vinaṣṭād bījād aṅkura utpadyate iti tasmān nābhāvād bhāvotpattir
GSP29nysvbh1u:2733: upamardaprādurbhāvayoḥ paurvāparyaniyamaḥ kramaḥ, sa khalv abhāvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2734: bhāvotpatter hetur nirdiśyate; sa ca na pratiṣidhyate iti/ vyāhatavyūhānām avayavānāṃ pūrvavyūhanivṛttau vyūhāntarād dravyaniṣpattir nābhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2735: bījāvayavāḥ kutaścin nimittāt prādurbhūtakriyāḥ pūrvavyūhaṃ jahati vyūhāntaraṃ cāpadyante vyūhāntarād aṅkura utpadyate/ dṛśyante khalu avayavās tatsaṃyogāś cāṅkurotpattihetavaḥ/ na cānivṛtte pūrvavyūhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:2736: bījāvayavānāṃ śakyaṃ vyūhāntareṇa bhavitum ity upamardaprādurbhāvayoḥ paurvāparyaniyamaḥ kramaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2738: tasmān nābhāvād bhāvotpattir iti/ na cānyad bījāvayavebhyo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2742: puruṣo 'yaṃ samīhamāno nāvaśyaṃ samīhāphalaṃ prāpnoti tenānumīyate parādhīnaṃ puruṣasya karmaphalārādhanam iti, yadadhīnaṃ sa īśvaraḥ/ tasmād īśvaraḥ kāraṇam iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2744: īśvarādhīnā cet phalaniṣpattiḥ syād api tarhi puruṣasya samīhām antareṇa phalaṃ niṣpadyeteti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2746: puruṣakāram īśvaro 'nugṛhṇāti, phalāya puruṣasya yatamānasyeśvaraḥ phalaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2747: sampādayatīti/ yadā na sampādayati tadā puruṣakarmāphalaṃ bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2748: tasmād īśvarakāritatvāt ahetuḥ puruṣakarmābhāve phalāniṣpatter iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2749: guṇaviśiṣṭam ātmāntaram īśvaraḥ/ tasya ātmakalpāt kalpāntarānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2750: adharmamithyājñānapramādahānyā dharmajñānasamādhisampadā ca viśiṣṭam ātmāntaram īśvaraḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2752: saṅkalpānuvidhāyī cāsya dharmaḥ pratyātmavṛttīn dharmādharmasañcayān pṛthivyādīni ca bhūtāni pravartayati/ evaṃ ca svakṛtābhyāgamasyālopena
GSP29nysvbh1u:2753: nirmāṇaprākāmyam īśvarasya svakṛtakarmaphalaṃ veditavyam/ āptakalpaś cāyam --- yathā pitāpatyānāṃ tathā pitṛbhūta īśvaro bhūtānām/ na cātmakalpād anyaḥ kalpaḥ sambhavati/ na tāvad asya buddhiṃ vinā kaścid dharmo liṅgabhūtaḥ śakya upapādayitum/ āgamāc ca draṣṭā boddhā sarvajñātā īśvara
GSP29nysvbh1u:2754: iti/ buddhyādibhiś cātmaliṅgair nirupākhyam īśvaraṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamaviṣayātītaṃ kaḥ śakta
GSP29nysvbh1u:2755: % liṅgair nirupākhyam īśvaraṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamaviṣayātītaṃ kaḥ śakta
GSP29nysvbh1u:2757: svakṛtābhyāgamalopena ca pravartamānasyāsya yad uktaṃ pratiṣedhajātam akarmanimitte śarīrasarge tat sarvaṃ prasajyate iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2761: taikṣṇyam, parvatadhātūnāṃ citratā, grāvṇāṃ ślakṣṇatā, nirnimittaṃ ca upādānavac ca dṛṣṭaṃ tathā śarīrādisargo .pīti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2763: animittato bhāvotpattir ity ucyate yataś cotpadyate tannimittam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2766: anyad dhi nimittam anyac ca nimittapratyākhyānam, na ca pratyākhyānam eva pratyākhyeyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2767: yathānudakaḥ kamaṇḍalur iti nodakapratiṣedha udakaṃ bhavatīti/ sa khalv ayaṃ vādo 'karmanimittaḥ śarīrādisarga ity etasmān na bhidyate, abhedāt tatpratiṣedhenaiva pratiṣiddho veditavya iti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2770: kim anityaṃ nāma? yasya kadācid bhāvas tad anityam/ utpattidharmakam anutpannaṃ nāsti vināśadharmakaṃ ca vinaṣṭaṃ nāsti/ kiṃ punaḥ sarvam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2772: abhautikaṃ ca buddhyādi, tad ubhayam utpattivināśadharmakaṃ vijñāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2775: yadi tāvat sarvasyānityatā nityā, tannityatvān na sarvam anityam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2776: athānityā tasyām avidyamānāyāṃ sarvaṃ nityam iti//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2778: tasyā anityatāyā apy anityatvam/ katham? yathā agnir dāhyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2781: ayaṃ khalu vādo nityaṃ pratyācaṣṭe, nityasya ca pratyākhyānam anupapannam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2782: kasmāt? yathopalabdhi vyavasthānāt/ yasyotpattivināśadharmakatvam upalabhyate pramāṇatas tad
GSP29nysvbh1u:2783: yasya nopalabhyate tadviparītam/ na ca paramasūkṣmāṇāṃ bhūtānām ākāśakāladigātmamanasāṃ tadguṇānāṃ ca keṣāñcit sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2784: cotpattivināśadharmakatvaṃ pramāṇata upalabhyate, tasmān nityāny etānīti//28//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2787: bhūtamātram idaṃ sarvaṃ tāni ca nityāni bhūtocchedānupapatter iti//29//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2789: utpattikāraṇaṃ copalabhyate vināśakāraṇaṃ ca, tat sarvanityatve vyāhanyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:2791: yasyotpattivināśakāraṇam upalabhyate iti manyase, na tad bhūtalakṣaṇahīnam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2792: arthāntaraṃ gṛhyate, bhūtalakṣaṇāvarodhād bhūtamātram idam ity ukto 'yaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2795: kāraṇasamānaguṇasyotpattiḥ kāraṇaṃ copalabhyate/ na caitad ubhayaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2796: nityaviṣayam, na cotpattitatkāraṇopalabdhiḥ śakyā pratyākhyātum, na cāviṣayā kācid upalabdhiḥ/ upalabdhisāmarthyāt kāraṇena samānaguṇaṃ kāryam utpadyate ity anumīyate, sa khalūpalabdher viṣaya iti/ evaṃ ca tallakṣaṇāvarodhopapattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2797: utpattivināśakāraṇaprayuktasya jñātuḥ prayatno dṛṣṭa iti/ prasiddhaś cāvayavī taddharmā/ utpattivināśadharmā cāvayavī siddha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2798: śabdakarmabuddhyādīnāṃ cāvyāptiḥ/ pañcabhūtanityatvāt tallakṣaṇāvarodhāc cety anena śabdakarmabuddhisukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnāś ca na vyāptāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2800: svapnaviṣayābhimānavan mithyopalabdhir iti cet bhūtopalabdhau tulyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2801: yathā svapne viṣayābhimāna evam utpattikāraṇābhimāna iti/ evaṃ caitad bhūtopalabdhau tulyaṃ pṛthivyādyupalabdhir api svapnaviṣayābhimānavat prasajyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2802: pṛthivyādyabhāve sarvavyavahāravilopa iti cet tad itaratra samānam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2804: 'yaṃ nityānām atīndriyatvād aviṣayatvāc cotpattivināśayoḥ svapnaviṣayābhimānavad ity ahetur
GSP29nysvbh1u:2805: avasthitasyopādānasya dharmamātraṃ nivartate dharmamātram upajāyate sa khalūtpattivināśayor
GSP29nysvbh1u:2807: yac copajāyate tat prāg apy upajananād asti, yac ca nivartate tan nivṛttam apy astīti, evaṃ ca sarvasya nityatvam iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2809: ayam upajanaḥ iyaṃ nivṛttir iti vyavasthā nopapadyate, upajātanivṛttayor
GSP29nysvbh1u:2810: vidyamānatvāt/ ayaṃ dharma upajāto 'yaṃ nivṛtta iti sadbhāvāviśeṣād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2811: avyavasthā, idānīm upajananivṛttī nedānīm iti kālavyavasthā nopapadyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:2812: sarvadā vidyamānatvāt asya dharmasyopajananivṛttī nāsyeti vyavasthānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2814: ubhyor aviśeṣāt/ anāgato 'tīta iti ca kālavyavasthānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2815: vartamānasya sadbhāvalakṣaṇatvāt/ avidyamānasyātmalābha upajano vidyamānasyātmahānaṃ nivṛttir ity etasmin sati naite doṣāḥ/ tasmād yad uktaṃ prāg apy upajanād asti nivṛttaṃ cāsti tad ayuktam iti//33//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2818: sarvaṃ nānā na kaścid eko bhāvo vidyate/ kasmāt? bhāvalakṣaṇapṛthaktvāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:2819: --- bhāvasya lakṣaṇam abhidhānam, yena lakṣyate bhāvaḥ sa samākhyāśabdaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2821: sarvo bhāvasamākhyāśabdaḥ samūhavācī, kumbha iti saṃjñāśabdo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2825: anekavidhalakṣaṇair iti madhyamapadalopī samāsaḥ/ gandhādibhiś ca guṇair
GSP29nysvbh1u:2826: budhnādibhiś cāvayavaiḥ sambaddha eko bhāvo niṣpadyate, guṇavyatiriktaṃ ca dravyam avayavātiriktaś cāvayavīti/ vibhaktanyāyaṃ caitad ubhayam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2829: na kaścid eko bhāva ity ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/ kasmāt? lakṣaṇavyavasthānād
